[\[127a.2\]]dang /_mdog dkar po dang /_btsod ka'i mdog dang /_mdog sngon po dang /_mdog ser po dang /_zla ba'i mdog dang /_nyi ma'i mdog dang /_me'i mdog dang /_'od kyi mdog dang /_brgya byin gyi mdog dang /_tshangs pa'i mdog dang /_ba mo'i mdog dang /_ldong ros kyi mdog dang /_
[\[127a.3\]]mtshal gyi mdog tu mthong ngo /_/la las ni chu'i mdog dang /_la las ni mya ngan 'tshang gi me tog gi mdog dang /_tsam pa ka'i mdog dang /_sna ma'i me tog gi mdog dang /_bar shi ka'i mdog dang /_pad ma'i mdog dang /_ku mu da'i mdog dang /_pad ma dkar po'i mdog dang /_
[\[127a.4\]]dpal gyi mdog dang /_rnam thos kyi bu'i mdog dang /_ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang skya'i mdog dang /_pad ma sar pa'i mdog dang /_dpal gyi snying po'i mdog dang /_rin po che bye ru'i mdog dang /_nor bu rin po che'i mdog dang /_and rnyil gyi mdog dang /_nam mkha' dag pa'i gzi 
[\[127a.5\]]brjid kyi mdog dang /_lha dang mi kha cig yon tan gyi bsngags pa mtha' yas par mos pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa mtha' yas pa dang ldan par mthong ngo /_/zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung ste/_stong gsum gyi stong 
[\[127a.6\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa dang /_gang yang gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad mi'i lus thob par gyur la/_de'i nang nas sems can gcig gis sems can de dag ji snyed pa de snyed la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[127a.7\]]pa'i sku'i gzugs dang /_mdog dang /_rtags dang /_dbyibs dang spyod lam du sems shing mos te mngon par sgrub la sems can gcig gis ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can de dag thams cad re res kyang de snyed la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gzugs dang /_mdog dang /_
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]rtags dang /_dbyibs dang /_spyod lam du sems shing mos te mngon par sgrub la/_sems can gcig gi sems kyi mos pa gang yin pa de sems can gnyis pa'i ma yin te/_zhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs des na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can de dag thams cad kyi sems 
[\[127b.2\]]kyi mos pa tshim par mdzad de/_ji ltar mos pa bzhin du sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gzugs dang /_mdog dang /_rtags dang /_dbyibs dang /_spyod lam du shes mod kyi/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'am/_thugs kyi mdzad pa ni ma yin te/_de bzhin 
[\[127b.3\]]gshegs pa sngon gyi spyod pa yongs su sbyangs pa'i khyad par gyis lhun gyis grub pas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa tshim par mdzad pa'i gzugs dang /_mdog dang /_rtags dang /_dbyibs dang /_spyod lam gyis kun du bzhugs so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta 
[\[127b.4\]]ste dper na/_me long gi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa la gzugs su snang ba ci 'dra ba nye bar gzhag pa de 'dra ba nyid kyi gzugs brnyan de na lhag chad med par mtshungs par snang yang me long gi dkyil 'khor ni mi sems mi rtog go_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[127b.5\]]yang mi dgongs mi rtog par lhun gyis grub pas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa'i rnam par rig pa tshim par mdzad de/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni phung pos rab tu 
[\[127b.6\]]phye ba ma yin/_khams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/_skye mched kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/_las las byung ba ma yin/_nyon mongs pa las byung ba ma yin/_pha ma las byung ba ma yin/_'byung ba chen po'i nur nur po las byung ba ma yin/_sha dang khrag gis g.yogs pa ma yin/_
[\[127b.7\]]dus pa dang chu ba'i bog des sbrel ba ma yin/_dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dang /_srog dang 'brel pa ma yin te/_zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sku med pa ste/_chos kyi sku dang /_gzugs dang mtshan ma med pa'i sku dang /_spros pa med cing rgyu ba med pa'i sku yin yang de 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]gzugs dang mtshan gtso bor byed pa'i sems can sku bstan pas 'dul ba rnams kyi mig la snang bar 'gyur ro/_/gzugs las dben pa chos kyi mtshan nyid gtso bor byed pa'i sems can rnams la ni lha'i mig gis kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du bltar snang 
[\[128a.2\]]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de la 'khor gcig tu 'dus pa'i sems can gyi nang nas kyang kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong /_kha cig gis ni mi mthong /_kha cig gis ni rgyang ring po na 'dug kyang mthong /_kha cig gis ni nye ba na 'dug kyang mi mthong /_kha cig 
[\[128a.3\]]gis ni thag ring po na 'dug kyang mthong /_/kha cig gis ni nye ba na 'dug kyang mi mthong ngo /_/la las ni dran pa'i rnam pas mthong la g.yeng ba'i rnam pas mi mthong ngo /_/la las ni g.yeng ba'i rnam pas mthong la dran pa'i rnam pas mi mthong ngo /_/la las ni gzhan gyis nye bar 
[\[128a.4\]]bstan pas mthong zhing bdag gis bltas pas mi mthong ngo /_/la las ni bdag gis bltas pas mthong la gzhan gyis bstan pas mi mthong ngo /_/la las ni rmi lam na mthong la sad pa na mi mthong ngo /_/la las ni sad pa na mthong la rmi lam na mi mthong ngo /_/la las ni mnyam 
[\[128a.5\]]par bzhag na mthong la langs na mi mthong ngo /_/la las ni langs na mthong la mnyam par bzhag na mi mthong ngo /_/la las ni sdug pa'i rnam par mthong la mi sdug pa'i rnam par ma yin no/_/la las ni mi sdug pa'i rnam par mthong la sdug pa'i rnam par ma yin no/_/la las ni 
[\[128a.6\]]ma btsal bas mi mthong la btsal bas mthong ngo /_/la las ni ma btsal bas mthong la btsal bas mi mthong ngo /_/la las ni bsgrims na mthong la ma bsgrims nam yin no/_/la las ni ma bsgrims na mthong la bsgrims nam yin no/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[128a.7\]]sku ni 'di dag dang /_gzhan yang tshad med pa'i rnam par ston par mdzad do/_/gang yang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu lus dang /_spyod pa dang spyod lam rab tu zhi ba/_mnyam par bzhag pa/_lus zhi ba dul ba de dag gi mig kyang 'khrul par 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]pa'i sku la dpag par bya ba 'am/_mtshan ma gzung bar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni kha dog tha dad pas tshad med pa'o/_/chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba'i phyir nam mkha' dang mtshungs so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros nam mkhas ji tsam du khyab pa 
[\[128b.2\]]de tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus khyab bo/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni spros pa 
[\[128b.3\]]med pa'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang spros pa mi mnga' ba'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' ni sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang sems can thams cad 
[\[128b.4\]]kyi nye bar 'tsho ba'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang 'gyur ba mi mnga' zhing rnam par rtog pa mi mnga'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni 
[\[128b.5\]]gzugs su snang ba thams cad du zhugs pa'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang sems can du snang ba thams cad du zhugs pa'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i nang du ni gzugs su snang ba thams cad 'dus so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 
[\[128b.6\]]de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du yang sems can du snang ba thams cad 'dus so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la ni rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal thams cad rnam par 'phel lo/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin 
[\[128b.7\]]gshegs pa'i sku las kyang sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtswa ba dag rnam par 'phel lo/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni rtag pa yang ma yin/_mi rtag pa yang ma yin te cir yang brjod pa ma yin no/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]sku yang rtag pa yang ma yin/_mi rtag pa yang ma yin te/_cir yang brjod pa ma yin no/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni sbyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba ste/_zhi ba'i blo gros gang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[129a.2\]]pa'i spyi gtsug mthong bar nus pa de ni kho bos lha dang bcas pa dang /_bdud dang bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ma mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_zhi ba'i blo gros kho 
[\[129a.3\]]bos 'di ltar mngon par shes te/_bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas grong khyer bA ra NA sI na drang srong lhung ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na bzhugs pa'i dus gcig na shar phyogs logs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i 
[\[129a.4\]]mdog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dgra 'dul nas byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang zhes bya ba de bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/_des 
[\[129a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang 'di snyam du sems te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni spyi gtsug bltar 
[\[129a.6\]]mi mthong la sku tshad med cing mtha' yas kyang /_bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad dang mtha' yongs su btsal bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang gis rang gi lus dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du byin gyis brlabs te/_de bzhin 
[\[129a.7\]]gshegs pa'i sku la bltas nas des de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad par mthong nas des 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag ni mngon par shes pa thob pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas rnam par rtse ba yin gyis bdag gis de bas kyang rgya cher de bzhin 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad btsal bar bya'o snyam nas de sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas steng gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed 'das te 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma can zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin 
[\[129b.2\]]gshegs pa pad ma'i dpal gyi rgyal po'i snying po zhes bya ba da lta na bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/_chos kyang ston pa der byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang phyin nas de 'jig rten gyi khams der gnas kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug mthong bar ma nus shing /_
[\[129b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad dam mtha' yang ma dmigs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i dpal gyi rgyal po'i snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i dpal gyi rgyal po'i snying po de'i 
[\[129b.4\]]zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan bdun bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/_des bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag thag ji srid cig nas mchis/_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs 
[\[129b.5\]]kyi bu gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa nas khyod 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag thag ring mo zhig nas mchis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[129b.6\]]gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i dbu'i gtsug mthong bar yang rngo ma thog la/_sku'i tshad dam mtha' rtogs par yang rngo ma thog lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod gal te shugs 'di nyid dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pa 'di nyid kyis gang 
[\[129b.7\]]gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par steng gi phyogs logs su song du zin kyang bcom ldan 'das de'i sku'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu gang yang dpe gzhag pa ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dper bya ba 'am/_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang /_sku dang gsung dang thugs dang /_gzugs dang mtshan gyi dper bya ba'i dpe dgod pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skur ba 'debs pa'o/_/dpe gcig ni ma gtogs te/_
[\[130a.2\]]'di ltar dpe nam mkha'o/_/nam mkha' ji tsam par de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyang de tsam mo/_/ting nge 'dzin kyang de tsam mo/_/shes rab kyang de tsam mo/_/rnam par grol ba yang de tsam mo/_/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang de tsam mo/_/sku yang 
[\[130a.3\]]de tsam mo/_/gsung yang de tsam mo/_/thugs kyang de tsam mo/_/gzugs kyang de tsam mo/_/mtshan kyang de tsam mo/_/de bas na nam mkha' tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshad med par khong du chud par bya'o zhes bstan to/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems 
[\[130a.4\]]dpa' shugs 'chang gis bcom ldan 'das de las bstan pa 'di thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/_tshim zhing mgul yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan bdun bskor ba byas nas 
[\[130a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid nas mi snang bar gyur pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sems kyi rnam par rtog pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar phyin te/_des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[130a.6\]]la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/nam mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra ba yi/_/sangs rgyas chos la mi gang zhig_/pha rol 
[\[130a.7\]]tu ni mchi 'tshal ba/_/de ni nyam thag 'gyur ba lags/_/sangs rgyas sku ni blta slad du/_/gang gA bye ba phrag brgya yi/_/bye ma ji snyed de snyed kyi/_/zhing rnams su ni bdag mchis so/_/de snyed zhing du mchis nas ni/_/pad ma can gyi zhing du mchis/_/'on kyang khyod kyi dbu 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]gtsug dang /_/sku yi tshad kyang ma mthong lags/_/zhing de na ni 'dren bzhugs pa/_/mtshan ni dpal gyi snying po lags/_/de yis bdag gi bsam mkhyen nas/_/'di skad du ni bka' stsal to/_/la las sangs rgyas chos rnams la/_/dpe dgod ji snyed byed pa ni/_/
[\[130b.2\]]de dag sangs rgyas mi 'tsham ste/_/de dag rgyal la skur pa 'debs/_/'di la dpe gcig yang dag ste/_/nam mkha'i khams su bstan pa lags/_/de ni sangs rgyas chos dang 'thun/_/gang na 'ang de yi tshad ma mchis/_/nam mkha' 'di ni ji tsam par/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[130b.3\]]gyi ni tshul khrims dang /_/ting nge 'dzin dang rnam grol dang /_/rnam grol ye shes mthong de tsam/_/nam mkha'i tshad ni ji tsam pa/_/sangs rgyas gzugs kyang de tsam ste/_/'jig rten mgon po'i dbu gtsug kyang /_/nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs pa lags/_/nam mkhas 
[\[130b.4\]]ji snyed khyab gyur pa/_/skus kyang de snyed khyab pa lags/_/sku yis ji snyed khyab gyur pa/_/'od kyis kyang ni de snyed khyab/_/'od kyis ji snyed khyab gyur pa/_/gsung gis kyang ni de snyed khyab/_/gsung gis ji snyed khyab gyur pa/_/thugs kyis kyang ni de snyed khyab/_/thugs kyis 
[\[130b.5\]]ji snyed khyab gyur pa/_/byams pas kyang ni de snyed khyab/_/byams pas ji snyed khyab gyur pa/_/ye shes kyis ni de snyed khyab/_/ye shes ji snyed khyab gyur pa/_/sku yis kyang ni de snyed khyab/_/gang gis byang chub blo bskyed pa/_/de snyed bsod nams khyab par bgyid/_/byang chub sems 
[\[130b.6\]]kyi bsod nams gang /_/de la gal te gzugs mchis na/_/nam mkha'i khams ni kun gang ste/_/de ni de bas lhag par 'gyur/_/sems can kun gyi bsod nams kyi/_phung po ji snyed yongs bzung ba/_/de snyed byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/byang chub sems las rab tu byung /_/
[\[130b.7\]]byang chub sems kyi bsod nams kyi/_phung po ji snyed brjod pa bas/_/dam pa'i chos ni yongs 'dzin na/_/de bas bsod nams ches mang ngo /_/dam chos 'dzin pa'i bsod nams ni/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis nan tan du/_/bskal pa bye bar brjod mdzad kyang /_/
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]mtha' mar phyin par 'gyur ma lags/_/dam pa'i chos ni 'dzin pa dang /_/byang chub sems kyi bsod nams de/_/stong pa nyid la mos pa yi/_/bcu drug cha yang mi ri lags/_/stong pa nyid la 'dir mos nas/_/byang chub sems kyang mi gtong dang /_/
[\[131a.2\]]dam pa'i chos ni 'dzin bgyid pa/_/de ni bsod nams sdud pa lags/_/byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po/_/chos kyi rtogs pa 'di thos nas/_/de yis byang chub spyad spyod cing /_/sangs rgyas yon tan thob par 'gyur/_/tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa na/_/
[\[131a.3\]]zhing rnams bye ba rab tu g.yos/_/lha ni bye ba phrag stong gis/_/rol mo sil snyan bye ba blangs/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni che ba nyid/_/shugs 'chang gis ni bshad thos nas/_/srog chags bye ba phrag stong dag_/byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[131a.4\]]gzigs pa po/_/rang byung rnams kyi gsang ba'i gnas/_/gnas 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/dpag yas bla na ma mchis lags/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o//_//bam po bzhi pa/_zhi ba'i blo gros de na sems 
[\[131a.5\]]can du ma 'khor gcig tu 'dus pa dag las kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ngo /_/kha cig gis ni ma mthong ngo /_/de la gang dag gis mthong ba de dag ni dga' ba skyes nas lta'o/_/gang dag gis ma mthong ba de dag ni cang mi smra bar gyur cing sdod do/_/zhi ba'i 
[\[131a.6\]]blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa ni zhal zas mi gsol mod kyi sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas gsol bar mthong ngo /_/zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub kyi rim gro ba'i lha gzi brjid kyi stobs zhes bya ba dag rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs 'bring du 'brang 
[\[131a.7\]]zhing de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas snod du zed na sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pas kham tshad du blangs te gsol bar mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pas kham tshad du blangs pa de yang snod de nyid na 'dug pa de lha de dag gis khyer nas de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]'dul ba'i sems can sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_las kyi sgrib pa'i dbang gis skye gnas de dang de dag tu 'phangs pa/_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_zas mi rnyed pa/_bkres pas nyam chung bar gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bshos kyi pham babs 
[\[131b.2\]]de byin nas sems can de dag gis kyang zas de zos pa dang /_bkres skom dang bral te/_bde zhing lus tshim nas bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/gang dag log par ltung ba [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sam gshin rje'i 'jig rten na gnas 
[\[131b.3\]]pa byang chub tu sems bskyed par mi nus pa de dag la yang de nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs 'dis na yang khyod kyis ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa zhal zas mi gsol zhing de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi zhal zas can du de ltar rig par bya 
[\[131b.4\]]ste/_zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sred med kyi bu ltar mkhregs pa/_sra ba snying po can/_mi shigs pa/_rdo rje'i rang bzhin no/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ni pho ba dang long ka med do/_/rnag gam/_khrag gam/_mchi ma 'am/_ngar snabs sam/_
[\[131b.5\]]ngan skyugs sam/_mi gtsang ba med kyi zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi gar bu lta bu ste/_khong stong ma yin pa/_bu ga med pa/_kha na ma tho ba med pa'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ltar lci khyad rdo rje dang 'dra yang 'jam khyad ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde bar 
[\[131b.6\]]'gyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i che ba nyid la ltos/_zhi ba'i blo gros gang gi tshe gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba'i lha'i bu rnams dang /_lha'i bu mo rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba na/_sngon ma reg pa'i reg pa reg nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[131b.7\]]byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_/de dag nyon mongs pa skyed par mi 'gyur ba'i dus de dang tshod de yod do/_/zhi ba'i blo gros sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ma thag tu bdag nyid 'dod chags dang bral 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]bar shes so/_/zhe sdang la spyod pa gang dag gis mthong na de dag byams pa 'thob bo/_/gti mug la spyod pa gang dag gis mthong na de dag ye shes kyi snang ba 'thob bo/_/cha mnyam pa la spyod pa gang dag gis mthong na de dag nyon mongs pa dang bral bar shes so/_/
[\[132a.2\]]ser sna can gang dag gis mthong na de dag gtong ba la mos par 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa gang dag gis mthong na de dag tshul khrims la mos par 'gyur ro/_/gnod sems can gang dag gis mthong na de dag bzod pa 'thob bo/_/le lo can gang dag gis mthong na de 
[\[132a.3\]]dag brtson 'grus la mos par 'gyur ro/_/sems g.yeng ba gang dag gis mthong na de dag ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/_/shes rab 'chal pa gang dag gis mthong na de dag shes rab la mos par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu mdor na sems can dkar po'i chos gang dang gang dag 
[\[132a.4\]]dang bral ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba de dang de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ma thag tu mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad rgyun chad nas dge ba'i sems la rab tu gnas par 'gyur te de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing 
[\[132a.5\]]btang snyoms pa ste/_zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros/_de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa gang sprul pa de yang lhun gyis 'grub cing sgrim pa mi mnga' ba dang /_mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas mdzad de de bzhin 
[\[132a.6\]]gshegs pa 'di snyam du ngas sprul pa dag sprul to/_/sprul lo/_/sprul par bya'o snyam du mi dgongs mod kyi 'on kyang sprul pas 'dul ba'i sems can ji snyed par 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa brgya stong de dang de dag tu sems can yongs 
[\[132a.7\]]su smin par mdzad pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa de snyed du bzhud de/_zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i don du sku las 'od kha dog du ma/_kha dog tha dad pa/_
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]kha dog brgya stong pa gang phyung ste/_'od des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bar byed pa de yang lhun gyis grub cing sgrim pa mi mnga' ba dang /_mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas mdzad de/_zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba dang /_
[\[132b.2\]]sku'i phrin las te/_sku'i phrin las yongs su dag pa la 'jug pa cung zad tsam zhig bstan du zad kyi bskal pa 'am/_de bas lhag par brjod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phrin las yongs su dag pa'i yon tan bsngags pa'i mthar phyin par mi nus so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang 
[\[132b.3\]]ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags khris ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des kyang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[132b.4\]]pa dang /_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la lha dang mi'i me tog rnams kyis mngon par gtor to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i spyi bo la bzhag nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na 
[\[132b.5\]]rdo rje khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa 'di legs par smras pa legs so legs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pas kyang gnang zhing rjes su dgyes so/_/legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//
[\[132b.6\]]gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba dang /_gsung gi phrin las yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_zhi ba'i blo gros gang gi 
[\[132b.7\]]nub mo de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas pa dang /_gang gi nub mo len pa mi mnga' bar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pas tha na yi ge'i 'bru gcig kyang ma gsungs so/_/gsung 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la dbugs 'byung ba 'am rngub pa mi mnga'o/_/rnam par mi rtog go_/rnam par mi dpyod do/_/rnam par rtog pa dang rnam 
[\[133a.2\]]par dpyod pa med pa na ngag mi 'byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de yang rnam par mi rtog_/rnam par mi dpyod/_rtog par mi mdzad/_rnam par rtog par mi mdzad/_mi gsung /_mi rjod/_gsung bar mi mdzad kyang sems can rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[133a.3\]]pa ni gsung ngo snyam mo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa ste/_yi ge'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam par rig par mi mdzad kyang sems can yi ge lhur len pa rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag 
[\[133a.4\]]cag la chos ston to/_/bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa kun shes so snyam mo/_/de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par mi rtog cing btang snyoms su mdzad do/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems dang /_sgros dang /_zhal gyi rkan dang /_
[\[133a.5\]]ljags dang /_zhal gyi sgo nas sgra 'byung ba yang med la 'byung bar yang grag go_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi sgra 'byung ba de ni nam mkha' las 'byung na sems can rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_sgra 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung ngo snyam mo/_/
[\[133a.6\]]zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi dang ldan par 'byung ste/_rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mnyen pa'i gsung 'byung ba dang /_'jam pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba dang /_yid du 'thad pa dang /_dag pa dang /_dri ma med pa dang /_
[\[133a.7\]]'od gsal ba dang /_snyan cing 'jebs pa dang /_mnyan par 'os pa dang /_mi tshugs pa dang /_snyan pa dang /_dul ba dang /_mi rtsub pa dang /_mi brlang ba dang /_rab tu dul ba dang /_rnar snyan pa dang /_lus sim par byed pa dang /_sems tshim par byed pa dang /_
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]snying dga' bar byed pa dang /_dga' bde skyed pa dang /_yongs su gdung ba med pa dang /_kun du shes par bya ba dang /_rnam par rig par bya ba dang /_rnam par gsal ba dang /_dga' bar byed pa dang /_mngon par dga' bar byed pa dang /_kun shes par byed pa dang /_
[\[133b.2\]]rnam par rig par byed pa dang /_rigs pa dang 'brel pa dang /_zlos pa'i skyon med pa dang /_seng ge'i sgra'i shugs can dang /_glang po che'i sgra skad dang /_'brug gi sgra dbyangs dang /_klu'i dbang po'i sgra dang /_dri za'i glu dbyangs dang /_bya ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs dang /_tshangs 
[\[133b.3\]]pa'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa dang /_shang shang te'u'i sgra dbyangs su grag pa dang /_lha'i dbang po'i dbyangs ltar snyan pa dang /_rnga'i sgra dang /_ma khengs pa dang /_mi dma' ba dang /_sgra thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang /_tshig zur chag pa med pa dang /_ma tshang ba med pa dang /_
[\[133b.4\]]ma zhum pa dang /_mi zhan pa dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_khyab pa dang /_chub pa dang /_rgyun chags pa dang /_'brel pa dang /_sgra thams cad rdzogs par byed pa dang /_dbang po thams cad tshim par byed pa dang /_ma smad pa dang /_mi 'gyur ba dang /_ma brtabs pa dang /_'khor 
[\[133b.5\]]kun du grag pa dang /_'dod chags zhi bar byed pa dang /_zhe sdang 'dul ba dang /_gti mug sel ba dang /_bdud tshar gcod pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par 'byung ba ste/_zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni yan lag drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag dang 
[\[133b.6\]]ldan par 'byung ngo /_/zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yang dag par tshim par mdzad kyang /_zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di snyam du nga mdo'i 
[\[133b.7\]]sde'am/_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde'am/_lung bstan pa'i sde'am/_tshigs su bcad pa'i sde'am/_ched du brjod pa'i sde 'am/_gleng gzhi'i sde 'am/_de lta bu byung ba'i sde 'am/_skyes pa rabs kyi sde 'am/_shin tu rgyas pa'i sde 'am/_rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde 'am/_gtan la 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]dbab par bstan pa'i sde'am/_dpe 'am/_sngon gyi tshul lam/_rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde 'am/_kun tu bsnyad pa 'di ston to zhe 'am/_rab tu gsal bar mdzad do zhe 'am/_rab tu shes par mdzad do zhe 'am/_rab tu 'jog go zhe 'am/_rnam 
[\[134a.2\]]par 'byed do zhe 'am/_rnam par 'grel to zhe 'am/_rjod do zhe 'am/_yang dag par bsgrags par mdzad do snyam du mi dgongs so/_/de lta mod kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa ci 'dra ba dge slong gi 'khor ram/_dge slong ma'i 'khor ram/_dge bsnyen gyi 'khor ram/_
[\[134a.3\]]dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor ram/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor kyang rung ste/_der de dag gi dbang po'i rim pa dang /_de dag ci 'dra ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa thos pas dgos par 'gyur 
[\[134a.4\]]ba de 'dra ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa thos pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar shes kyang chos bstan pa de ni phan tshun gyi nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa la gnod pa med par thams cad kyang rang rang gi chos rnam par rig pa kun tu shes te/_zhi ba'i blo gros/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[134a.5\]]gsung gi gsang ba'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros/_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa dag gi spyod pa tshad med pa gsung na/_sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong zhes 'byung ba ni/_sems can dbang po mthu chung ba rnams gzud pa'i phyir bstan pa 'di de bzhin 
[\[134a.6\]]gshegs pas bstan gyi/_zhi ba'i blo gros/_sems can gyi spyod pa ni tshad med de sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa rnams kyi spyod pa gang yin pa de bskal pa tsam du bshad kyang de bas lhag par 'gyur ro/_/zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams kyi gang yin pa dang /_gti mug la spyod pa 
[\[134a.7\]]rnams kyi gang yin pa dang /_sems can cha mnyam pa la spyod pa rnams kyi spyod pa gang yin pa de dag bskal pa tsam du bstan kyang de dag re re yang de bas lhag par 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros/_gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bskal pa brgya stong du 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]bzhugs pas/_sems can rnams la chos bstan pa gzhan gyi skabs mi dbye bar sems can gyi spyod pa nyid bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe mthar thug par 'gyur gyi/_sems can gyi spyod pa la mthar thug pa gang yang med do/_/sems can 
[\[134b.2\]]rnams mgo rmongs su 'ong zhes sems can gyi spyod pa de tsam du tshad med pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas tshad dang ldan par ston to/_/zhi ba'i blo gros/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni ji ltar spyod pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_sems can gyi spyod pa 
[\[134b.3\]]thams cad la 'byung ste/_zhi ba'i blo gros/_'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros/_sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su zhugs pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 
[\[134b.4\]]zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar mi shes kyi nam mkha' las 'byung bar shes so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros/_sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar shes so snyam du khyod sems na de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[134b.5\]]zhi ba'i blo gros/_sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gtsug tor nas byung bar shes pa dang /_spyi gtsug nas byung bar shes pa dang /_dbu skra rnams las byung bar shes pa dang /_phrag pa nas byung bar shes pa dang /_'phral ba dang /_
[\[134b.6\]]smin mtshams dang /_mdzod spu dang /_spyan dang /_snyan dang /_shangs dang /_'gram pa dang /_zhal dang /_mgur nas byung bar shes pa dang /_de bzhin du dpung pa dang /_phyag dang /_sor mo dang /_rtsib logs dang /_brang dang /_rgyab dang /_lte ba dang /_gsang ba'i 
[\[134b.7\]]gnas dang /_brla dang /_pus mo'i lha nga dang /_byin pa dang /_long bu dang /_zhabs kyi mthil dang /_mtshan rnams dang /_dpe byad bzang po rnams dang /_spu'i khung bu thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byung bar shes pa'i sems can kha cig yod de/_zhi ba'i 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros mos pa ji lta ba dang /_yongs su smin pa ji lta ba dang /_bsam pa ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byung bar shes kyang zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[135a.2\]]pa ni rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ste btang snyoms pa'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na rol mo sil snyan gyi 'khrul 'khor de tsam du legs par sbyar ba byas pa gang dag la lag gis ma reg par rlung gis bskyod pas sgra snyan pa 'byung ba dag kyang yod do/_/'on kyang de la sgra 'byin 
[\[135a.3\]]par spro ba ni gang yang med mod kyi yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i khyad par gyis sgra snyan pa yang 'byung ngo /_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang sems can gyi bsam pa'i shes pas bskyod na 'byung ste/_'on kyang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byin par 
[\[135a.4\]]spro ba yang mi mnga' mod kyi sngon yongs su sbyang ba mdzad pa'i khyad par gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems can thams cad kyi yul gyi rjes su 'jug par yang 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na brag cha'i sgra ni gzhan rnam par rig par byed par yang 'byung la de ni nang na 
[\[135a.5\]]yang ma yin/_phyi rol na yang ma yin/_gnyi ga med pa las kyang mi dmigs so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par rig par byed par yang 'byung la de ni nang na yang ma yin/_phyi rol na yang ma yin la gnyi ga med 
[\[135a.6\]]par yang mi dmigs so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bsam pa thams cad yongs su skong ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na sems can gang gi bsam pa ci 'dra bar gyur pa de 'dra ba'i sgra de 
[\[135a.7\]]las 'byung yang nor bu rin po che de ni rnam par mi rtog go_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rin po che lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa yang snying rje chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na sems can gang gi bsam pa ci 'dra bar gyur pa de 'dra bar 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byung bar des shes kyang de la de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing btang snyoms pa ste/_zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsung 
[\[135b.2\]]dbyangs tshad med pa ste/_zhi ba'i blo gros gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs kyi tshad dam mtha' gzung bar nus pa de ni kho bos lha dang bcas pa dang /_bdud dang bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /_lha dang 
[\[135b.3\]]mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ma mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_zhi ba'i blo gros kho bos mngon par shes te/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 'di nyid la byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing bzhugs te/_byang chub sems 
[\[135b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la brten nas dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher rab tu ston pa de mjug tu phyin pa'i dus kyi tshe tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 
[\[135b.5\]]gi dkyil 'khor ji srid cig tu ring du 'gro ba zhig bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor dpag par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po rang gi stan gyi steng nas mi snang bar gyur te/_ri rab kyi rtse mor phyin nas de de na 'dug na yang de 
[\[135b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung de 'dra ba kho nar thos so/_/rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i nub phyogs kyi ri rab las 'das shing gling bzhi pa las kyang 'das khor yug las kyang 'das te/_'jig rten gyi bar gyi khor yug gi zom la 'dug na 
[\[135b.7\]]yang bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung lhag chad med cing mnyam par de 'dra ba kho nar thos so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di snyam du dgongs te/_kye ma maud gal gyi bu 'di nga'i sgra skad dpog par 'dod kyis ngas 'di la rdzu 'phrul gyis bstang ngo snyam nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la rdzu 'phrul 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]gyis bstangs pa dang /_de sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 
[\[136a.2\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba da lta na bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhes te chos kyang ston pa der gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen pos phyin te/_de na 'dug kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi sgra skad de 'dra ba kho nar thos te/_'di lta ste dper na 'dom gang tsam gyi phyogs na 
[\[136a.3\]]'dug pa'i mis mi cig shos kyi sgra thos pa de bzhin du gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung sgra thos so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de'i sku'i khrun ni dpag tshad tsam mo/_/byang chub sems 
[\[136a.4\]]dpa' de dag gi lus kyi khrun ni dpag tshad phyed do/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi spyad par bya ba'i lhung bzed kyi rten ma gdu bu de la gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po 'chag cing 'dug go_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag rab tu dga' nas bcom ldan 'das de la 
[\[136a.5\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge sbyong gi kha dog 'dra ba'i srog chags lhung bzed kyi rten ma'i gdu bu la 'chag cing mchis pa 'di ga las mchis pa zhig bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyed 'di la brnyas pa'i sems ma skyed cig_/de ci'i 
[\[136a.6\]]phyir zhe na/_'di ni gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po zhes bya ste/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i nyan thos kyi mchog go_/nyan thos chen po rnams kyi nang na rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog go_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal pos maud gal 
[\[136a.7\]]gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/maud gal gyi bu khyod la byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag khyad du gsod kyis/_khyod kyis 'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de nyid kyi byin gyi 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]rlabs kyis rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ston cig_/de nas gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan bdun bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rin 
[\[136b.2\]]po che'i gling 'di skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par bgyi'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na gyis shig_/de nas gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po steng gi nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun tsam gyi gong du mngon par 'phags te/_rin 
[\[136b.3\]]po che'i gling de skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par byas so/_/skyil mo krung de las kyang mu tig gi rgyan phreng bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mngon par 'phyang ngo /_/mu tig gi rgyan phreng gi 'bru thams cad las kyang 'od zer brgya stong byung ngo /_/'od zer de dag thams cad kyi rtse mo 
[\[136b.4\]]dag las kyang pad ma rnams byung ngo /_/pad ma thams cad kyi snying po rnams la yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs bzhugs par snang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya 
[\[136b.5\]]thub pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs las brtsams te bsngags pa gsung ngo /_/de nas gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 
[\[136b.6\]]skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_de ltar stong dang stong gnyis pa khyab par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_
[\[136b.7\]]maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na gyis shig_/de nas gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phrul de bsdus te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das de la 'di 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di ci zhig gi slad du 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mchis/_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal ba/_rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 
[\[137a.2\]]'khor shes par 'dod nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das des gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/maud gal gyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa gsung dbyangs tshad med pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor shes 
[\[137a.3\]]par 'dod pas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin gyi/_khyod kyis lan gnyis su de lta bu'i sems ma skyed cig_/gal te maud gal gyi bu khyod shugs 'di nyid dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs 'di nyid kyis nub phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par song yang khyod 
[\[137a.4\]]kyis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de ltar gsung dbyangs tshad med pa dang ldan no/_/de nas gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 
[\[137a.5\]]'tshal te/_nyes pa bshags pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs tshad ma mchis pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor rtogs par 'tshal bas bdag ni nongs pa can te nongs pa 'chags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ji srid cig gnas mchis/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[137a.6\]]des bka' stsal pa/_'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa nas khyod 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so/_/maud gal gyi bus gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ring mo zhig nas mchis pas lus dub ste/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der 
[\[137a.7\]]mchi ba'i rngo mi thog go_/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin snyam du sems na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyod ni bcom ldan 'das 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]shAkya thub pa de nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin gyis/_khyod bcom ldan 'das de nyid la phyag 'tshol cig dang /_de nyid kyis khyod slar khrid par 'gyur ro/_/maud gal gyi bu gal te khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams der 'gro na 
[\[137b.2\]]ni bskal pa srid kyis kyang phyin par mi nus te/_'jig rten gyi khams der ma phyin par bar du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/maud gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_shar ram/_lho 'am/_nub bam/_byang ngam/_phyogs gang zhig tu phyin/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[137b.3\]]ldan 'das bdag phyogs bslad de gang nas 'dir mchis pa ma 'tshal to/_/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_gal te khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams der 'gro na 
[\[137b.4\]]ni bskal pas kyang phyin par mi nus so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhugs/_bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni shar phyogs logs na bzhugs so/_/de nas 
[\[137b.5\]]gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen pos de'i tshe yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te/_shar phyogs su phyag 'tshal nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/mthu chen mnga' ba lha dang mis mchod pa/_/ye shes mtha' yas mtha' yas gsung ldan pa/_/rkang gnyis rnams kyi dam 
[\[137b.6\]]pa dgongs su gsol/_/slar yang zhing der rab tu mchi bar bgyi/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gnas pa des gnas brtan maud gal gyi bus gsol ba btab pa'i sgra de thos 
[\[137b.7\]]so/_/thos nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gsol ba 'debs pa 'di su zhig lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'di ni maud gal gyi bu ste/_
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das par song ste/_'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar bcom ldan 'das 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 
[\[138a.2\]]gnas te de 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ong bar 'dod nas gsol ba 'debs pa'i sgra de lta bu phyung ngo /_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das maud gal gyi bu chen po ci'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams der mchis/_bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo maud gal gyi 
[\[138a.3\]]bu 'dir slar 'ongs pa dang 'di nyid du thos par 'gyur ro/_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 
[\[138a.4\]]zer gyi rgyal po de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po blta bar 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor des gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas mdzod spu nas thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 
[\[138a.5\]]phyung ste 'od zer des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed po de dag las thal te 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan de snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/de na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan de dang /_
[\[138a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs pa mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[138a.7\]]maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i rjes su 'brangs te shog shig_/de nas gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la brten te/_sems kyi rnam par rtog pa tsam gyis 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar phyin nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan bdun bskor ba byas nas spyan sngar yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas nyes pa bshags pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[138b.2\]]bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs tshad ma mchis pa'i gsung dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rtogs par 'tshal nas de srid du ring du mchis pas bdag nongs pa can te nongs pa 'chags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de srid du ring du mchis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni 'di 
[\[138b.3\]]na ji tsam pa de tsam lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu chen po ji skad smras pa de de bzhin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la ni tshad gang yang med de/_maud gal gyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi tshad dam mtha' yongs su 
[\[138b.4\]]tshol bar sems pa de ni nam mkha'i tshad dam/_mtha' yongs su tshol bar sems pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nam mkha' ji tsam du khyab pa de tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gis khyab bo/_/gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po 'gro ba dang /_'ong ba'i le'u 'di 
[\[138b.5\]]bshad pa na srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ji snyam du sems/_sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 
[\[138b.6\]]'jug pa gang dag yin pa de dag ci mang ba yin nam/_zhi ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems can gcig gi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen por gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas 
[\[138b.7\]]su gyur pa rnams kyis bskal par yang bsam pa'am/_gzhal ba 'am/_brtsi ba'am/_brtag par mi nus na/_sems can thams cad kyi lta smos kyang ci dgos/_lag na rdo rjes smras pa/_zhi ba'i blo gros khyod mos par bya'o/_/khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o/_/sems 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa ji snyed par 'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i gsung gi yan lag gi rnam pa yang de snyed du 'byung ste/_de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni 
[\[139a.2\]]rnam par mi rtog cing /_btang snyoms pa'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_stong gsum sems can gang yin pa/_/de dag rang rgyal 'dren gyur pas/_/bskal par sems can gcig cig gi_/sems kyi khams kyang mi shes so/_/sems can gcig yid ji snyed pa/_/
[\[139a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyis ni rab mkhyen kyang /_/nga yis yid 'di shes so zhes/_/de ni rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/dus gsum sems can thams cad kyi/_sems pa dag ni ji snyed pa/_/'jig rten mgon po chos ston tshe/_/dbyangs kyi yan lag de snyed do/_/chos kyi bdag po gsung 
[\[139a.4\]]ba na/_/dbyangs kyi yan lag ji snyed pa/_/chos kyi ming gis bshad pa yi/_/chos bstan pa yang de tsam mo/_/sems can kun gyi gzugs dang ni/_/ming dang sems pa ji snyed pa/_/sems can snying po'i spu gcig nas/_/'od zer 'byung ba de snyed do/_/'jig rten 
[\[139a.5\]]mgon po'i spu kun gyi/_/'od zer dag ni ji snyed pa/_/mi yi dbang po chos ston tshe/_/gsung gi yan lag de bas mang /_/dpe bkod nas ni sangs rgyas kyis/_/bskal par rab tu bstan mdzad kyang /_/sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung dbyangs kyi/_mtha' ma rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[139a.6\]]nyon mongs gzugs can ma yin rnams/_/gzugs can min pa'i tshig gis brjod/_gzugs can min pa'i tshig gis ni/_/nyon mongs gzugs med zhi bar byed/_/ji ltar tshig ni gzugs med pa/_/thams cad du ni mi dmigs te/_/de ltar nyon mongs gzugs med pa/_/
[\[139a.7\]]shin tu dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar tshig ni yod min te/_/nang dang phyi rol mi gnas pa/_/de ltar nyon mongs rnams med cing /_/nang dang phyi rol mi gnas so/_/ji ltar phyogs bcur sangs rgyas gsungs/_/gang yang rnyed par mi 'gyur ba/_/de ltar nyon mongs mi dmigs 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]kyang /_/de ni tshig gis brjod pa yin/_/sems can dag ni kun gyi tshig_/rab 'bring tha ma gang yin pa/_/de dag lus dang sems mi gnas/_/gnas pa med pa'ang ma yin no/_/ji ltar sil snyan 'khrul 'khor byas/_/rlung gis bskyod nas sgra 'byung ba/_/sgra 
[\[139b.2\]]'byin byed pa gang yang med/_/'on kyang sgra rnams de dag 'byung /_/de ltar sngon chad rnam dag phyir/_/sems can kun gyi bsam pas bskyod/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung 'byung yang /_/'di la de ni rtog mi mnga'/_/ji ltar brag cha rnams kyi sgra/_/nang dang phyi rol mi 
[\[139b.3\]]gnas pa/_/de ltar mi yi dbang po'i gsung /_/nang dang phyi rol mi gnas so/_/ji ltar rin chen mi rtog par/_/snang bas sems can tshim byed pa/_/de ltar rgyal ba mi rtog gsung /_/sgra kun rab tu rdzogs par byed/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[139b.4\]]pa'i gsung gi gsang ba ni sems can thams cad kyi skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston par khong du chud par bya'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na skye ba'i gnas tha dad pa dag yod pa rnams su de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[139b.5\]]sems can rnams kyi skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du bden pa rnams kyi ming tha dad pa dag gis rnam par gzhag go_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'dir sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba 
[\[139b.6\]]gang yin pa de sa bla pa'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/_za ba dang /_za ba'i rtsa ba dang /_za ba sel dang /_za ba 'gog byed ces bya'o/_/'dir sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 
[\[139b.7\]]zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/_bar snang gi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/_'jug pa dang /_kun tu 'jug byed pa dang /_kun tu 'jug bral dang /_kun tu 'jug sgrol zhes bya'o/_/'dir sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/_'byung ba dang /_dpog pa dang /_sreg pa dang /_'jig byed ces bya'o/_/'dir sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_
[\[140a.2\]]sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/_'khor ba dang /_kun snyen dang /_zad pa dang /_zad pa ldog byed ces bya'o/_/'dir sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal 
[\[140a.3\]]kun 'byung ba dang /_/sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/_gnod pa dang /_gnod pa snyen dang /_gnod pa zad dang /_gnod pa zad par sgom pa zhes bya'o/_/'dir sdug 
[\[140a.4\]]bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/_shin tu mi srun dang /_mi srun rtsa ba dang /_ldog pa dang /_yang dag par ldog byed ces bya'o/_/
[\[140a.5\]]'dir sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/_rkyal pa dang /_kun tu rgyal byed dang /_rkyal zad dang /_rkyal zad sgo zhes 
[\[140a.6\]]bya'o/_/'dir sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/_ha ha ho dang /_ha ha thob byed dang /_ha ha bral dang /_
[\[140a.7\]]ha ha bral byed ces bya'o/_/'dir sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/_me mur dang /_me mur gnod dang /_me mur 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]'dor 'dod dang /_me mur sgrol zhes bya'o/_/'dir sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de tshangs pa'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/_sdug pa dang /_sdug byed dang /_
[\[140b.2\]]sdug pa nyal dang /_sdug par 'khor zhes bya'o/_/'dir sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/_'dzag pa dang /_
[\[140b.3\]]kun tu 'dzag byed dang /_rgyun gcod dang /_shin tu 'byung zhes bya'o/_/'dir sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don gyi lha rnams kyi 'di 
[\[140b.4\]]skad ces bya ste/_rma dang /_rma'i mtshams sbyor ba dang /_rma rub dang /_rma nye bar zhi byed ces bya'o/_/'dir sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 
[\[140b.5\]]zhes bya ba gang yin pa de tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/_rkyal byed dang /_rnam par rkyal byed dang /_rkyal pa mthar byed dang /_byed pa thob byed ces bya'o/_/'dir sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 
[\[140b.6\]]zhes bya ba gang yin pa de 'od chung gi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/_ha hi dang /_he hi dang /_hu hu dang /_ha ra nu san d+hi zhes bya'o/_/'dir sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang 
[\[140b.7\]]yin pa de dge chung gi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/_o hi ta dang /_ni ba hi ta dang /_ni ga k+Shi ta dang /_ni ga ma ni zhes bya'o/_/'dir sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]pa de tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/_sten pa dang /_yang dag par sten pa dang /_zad pa sten pa dang /_kun tu sten pa zhes bya'o/_/'dir sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 
[\[141a.2\]]'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/_yongs gcod dang /_yongs gcod 'byung dang /_khyim mtha' dang /_rtag tu rnam dag ces bya'o/_/'dir sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug 
[\[141a.3\]]bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de mi che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/_rjes su 'gro ba dang /_mi 'ong ma yin pa dang /_rjes kyi mtshams dang /_rjes kyi mtshams 'gro zhes bya'o/_/'dir sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 
[\[141a.4\]]dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/_dag pa dang /_dag pa can dang /_dag pa yongs dag dang /_dag pa 'gro zhes bya'o/_/'dir sdug bsngal dang /_sdug 
[\[141a.5\]]bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de gya nom snang gi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/_ma ma ma ma dang /_ma ma ma me dang /_ma na nu na ya dang /_ma na nu ga ma zhes bya'o/_/'dir sdug bsngal dang /_sdug 
[\[141a.6\]]bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de shin tu mthong gi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/_grol ba dang /_grol ba can dang /_grol ba'i rtsa ba dang /_grol ba'i bye brag phyed par mtshams sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/'dir sdug 
[\[141a.7\]]bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/_mi bya ba dang /_mi byed pa dang /_byed bral dang /_byed pa mthar thug ces bya'o/_/'dir sdug 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de gnas gtsang ma'i ris 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/_mthar thug dang /_shin tu mthar thug dang /_mi rtog pa dang /_nying 
[\[141b.2\]]mtshams sbyor ba med pa zhes bya'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar ji ltar lha rnams kyi bden pa rnam par gzhag pa de bzhin du klu rnams kyi yang gzhan no/_/gnod sbyin rnams kyi yang gzhan no/_/dri za rnams kyi yang gzhan no/_/lha ma yin rnams kyi yang gzhan no/_/nam mkha' lding 
[\[141b.3\]]rnams kyi yang gzhan no/_/mi 'am ci rnams kyi yang gzhan no/_/lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi yang gzhan no/_/gnod sbyin lag na gzhong thogs rnams kyi yang gzhan no/_/phreng thogs rnams kyi bden pa rnam par gzhag pa yang gzhan yin no/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gang yul chen po bcu 
[\[141b.4\]]drug tu bsdu bas bsdus pa'i yul stong gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di yongs su gang ste/_gang na mi rnams kyi tshig kyang gzhan/_nges pa'i tshig kyang gzhan/_brda yang tha dad pa der yang de bzhin gshegs pas skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du ming tha dad pa rnams kyis bden pa dag rnam 
[\[141b.5\]]par bkod de/_'di lta ste/_yul ka sha dang /_pa hu pa dang /_tho gar yul dang /_ya ba na dang /_kam po dza dang /_kha sha dang /_hu na dang /_rgya yul dang /_da ra ta dang /_u ra sha dang /_pi lin dang /_po ma dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_
[\[141b.6\]]da tsi pa dang /_ki ra ta dang /_pu lin ta dang /_pun dra dang /_ku ru na dang /_lnga len dang /_shar phyogs dang /_phu ru ra ba dang /_lho phyogs dang /_ka ling ka dang /_gcer bu dang /_ba na sa ka dang /_ba na ta dang /_sbal ka dang /_khyi gdong dang /_wa gdong dang /_kri ba sha'i gdong dang /_spyi'u tshugs 
[\[141b.7\]]pa dang /_gnam gdong po dang /_phyi phyogs gdong dang /_byang mtshams gdong dang /_rjes su rgyug dang /_rgya mtsho khol ba dang /_yul mthas gtugs pa dang /_ang ku ra dang /_mang gur dang /_sna med dang /_glo bkra dang /_phyogs kyi gcer bu dang /_gshog thogs gcer bu dang /_
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]dgus te 'gro dang /_rdzogs byed rnam pa dang /_'jig rten gyi bar na gnas pa'i yul la sogs pa yul stong gis 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su gang ste/_zhi ba'i blo gros gang na mi rnams kyi tshig dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang /_brda tha dad pa der yang de bzhin 
[\[142a.2\]]gshegs pas skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du ming tha dad pa rnams kyis bden pa dag bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma yin zhing /_rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba ma yin pa 'byung ngo /_/zhi ba'i blo gros stong gi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[142a.3\]]khams 'di na bden pa ming tha dad pas bstan pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi yod de bden pa bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/_don dam pa'i bden pa dang /_skye ba med pa'i bden pa dang /_ji lta ba bzhin gyi bden pa dang /_mi 'khrugs pa'i bden par don 
[\[142a.4\]]gcig tu yang dag par 'dus te/_zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o//_//bam po lnga pa/_zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni sems can thams cad kyi dogs pa gcod pa/_sems can thams cad 
[\[142a.5\]]kyi som nyi sel ba'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can ji snyed yod pa/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mkhyen pa'i sems can gyi khams ni ches mang gi_/sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin no 
[\[142a.6\]]zhes bya ste/_zhi ba'i blo gros yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung nas sems can de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/_zhi ba'i blo gros sems can thams cad 'di lta ste/_gnas brtan shwa ra dwa ti'i bu'i shes rab dang /_ye shes de lta bu dang ldan par gyur la/_shA 
[\[142a.7\]]ri'i bu lta bu'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi shes rab dang /_ye shes gang yin pa'i shes rab dang /_ye shes de sems can gcig dang ldan par gyur cing rnam grangs 'dis sems can thams cad shes rab dang /_ye shes de lta bu dang ldan par gyur la/_zhi ba'i blo gros sems 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]can de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par the tsom gyi dri ba bsams shing gzhal te/_yongs su bcal la/_sems can gcig gi the tshom dri ba gang yin pa de gnyis pa'i ma yin zhing /_zhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs 'dis sems can thams cad kyis the tsom gyi 
[\[142b.2\]]dri ba tha dad pa bsams te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du dong nas se gol gtogs pa srid la the tshom gyi dri ba de dag gsol kyang des sems can gcig gi rjes su zhugs pa'i dran pas thams cad bzung nas gsung brjod pa gcig gis de dag gi the tsom gyi dri ba thams cad gcod de/_de dag 
[\[142b.3\]]thams cad kyang rang rang gi the tsom gyi dri ba khyad par shes shing bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung bstan pas thams cad kyang sems rangs par 'gyur te/_zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni sems can thams cad kyi dogs pa gcod cing sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[142b.4\]]som nyi sel kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni de la thugs kyis mdzad pa'am/_gsung du brjod pa yang mi mnga' la mdzad pa de yang mdzad de/_zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o/_/'di ni gsung rmad du byung ba'o/_/'di ni gsung yongs su dag pa'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[142b.5\]]gshegs pa'i gsung ngo mtshar can dang gsung gi gsang ba 'di gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bshad pa'i tshe srog chags sum khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[142b.6\]]zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thad na tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir me tog rnams kyis kyang gtor/_rin po che'i gdugs rnams kyang gtong ngo /_/de nas me tog 
[\[142b.7\]]de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la yang phog_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i lus la yang phog cing 'khor thams cad la yang 'thor ro/_/rin po che'i gdugs de dag kyang bar snang la gnas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng na 'dug go_/rin po che'i gdugs de dag 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]las kyang bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyi ba dang /_des de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rmad du byung ba 'di bstan pas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje rjes su gzung ba'i slad du bskal pa bzang po ba'i byang chub sems 
[\[143a.2\]]dpa' rnams kyis btang ba lags so zhes sgra byung ngo /_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal zhing gus pa cher bskyed de/_/tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo 
[\[143a.3\]]rje mthong ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di thos pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/gang dag bstan pa 'di thos nas mos shing som nyi za bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni don yod pa'i mi nyid rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni de 
[\[143a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pas 'dul bar 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro zhes smras so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo 
[\[143a.5\]]gros la bka' stsal pa/_zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa gang yin pa de dag ni gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du 
[\[143a.6\]]bstan to/_bsnyad do/_/yang dag par bshad do/_/gang dag chos bstan pa 'di la mos pa'i sems can de dag ni ring po mi thogs par chos nyid 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_mi dngang mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur ba dang /_don rtogs 
[\[143a.7\]]pa'i rjes su rtog pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa de nyid de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bstan pa 'di bshad pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rnam pa drug tu rab tu 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]g.yos te snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/me tog gi char chen po yang bab po/_/sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra yang byung ngo /_/sems can grangs med pa dag gis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la bzod 
[\[143b.2\]]pa thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni skye ba gcig gis thogs par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin par byas so/_/de nas 'khor gyi khyams 
[\[143b.3\]]de'i dbus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chu'i rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyis sa chen po dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad pa brtol te mngon du byung bar snang ngo /_/de dag steng gi bar snang nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[143b.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad spos chus chag chag btab par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/_zhi ba'i blo gros khyod kyis chu'i rgyun mngon par 'phags pa 'di dag mthong ngam/_gsol ba/_bcom ldan 
[\[143b.5\]]'das mthong lags te 'di su'i snga ltas lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zhi ba'i blo gros chu'i rgyun 'di dag sems med kyang ji ltar 'di dag gis sa chen po brtol te mngon par 'phags pa de bzhin du gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang /_de 
[\[143b.6\]]bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i sems can de dag kyang mngon par 'phags par 'gyur te/_de dag ni ma rig pa dang /_lta bar gyur pa'i sgo glegs bcag nas chos kyi snang ba mi zad pa dang /_shes rab dang /_spobs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/des skyes bu de dag gis legs par bshad 
[\[143b.7\]]pas sems can thams cad kyi sems rnams tshim par byed par 'gyur te/_'di ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ma 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba dang /_thugs kyi phrin las yongs su dag pa 
[\[144a.2\]]gang zhe na/_zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris su sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa gcig gis bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du gnas kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi tshe'i mthar ma thug gi bar du de dag gi rnam par 
[\[144a.3\]]shes pa de rnam par shes pa gzhan gyi rjes su mi 'brang ste/_de nas shi 'phos nas las ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzin to/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa yang mi gnas pa ste gang gi nub mo byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[144a.4\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pa phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs la ldog pa mi 
[\[144a.5\]]mnga'/_thugs la rtog pa mi mnga'/_thugs la rnam par dpyod pa mi mnga'/_thugs la 'gyur ba mi mnga'/_thugs kyi tshad mi mnga'/_thugs la 'khrug pa mi mnga'/_thugs la sel ba mi mnga'/_thugs la g.yeng ba mi mnga'/_thugs la khengs pa mi mnga'/_thugs 
[\[144a.6\]]la dma' ba mi mnga'/_thugs la kun du srung ba mi mnga'/_thugs la rgyu ba mi mnga'/_thugs la shin tu rangs pa mi mnga'/_thugs la rnam par 'khrug pa mi mnga'/_thugs la 'khon du 'dzin pa mi mnga'/_thugs la g.yo ba mi mnga'/_thugs la nges par sems pa mi mnga'/_
[\[144a.7\]]thugs la dgyes pa mi mnga'/_thugs la gnod pa mi mnga'/_thugs la 'jug pa mi mnga'/_thugs la rab tu rgyu ba mi mnga'/_thugs la rtog pa mi mnga'/_thugs la rnam par rtog pa mi mnga'/_thugs la yongs su rtog pa mi mnga'/_thugs la zhi gnas mi mnga'/_thugs 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]la lhag mthong mi mnga'/_thugs rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba mi mnga'/_rang gi thugs la gnas pa mi mnga'/_gzhan gyi sems la lta ba mi mnga'/_thugs mig la gnas pa mi mnga'/_thugs rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid la gnas pa mi mnga'/_
[\[144b.2\]]thugs gzugs la gnas pa mi mnga'/_thugs sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg la gnas pa mi mnga'/_thugs chos la gnas pa mi mnga'/_thugs dmigs pa la gnas pa mi mnga'/_thugs yid la gnas pa mi mnga'/_thugs nang na gnas pa mi mnga'/_thugs phyi rol na 
[\[144b.3\]]gnas pa mi mnga'o/_/thugs de chos rnams la mi 'jug go_/thugs de ye shes la mi 'jug go_/thugs de 'das pa 'am/_ma 'ongs pa 'am/_da ltar byung ba la mi rtog go_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa ni de ltar thugs yongs su dag pa ste/_
[\[144b.4\]]thugs kyis chos gang yang mngon par mi sgrub la chos thams cad la yang de'i ye shes ma chags ma thogs pa 'jug go_/rang gi thugs yongs su dag pas sems can gang gi sems kyang yongs su ma dag par mi gzigs te/_de gzigs kyang gzigs pa ma yin zhing rnam par 
[\[144b.5\]]mi rtog go_/gzigs kyang spros par mi mdzad do/_/gzigs pas kun gzigs pa dang rnam par gzigs pa mi gzigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de ni sha'i mig gi mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/_lha'i mig gi mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/_shes rab kyi mig 
[\[144b.6\]]gi mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/_chos kyi mig gi mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi gzigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin/_lha'i rna ba'i thos pa dang ldan pa ma yin/_gzhan gyi sems la lta ba dang ldan pa ma yin/_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang ldan pa ma yin/_
[\[144b.7\]]rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba dang ldan pa ma yin/_zag pa zad pa shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin la/_de chos thams cad dang mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/_chos thams cad la chags pa med par ldan pa yin no/_/de'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rgyun rnams ni bsgrim pa mi mnga' 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]zhing lhun gyis grub la mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bar gnas so/_/sems can gyi spyod pa thams cad la yang gzigs so/_/sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba yang rab tu mkhyen to/_/de'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa 
[\[145a.2\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad mkhyen pa yang bsnyel ba mi mnga' ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni lhun gyis grub cing bsgrim pa mi mnga' la mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bar 'jug go_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems dang yid dang /_rnam par shes pa dang 
[\[145a.3\]]yang bral la ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas kyang mi 'dor ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyang mdzad la de'i chos thams cad la chags pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes kyang gang du yang mi chags so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis pa 
[\[145a.4\]]gang yin pa de la ni sems kyang mi mnga'/_yid kyang mi mnga'/_rnam par shes pa yang mi mnga'/_sku'i 'du byed kyang mi mnga'/_gsung gi 'du byed kyang mi mnga'/_thugs kyi 'du byed kyang mi mnga' mod kyi/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi mthu nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyang 
[\[145a.5\]]mdzad do/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sprul pa dang mtshungs pas mnyam mo/_/sprul pa'i chos nyid kyis rnam par mi rtog go_/de la sku'i rtsom pa dang /_gsung gi rtsom pa dang /_thugs kyi rtsom pa yang mi snang la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyang mdzad de/_
[\[145a.6\]]de yang lhun gyis grub cing bsgrim pa mi mnga' la mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas mdzad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid du chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas 
[\[145a.7\]]nas kyang sems can la thugs brtse bas de bzhin du bstan to/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ni 'dus byas la gnas pa ma yin/_'dus ma byas la gnas pa ma yin/_phung po la gnas pa ma yin/_khams la gnas pa ma yin/_skye mched la gnas pa ma yin/_
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]nang la gnas pa ma yin/_phyi rol la gnas pa ma yin/_dge ba la gnas pa ma yin/_mi dge ba la gnas pa ma yin/_'jig rten pa la gnas pa ma yin/_'jig rten las 'das pa la gnas pa ma yin/_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa la gnas pa ma yin/_kha na ma tho ba med 
[\[145b.2\]]pa la gnas pa ma yin/_zag pa dang bcas pa la gnas pa ma yin/_zag pa med pa la gnas pa ma yin/_'das pa la gnas pa ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa la gnas pa ma yin/_da ltar byung ba la gnas pa ma yin/_so sor brtags pa la gnas pa ma yin/_so sor 
[\[145b.3\]]brtags pa ma yin pa la gnas pa ma yin te/_zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gnas pa mi mnga'o/_/de chos gang yang mngon par mi sgrub la sems can la thugs brtse bas sems can thams cad kyi sems dang /_spyod pa dang /_
[\[145b.4\]]bsam pa rnams la yang de'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa mi mnga' zhing thogs pa mi mnga' ba 'jug ste/_de yang lhun gyis grub cing bsgrim pa mi mnga' la mngon par 'du bya ba mi mnga' bas 'jug go_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba ste/_mnyam 
[\[145b.5\]]par bzhag pa'i gnas kyang mi 'dor la sems can thams cad la sems rnam par rig par yang mdzad pas thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 
[\[145b.6\]]'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu dag na bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thad na da ltar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi slad 
[\[145b.7\]]na yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po mchis lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu bya ba 'di bsam gyis mi khyab kyis zhog shig_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di la mgo rmongs par 'gyur ro/_/de lta mod kyi shA ri'i bu gang dag dad cing 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa de dag gnas 'di la skrag par mi 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la yid ches par mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[146a.2\]]stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu khyod kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje rtag tu nga'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus mthong lags te/_'di bdag gis sngon ni nam yang ma mthong ngo /_/bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de 
[\[146a.3\]]bzhin du gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di ni bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyab rgyab na yang gnas te sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs dang /_mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis thams cad du yang lag na rdo rje'i gzugs su kun du ston to/_/shA ri'i bu stong 
[\[146a.4\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed 'khod pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi rgyab rgyab tu/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes lag na rdo rje'i gzugs kun du bstan kyang des ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs yongs su rdzogs par bstan par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[146a.5\]]shA ri'i bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i rgyab na lag na rdo rje 'dug pa mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis da gdod mthong lags te/_sngon ni ma mthong ngo /_/bka' stsal pa/_'di ni de'i rgyab na rtag tu gnas na khyod kyis de ma mthong ba ma gtogs par byang 
[\[146a.6\]]chub sems dpa' 'am/_brgya byin nam/_tshangs pa 'am/_'jig rten skyong ba gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas lhags pa de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i rgyab na lag na rdo rje rdo rje thogs shing rtag tu 'dug par mthong ngo /_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 
[\[146a.7\]]dang /_bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sprul pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag sprul kyang de dag thams cad kyi rgyab na yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gnas par snang ste byin gyi rlabs de dag thams cad ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i yin no/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]gshegs pas sprul pa gang yin pa de dag gi rgyab na yang 'di'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gnas te/_shA ri'i bu gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ni de ltar ye shes dang mngon par shes pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs dang ldan no/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i 
[\[146b.2\]]yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa'i dka' ba spyod pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[146b.3\]]kyi snying por 'gro ba dang /_bdud 'dul ba dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_bkod pa bstan pa las brtsams te/_de na rmad du byung ba'i rgyu gang dag byung ba gang du khyod la mngon sum du gyur pa la khyod spobs par gyis shig_/gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_zhi ba'i blo gros 
[\[146b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bkod pa byung ba ni tshad med de/_de dag ni tshe'i tshad bskal par gnas pas kyang rgyas par rnam par phye ste bstan par sla ba ma yin mod kyi/_'on kyang cung zad tsam zhig brjod par bya'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i dka' ba spyod pa ni rnam 
[\[146b.5\]]pa gcig ma yin te/_mu stegs can gzhom pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' spyad do/_/dka' thub dang /_lus la yongs su gdung ba ji snyed dang /_lus kyi spyod lam ji snyed kyis pha rol mu stegs can dag mngon par snyems pa de bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'am/_ches 
[\[146b.6\]]mchog tu gyur pa'i bya dka' ba dang /_brtul zhugs dang /_dka' thub gang dag de dag gis bya bas kun tu bstan par mi nus pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpas kun tu bstan te/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de la kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rkang pa ya gcig btsugs te/_
[\[146b.7\]]'dug par mthong /_kha cig gis ni lag pa bteg ste 'dug par mthong /_kha cig gis ni nyi ma la lta zhing 'dug par mthong /_kha cig gis ni gdung ba lngas gdung bar mthong /_/kha cig gis ni tsog tsog por 'dug cing spong ba la sbyor bar brtson par mthong /_kha cig gis ni rkang 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]pa btsugs te mi 'gul bar mthong /_kha cig gis ni rkang pa gyen du bsgreng ste 'dug par mthong /_kha cig gis ni khas bub tu 'dug par mthong /_kha cig gis ni tsher ma'i steng na nyal bar mthong /_kha cig gis ni ba lang gi lci ba'i nang na nyal bar mthong /_
[\[147a.2\]]kha cig gis ni rdo leb la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug par mthong /_kha cig gis ni rtsig pa la snyes pa dang /_kha cig gis ni shing leb la snyes pa dang /_kha cig gis ni gtun shing la snyes pa dang /_kha cig gis ni phyag dar khrod na nyal ba dang /_kha cig gis ni nyi ma yongs 
[\[147a.3\]]su sgyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni shing leb gyon pa dang /_kha cig gis ni rtswa mun dza'i gos gyon pa dang /_kha cig gis ni rtswa bal pa dza'i gos gyon pa dang /_kha cig gis ni rtswa ku sha'i gos gyon pa dang /_kha cig gis ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi pags pa gyon pa dang /_kha cig gis ni rtswa tsi 
[\[147a.4\]]ra gyon pa dang /_kha cig gis ni sgren mor 'dug pa dang /_kha cig gis ni rtswa dar b+ha'i gos gyon pa dang /_kha cig gis ni shing shun gyi gos gyon pa dang /_kha cig gis ni sred za ba dang /_kha cig gis ni nas za bar mthong ngo /_/kha cig gis ni rtsa ba za ba dang /_lo ma za ba dang /_
[\[147a.5\]]me tog za ba dang /_'bras bu za ba dang /_sdong bu za ba dang /_gzegs ma za ba dang /_pad+ma'i rtsa ba za ba dang /_zhag drug smyung ba dang /_sha mi za ba dang /_rgya shug za ba dang /_nas shin te za ba dang /_ci tse za ba dang /_mon sran sde'u za ba dang /_mon sran gre'u za ba dang /_bra yos za ba dang /_
