[\[147a.6\]]til za ba dang /_'bras skam za ba dang /_chu 'thung ba tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang /_mar gyi thigs pa tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang /_sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang /_'o ma'i thigs pa tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang /_kha cig gis ni zas mi za ba dang /_kha cig gis ni gnyid dang bral bar mthong ngo /_/
[\[147a.7\]]kha cig gis ni 'dug pa 'ba' shig tu mthong ngo /_/kha cig gis ni 'greng ba 'ba' shig tu mthong ngo /_/zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa' spyod lam de dag dang /_dka' ba spyod pa tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang ston te/_lo drug tshang bar spyod lam gcig kyang ma 'khrugs par thams cad 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]rdzogs par bstan par gyur to/_/brtul zhugs shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_brtson 'grus shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_dka' thub shin tu brtan pos lo drug tu brtul zhugs dang /_dka' thub thams cad ston kyang sems can gzhan dang gzhan la ma mos pa dag gis brtul 
[\[147b.2\]]zhugs dang /_dka' thub gzhan dang gzhan du mi mthong ste/_gzhan du na ci 'dra ba'i brtul zhugs dang /_dka' thub ci 'dra ba dag gis sems can de dag 'dul bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i brtul zhugs dang /_dka' thub mthong ba ni ma gtogs so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[147b.3\]]ni thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa'i btang snyoms can yang yin la bya ba de dag kyang kun tu ston te/_dka' ba spyod pa 'dis lha dang mi bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi theg pa gsum po dag la yongs su smin par byas so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros lha dang /_mi gang dag rgya chen po la mos pa yongs su sbyong ba 
[\[147b.4\]]byas pa de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa na 'dug cing mkha' khyab kyi bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed pa dang /_mi g.yo ba dang /_bde ba myong ba dang /_lo drug lon nas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de las langs par mthong ngo /_/zhi ba'i blo gros 
[\[147b.5\]]de la lha dang mi chos can chos 'dod pa chos bstan pas yongs su smin par bya ba gang yin pa de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' las gzhan mi byed par rgyun mi 'chad par chos ston par mthong ste/_zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po la sbyor ba/_ye shes chen 
[\[147b.6\]]po yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/bya dka' ba'i ye shes la 'jug pa/_bdud dang /_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar lo drug tshang nas byang chub sems dpa' ji skad 
[\[147b.7\]]smos pa'i brtul zhugs dang /_dka' thub de dag las langs te klung ne ran dza na'i 'gram du song nas 'jig rten dang 'thun par khrus byas te/_lus gtsang mar byas nas klung ne ran dzan nas byung ste 'dug par gyur to/_/de na grong mi'i bu mo legs skyes ma zhes bya ba des ba stong gi 'o ma bskol ba sbrang 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]rtsi dang bsres pa'i 'o thug khyer te byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ngo /_/gzhan lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po bye ba phrag drug cu yang rang rang gi zas 
[\[148a.2\]]thogs te 'khod nas so so nas tshig 'di skad du/_kye skyes bu dam pa bdag gi bshos gsol cig_/kye skyes bu dam pa bdag gi bshos gsol cig ces zer ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de na byang chub sems dpas grong mi'i bu mo legs skyes ma la sogs pa lha dang /_
[\[148a.3\]]klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za bye ba phrag drug cu po de dag thams cad kyi kha zas de dag blangs nas thams cad zos kyang phan tshun ma mthong ngo /_/lha'i bu re res kyang byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi bshos gsol te/_byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi bshos gsol nas bla na med 
[\[148a.4\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar shes so/_/de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas par gyur te/_zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[148a.5\]]zas len par sbyor ba dka' ba spyod pa yang dag 'phags zhes bya ba'o/_/zas len pa sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dka' ba spyod pa yang dag 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' lus bkrus te lus 
[\[148a.6\]]stobs dang ldan par gyur nas zas zos te byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ngo /_/de song ba dang sa la spyod pa'i lha'i bus [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya bas sa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad la bos te smras pa/_sa 'dzin gang zhig mi g.yo mi bskyod pa/_/sred pas bsal cing 
[\[148a.7\]]khong khro rab spangs pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' de ni shing drung byon/_/sa gzhi dag ni legs par brgyan par bya/_/legs so zhes te sa la spyod rnams dga'/_/stong gsum thams cad yongs su phyag dar byed/_/me tog sil ma bkram zhing spos mchog bdugs/_/
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]spos chu dag gis sa gzhi chag chag btab/_/lag na gzhong thogs de bzhin phreng ba thogs/_/gzhal med khang gnas de bzhin bar snang ba/_/de dag byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas dga'/_/de tshe me tog sna tshogs char du phab/_/gling bzhi pa dag rnams ni 
[\[148b.2\]]skyong ba bzhi/_/ji snyed pa dag thams cad 'khor bcas te/_/rnam par 'dren la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/_/gser gyi dra bas stong gsum thams cad bkab/_/stong gsum 'jig rten brgya byin rdzu 'phrul che/_/de dag byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir/_/
[\[148b.3\]]sum cu rtsa gsum rnam rgyal khang mdzes pa/_/de ltas stong gsum thams cad mdzes par brgyan/_/'thab bral lha rnams thams cad rab dga' ste/_/skyes bu mchog la yang dag mchod pa'i phyir/_/mi mjed 'jig rten khams kyi stong gsum kun/_/
[\[148b.4\]]nam mkha' bai dUr+ya yi dra bas bkab/_/dga' ldan rab dang dga' ldan lha rnams kyang /_/de dag mu tig dra bas brgyan pa byas/_/rgyan phreng de bzhin zla gam rnams kyang thogs/_/mu tig sil ma'i char yang rab tu 'bebs/_/lha'i rgyal po rab tu 'phrul gyi 
[\[148b.5\]]bar/_/rab tu dga' nas 'dzam bu'i chu gser gyi/_/dril bu'i dra ba gser gyi drar bcas dang /_/sgra snyan bcas pas stong gsum thams cad bkab/_/thams cad don la mi 'jigs mchod pa'i phyir/_/dbang sgyur dag gis lha yi rin po che/_/rnam par dag cing 
[\[148b.6\]]gzi brjid mtha' yas pa/_/'od gsal dri med dra ba gcig kyang sprul/_/klu dang dri za lto 'phye chen po dang /_/lha min mkha' lding mi'am ci kun gyis/_/rang rang gnas dang bkod pa rnams kyis ni/_/'dod khams legs par brgyan nas mdzes par byas/_/
[\[148b.7\]]zhi ba'i blo gros de nas stong gsum gyi dbang po tshangs pa chen po dbang sgyur zhes bya bas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la mngon du phyogs par mthong nas tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la smras pa/_grogs po dag shes par gyis shig_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]chen po go cha chen po mnabs pa/_dam bcas pa chen po ma bor ba/_go cha sra ba mnabs pa/_thugs yongs su mi skyo ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las nges par byung ba/_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu byon pa/_byang chub 
[\[149a.2\]]sems dpa'i sa thams cad la mnga' dbang brnyes pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa/_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i rjes su zhugs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad la shin tu zhugs pa/_bdud 
[\[149a.3\]]kyi las kyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_sems can thams cad la rab tu thar pa'i lam ston pa ded dpon chen por gyur pa/_
[\[149a.4\]]bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa/_stong gsum na dpa' bo gcig pur gyur pa/_chos kyi sman thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa/_sman pa'i rgyal po chen po/_rnam par grol ba'i thabs brnyes pa/_chos kyi rgyal po chen po/_shes 
[\[149a.5\]]rab kyi 'od chen po gtong ba tog chen po'i rgyal po/_'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos pa pad+ma chen po lta bu/_chos thams cad kyi gzungs ma bsnyel ba rgya mtsho chen po dang 'dra ba/_rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba dang bral ba/_mi g.yo ba/_mi bskyod 
[\[149a.6\]]pa/_ri rab chen po lta bu/_shin tu dri ma med pa/_shin tu yongs su dag pa/_shin tu dkar ba'i blo dang ldan pa/_nor bu rin po che chen po dang 'dra ba/_chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba/_sems las su rung ba/_tshangs pa chen po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' de bdud kyi 
[\[149a.7\]]sde rab tu gdul ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bzhed pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang /_
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]seng ge'i sgra chen po bsgrag pa dang /_chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad tshim par mdzad pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig rnam par sbyang ba dang /_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcad pa dang /_sngon dam bcas pa 
[\[149b.2\]]yongs su rdzogs pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bstan par bzhed pa dang /_chos thams cad la dbang phyug gi mnga' dbang brnyes par mdzad pa'i phyir byang chub kyi snying por bzhud kyis/_de la grogs po dag khyed byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa 
[\[149b.3\]]dang rim gro bya ba la spro bar gyis shig_/de nas stong gsum gyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag po de yid rab tu dga' nas tshangs ris kyi lha thams cad la smras pa/_grogs po dag bskal pa brgya stong mang por brtul zhugs dang dka' thub bsags pa/_
[\[149b.4\]]skyes bu chen po dam pa de byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der bzhud kyis/_de la khyed kyis bkod pa chen po rnams kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po thams cad brgyan par gyis shig_/de nas tshangs pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag pos de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras 
[\[149b.5\]]so/_/sems can rnam dag brtul zhugs chos nges pa/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten dag la phan bzhed pa/_/lha dang mi yis mchod pa lha yi lha/_/thub pa chen po byang chub snying por gshegs/_/sde dang bcas pa'i bdud ni gdul ba dang /_/thams cad 
[\[149b.6\]]mkhyen gyi ye shes 'tshang rgya dang /_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rnams yongs bkang dang /_/dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_/mkhas pa seng ge'i sgra chen bsgrag pa dang /_/sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba dang /_/dam pa'i chos mig yongs su 
[\[149b.7\]]sbyang ba'i phyir/_/'dren pa byang chub snying por nye bar gshegs/_/phas kyi rgol ba rnams ni tshar gcad dang /_/sngon gyi dam bcas yongs su bkang ba dang /_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bstan pa'i phyir/_/'dren pa byang chub snying por nye bar gshegs/_/
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]legs par thams cad lhan cig 'dus nas ni/_/sa yi gzhi ni legs par brgyan par bya/_/stong gsum brgyan par gyur la ltos shig kye/_/'dod pa'i khams kyang brgyan par gyur pa ltos/_/'dod pa'i khams ni ji ltar brgyan pa bzhin/_/de ltar 
[\[150a.2\]]gzugs kyi khams kyang brgyan par bya/_/tshangs pa rnams ni sems dang legs so zhes/_/rab tu dga' nas stong gsum brgyan par gyur/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i khams na bkod snang ba/_/de bas lhag pa'i mchod pa de dag bstan/_/me tog rnams kyis bkang zhing 
[\[150a.3\]]spos kyis bkang /_/rin chen rnams kyis mchod cing sil snyan bsgrags/_/tshangs pa la sogs 'og min lha yi rnams/_/rab tu dga' nas stong gsum thams cad kyang /_/dga' bar 'gyur dang phyag bya'i 'os su byas/_/rang rang gnas kyi gzhi yang bkod pa byas/_/
[\[150a.4\]]lha rnams kyis ni gong nas gong du yang /_/lhag pa lhag pa'i rgyan rnams rab tu bstan/_/lha yi bu mo bye ba drug cu brgyas/_/byang chub rdo rje gdan ni rgyan par byed/_/spos chu yis ni kun tu chag chag 'debs/_/me tog sna tshogs dag kyang 'thor bar byed/_/sa gzhi dag 
[\[150a.5\]]la rin chen rnams kyang bkram/_/byang chub snying por rgyan rnams rab tu bstan/_/thams cad tshig gis brjod par mi nus pa/_/de snyed tshad kyi bkod pa 'dir byas gyur/_/zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na stong gi dbang po tshangs pa chen po 
[\[150a.6\]]mi mjed kyi bdag pos tshangs ris kyi lha thams cad la smras pa/_grogs po dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por brtul zhugs dang /_dka' thub rnams kyi spyod pa spyad pa sems can gyi mchog skyes bu chen po 'di byang chub kyi snying por bzhud kyis/_de la khyed kyis stong 
[\[150a.7\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bkod pa chen po rnams kyis brgyan par gyis shig_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sems can rnam dag brtul zhugs chos des pa/_/phan bzhed 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]'jig rten don mdzad bdag nyid che/_/de ni blo ngan sder bcas bdud 'dul du/_/shing gi dbang po byang chub drung du bzhud/_/thams cad 'dus te lhan cig 'dong bar bya/_/stong gsum mi mjed 'di ni brgyan par bya/_/'di ni lhar bcas 'jig rten chos kyi dbang /_/yang dag 
[\[150b.2\]]mchod na bsod nams mtha' yas 'gyur/_/tshangs pa de dag tshig mchog de thos nas/_/stong gsum thams cad ma lus rgyan byed cing /_/legs par phyags te me tog rgyal mtshan brgyan/_/'jig rten khams ni rin chen rang bzhin sprul/_/nyi ma zla ba'i 'od kyi 
[\[150b.3\]]bkod pa dang /_/bye ba'i gdugs rnams nam mkhar de dag sprul/_/sA la'i shing rnams me tog mchog spras pa/_/dga' tshal lta bu de dag rnams kyis sprul/_/lam gang nas ni drang srong che gshegs pa/_/de ni shing rta bdun bstams tshad du sprul/_/rin 
[\[150b.4\]]chen gzhi la gser gyi pad+ma bkram/_/kha khyer rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor/_/brgya byin gyis der bkod pa gang byas pa/_/de dag lha mi rnams kyis sngon ma mthong /_/sum cu gsum dbang rnam rgyal khang 'dra bar/_/de ltar gling bzhi dag ni mdzes par 
[\[150b.5\]]brgyan/_/'thab bral lha dang dga' ldan 'phrul ba dang /_/gzhan 'phrul ba dang 'og min lha yi rnams/_/stobs dang shugs 'chang thams cad brtson par ni/_/byang chub snying po dam pa rgyan par byed/_/byang chub snying por gshegs pa'i bar der ni/_/'dod pa'i khams 
[\[150b.6\]]'dir dkon mchog gang yod pa/_/lha 'am klu 'am mi 'am ci rnams kyi/_/de dag thams cad skad cig de la bstan/_/phyogs bzhi dag nas lha mo bye ba lhags/_/me tog rnams dang spos dang byug pa yis/_/byang chub shing ni mngon du rgyan par byed/_/spos chu yis 
[\[150b.7\]]ni kun tu chag chag 'debs/_/byang chub shing ni legs par brgyan byas te/_/sum cu rtsa gsum lha yi yongs 'du 'dra/_/lha rnams bye ba dag gis mdzes sprul pa/_/bkod pa de dag tshig gis brjod mi nus/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]snying por 'gro ba na rkang pa'i mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa gnyis las 'di 'dra ba'i 'od phyung ste 'od des sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rnams rgyun 
[\[151a.2\]]bcad do/_/klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas kyang snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/de nas klu'i bdag po nag pos byang chub sems dpa'i 'od mthong nas tshim zhing mgul yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' nas/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te thams cad dang ldan pa'i rang gi 
[\[151a.3\]]'khor la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba'i 'od/_/gnas 'dir lhang nger gyur pas na/_/kho bo'i lus ni rab tu tshim/_/sems kyang rab tu dga' bar gyur/_/kho bos sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi/_/ltas bzang mthong ba ltar na ni/_/gdon 
[\[151a.4\]]mi za bar dpa' chen po/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur/_/legs par phye ma phreng ba dang /_/spos dang me tog byug pa dang /_/gser dang nor bu mu tig dang /_/dung dang rgyan phreng mchog rnams dang /_/rol mo sil snyan rnams thogs la/_/gdugs dang 
[\[151a.5\]]rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni/_/ba dan dag kyang bsgreng byas te/_/ston pa la ni mchod par bya/_/klu yi rgyal po'i gnas 'di na/_/bzang po'i rgyan rnams ji snyed pa/_/de dag rab tu dga' ba yis/_/sangs rgyas la ni rim gro bya/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po nag po chung ma'i 'khor 
[\[151a.6\]]dang bcas/_gnyen gyi 'khor dang bcas te/_me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan thogs pa dang /_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dang /_rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rang gi gnas nas 
[\[151a.7\]]byung ste spos chus gang ba'i sprin mngon par sprul nas spos chu'i char pa ni 'bebs/_klu'i mu tig dang /_klu'i me tog gi char ni 'bebs shing /_klu'i mthu chen po dang /_klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'khor dang bcas pas byang chub sems dpa' la 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]mchod pa byas te zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/_rol mo dang /_sil snyan len pa dang /_bcas pas byang chub sems dpa' la bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mngon par bstod do/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_skyes bu mchog gi 'od ni rab bkye bas/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[151b.2\]]zhing 'di thams cad snang bar gyur/_/skad cig de la ngan song gsum yang zhi/_/nag po'i gnas kyang 'od kyis khyab par gyur/_/klu yi rgyal po de yis 'od mthong nas/_/rab tu dga' ste de tshe tshig smras pa/_/gser gyi mdog gi 'od 'di byung lags na/_/de ring sangs rgyas 
[\[151b.3\]]'byung du gdon mi za/_/klu mo khrag khrig dag gis mdun bdar te/_/gdugs dang me tog gos mchog thogs nas su/_/byang chub sems dpa' de ni ga lar song /_/phyag byas mchod pa byas nas gus bcas 'dug_/sa kun rin chen me tog rnams kyis gang zhing de tshe mdzes 
[\[151b.4\]]par brgyan/_/shing mchog kun dang sman dang rtswa rnams de dag byang chub shing la 'dud/_/'di na yod pa'i chu klung thams cad mi 'bab mkha' la rlung mi ldang /_/de ring bdud btul nas ni 'jig rten thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur/_/srid pa gsum na brgya byin tshangs pa 
[\[151b.5\]]nyi ma zla ba'i 'od mi snang /_/mtshungs med khyod kyi 'od kyis reg nas de ring ngan song gsum po zhi/_/bdag gi gnas su 'od byung nas ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston par bgyid/_/de ring rgyal ba byon par 'gyur gyis dgyes mdzod rangs shing tshim pa skyed/_/bum pa gang ba 'di dag nam 
[\[151b.6\]]mkhar song ste khyod la skor ba dang /_/tsa sha'i tshogs rnams 'di dag nam mkhar song ste khyed la skor ba dang /_/lhar bcas mir bcas 'jig rten dag kyang mchod par brtson par gnas pa las/_/de ring 'gro ba'i sbyin gnas 'gyur zhing shes rab 'dod pa'i lam du 'gyur/_/bde bar gshegs 
[\[151b.7\]]pa bdag gis rnyed pa legs rnyed gzi brjid che ldan pa/_/mi mchog 'khor ba 'jig dang de bzhin gser thub ces ni bya ba mchod/_/mi mchog 'od srung dang ni shAkya mchog khyod de ring bdag gis mchod/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas dpa' mthong ma bral byang chub dam pa don du gnyer/_/sa ni grum zhing 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]ri rnams g.yos la 'gro ba thams cad med 'gyur srid/_/su zhig byang chub tu ni sems nges lhag pa'i bsam pas 'phags gyur pa/_/de ni de ring stobs bcu ldan par mi 'gyur gnas ni mchis ma lags/_/seng ge'i sgra bsgrags 
[\[152a.2\]]tshangs pa'i dbyangs can bcom ldan 'dren pa gsung phyung shig_/zhi ba'i blo gros de nas klu'i rgyal po nag po'i chung ma dam pa gser 'od ces bya ba de klu'i bu mo rab tu mang pos bskor cing mdun du bdar nas gdugs sna tshogs thogs pa dang /_ras bcos bu sna tshogs 
[\[152a.3\]]thogs pa dang /_mu tig gi rgyan phreng sna tshogs thogs pa dang /_nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa dang /_lha'i dang mi'i phreng ba brgyus pa thogs pa dang /_pog por sna tshogs thogs pa dang /_sil snyan dang /_rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs len pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rin 
[\[152a.4\]]po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'ong ba la 'thor zhing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/'khrul pa mi mnga' mi dngang mi bsnyengs bag mi tsha/_/ma zhum mi dman rab dgyes mi thub chags mi mnga'/_/sdang dang rmongs dang brkam pa mi 
[\[152a.5\]]mnga' chags bral ba/_/rnam grol drang srong chen po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dogs bral zug rngu bral zhing dul la ma rig sel/_/'gro ba thams cad sdug bsngal rnams las rab tu 'grel/_/gnas dang skyabs dang gling ma mchis pa mkhyen nas ni/_/gnas khyod skyabs khyod 
[\[152a.6\]]'jig rten gsum po dag tu byung /_/ji ltar lha yi tshogs rnams dad cing rab dga' ste/_/mkha' las me tog char chen rab tu 'bebs pa dang /_/ji ltar gos chen dag kyang 'dor bar bgyid lags na/_/drang srong chen po mgon po rgyal bar der 'gyur snyam/_/dgyes skyed shing dbang drung gshegs 
[\[152a.7\]]mi bsnyengs bzhugs mdzod la/_/bdud sde pham par mdzod de nyon mongs dra ba drol/_/ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal dbang de dag sangs rgyas pa/_/de ltar byang chub rab mchog zhi ba 'tshang rgyar mdzod/_/gang gi don du khyod kyis bskal pa bye mang du/_/'gro ba dag ni dgrol phyir dka' ba rnams kyang spyad/_/
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]khyod kyi dgongs pa de rdzogs shing dbang drung gshegs te/_/byang chub mchog la reg par mdzad pa'i dus 'di lags//_//bam po drug pa/_zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpa' klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas nas byung nas byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste 
[\[152b.2\]]'gro ba na lam gyi g.yas rol na rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa zhes bya ba rtswa brnga zhing 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la mngon du phyogs pa mthong ste/_lha rnams kyis bskul nas rtswa 'jam pa/_shin tu gzhon pa/_nyams dga' ba/_yid dga' bar byed pa/_
[\[152b.3\]]rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu dga' ba 'khyil pa/_g.yas su 'khyil pa/_kha dog dang ldan pa/_dri dang ldan pa/_katsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba spar gang blangs te/_byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_rtswa spar gang byang chub sems dpa' la byin te/_bsam pa thag pa 
[\[152b.4\]]nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/zhi ba'i blo gros khyod rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa mi snga mi 'phyi bar byang chub tu sems bskyed cing rtswa yang byin no snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa'i sngon gyi smon lam 
[\[152b.5\]]yin te/_ji ltar kho bo bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying por khri shom pa bzhin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_zhi ba'i blo gros kho bos mngon par shes te/_'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di'i snga rol bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[152b.6\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 
[\[152b.7\]]byung ste/_de'i gsung rab la dge slong stong tham pa tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas bcom ldan 'das des khyed cag bskal pa bzang po la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes de dag lung bstan to/_/de'i tshe na khyim bdag blo gros 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]ldan zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag lung bstan pa de thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_'di skad du bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag byang chub kyi 
[\[153a.2\]]snying por 'gro ba na seng ge'i khri byi dor bya'o/_/zhes smon lam btab bo/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag blo gros ldan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tshom za ba'am/_yid gnyis su gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[153a.3\]]rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag blo gros ldan zhes bya bar gyur to/_/zhi ba'i blo gros khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa'i sngon gyi smon lam 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba dang /_dbang po yongs su smin pa ji lta bu bzhin 
[\[153a.4\]]du de kha cig la ni rtswa spar gang 'bul bar 'gyur/_kha cig la ni rin po che bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri 'bul bar 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po'i shing drung du song ba dang /_byang chub kyi snying po'i lha rnams lha'i bu mo me tog gi skon bu thogs pa dang /_
[\[153a.5\]]spos dang /_phye ma'i phur ma thogs pa khri dang lhan cig tu byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang /_phye ma dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[153a.6\]]la gtor te/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/bdag nyid chen po mi bsnyengs dpa' zhing dul zhi ba/_/dgyes shing tshim pa brtan pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'bar ba nyams dgyes kha na ma tho mi mnga' ba/_/skyon las grol ba'i ston pa khyod la phyag 'tshal 
[\[153a.7\]]lo/_/sdug bsngal chen por bying ba mgon med 'gro 'di la/_/khyod ni bde ba rab tu stsol ba'i mgon po gcig_/'gro ba'i nyon mongs nad rnams spang ba'i phyir byung ba/_/sman pa'i rgyal chen grags ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ji ltar lha tshogs dad cing rab tu dga' ba yis/_/
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]lha yi me tog char pa rab tu 'bebs pa las/_/bdud dag sde dang bcas pa byams pas bcom nas ni/_/khyod kyis byang chub dam pa de ring brnyes su nges/_/shing dbang drung du gshegs te khri der bzhugs nas su/_/bdud btul nas ni mun pa thams cad gzhom par mdzod/_/ji ltar sngon gyi 
[\[153b.2\]]thub dbang de dag sangs rgyas pa/_/de ltar byang chub zhi ba mchog rab 'tshang rgyar mdzod/_/ji ltar khyod kyis 'gro ba dgrol ba'i don du ni/_/bskal pa bye bar dka' mdzad rnam par dag 'gyur ba/_/drang srong chen po khyod kyi dgongs mchog deng rdzogs kyis/_/shing dbang drung du bzhugs te byang chub 
[\[153b.3\]]'tshang rgyar mdzod/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpas rtswa spar gang khyer nas byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_byang chub kyi shing drung du bdag nyid kyis rtswa'i gding ba bting nas byang chub kyi shing la phyag 'tshal te lan bdun bskor ba byas so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[153b.4\]]rtswa'i gding ba bting ma thag tu de nas lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong gis seng ge'i khri sna tshogs blta na sdug pa/_mtho ba/_yangs pa/_rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/_rin po che'i kha khyer can/_rin po che'i dra bas g.yogs pa/_rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bres pa/_mu tig gi rgyan phreng rab tu sbyangs 
[\[153b.5\]]pa ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba brgyad khri bzhi stong byang chub sems dpa'i ched du bshams so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de na byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i khri brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag thams cad la bdag nyid 'dug par kun tu bstan par gyur to/_/lha'i bu de dag gis kyang gzhan dang gzhan du 
[\[153b.6\]]mi mthong mi shes te/_lha'i bu re res kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so/_/bdag gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar shes te/_de dag dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba 
[\[153b.7\]]de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/byang chub kyi snying por bzhud pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i khri de la 'dug ma thag tu de nas smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i bar nas bdud bskul ba 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]zhes bya ba'i 'od phyung ste 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'khod pa'i bdud bye ba phrag bzhi brgya la reg go/_/'od des de dag la reg ma thag tu rang rang gi gnas na 'khod bzhin du spu zing zhes byed de/_rang gi bdud kyi gnas tshig cing mog 
[\[154a.2\]]mog por gyur par shes nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_gang gi phyir gnas 'di dag mog mog por gyur par snang ba 'di la rgyu ni ci zhig yod rkyen ni ci zhig yod/_byang chub sems dpa' 'am cig byang chub kyi snying por 'dug nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[154a.3\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur grang snyam ste/_rnam par bltas pa dang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par mthong ngo /_/de nas bdud sdig can de dag rang rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur nas bdud re re yang gnod sbyin kha dog rnam pa mang po dang /_
[\[154a.4\]]cha byad rnam pa mang po dang /_dbyibs rnam pa mang po dang /_chu zheng rnam pa mang po dang /_g.yo ba rnam pa mang po dang /_mgo rnam pa mang po dang /_mtshon cha rnam pa mang po dang /_rgyal mtshan rnam pa mang po thogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag gis bskor te/_smra ba rnam pa mang po 
[\[154a.5\]]smra zhing bdud kyi mthu chen po dang /_bdud kyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos bdud re res kyang bdud kyi 'khor gyis rgyar dpag tshad nyi khri nyi khri ste/_khor yug tu dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong bkang nas byang chub kyi shing drung du dong ngo /_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'khor chen po de dag dong ma thag tu de nas 
[\[154a.6\]]de'i tshe yid du mi 'ong ba/_mnyan par mi 'os pa/_mi snyan pa/_u dug ces bya ba dang /_pi tsig ces bya ba dang /_hu lu hu lu zhes bya ba dang /_rgyob shig_/zung shig_/sod cig_/chings shig ces bya ba'i sgra chen po de lta bu phyung bar gyur to/_/gal te 'dod chags dang ma bral 
[\[154a.7\]]ba'i sems can rnams kyis sgra de thos la/_zhi ba'i blo gros gal te byang chub sems dpas sgra de mi grag par ma byas na ni de dag kha nas khrag dron po skyug cing 'chi ba 'am/_shi la thug pa'i sdug bsngal chen po rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/de ni byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen pos 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]non pas sems can la rnam par 'tshe bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes sgra de mi grag par byas par gyur to/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i yul yin no/_/zhi ba'i blo gros sgra de lta bu de thos kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni tha na spu g.yos par yang ma gyur to/_/
[\[154b.2\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sgra 'di thams cad brag cha dang mtshungs par legs par rtogs pa'i phyir ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub kyi bsnyen bkur ba'i lha rnams kyis bdud lhags par rig nas bdud sdig can de dag la bzlog pa rnam pa bcu drug gis zlog par byed de/_sdig can dag phongs par 'gyur 
[\[154b.3\]]ba gdon par dka' ba rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag gis ci zhig byas thong shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sdig can khyed ni gyad stobs chung ngu la gyad stobs chen po bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas brdabs par 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyed ni dpa' bo chen pos pha rol gyi sde bcom pa ltar do 
[\[154b.4\]]mod byang chub sems dpas pham par byas par 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyed ni srin bu me khyer la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyed ni phub ma spar gang la rlung mar bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas gtor 
[\[154b.5\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyed ni shing sA la chen po rtsa ba nas chad pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas sgyel bar 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyed ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi tshogs la seng ge bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas dngangs par byas par 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyed ni brjes kyi chu 
[\[154b.6\]]la nyi tshan bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas yongs su zad par byas par 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyed ni mi mdza' ba'i grong khyer la rgyal po chen po bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas rlag par 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyed ni mi g.yo can gsad par bya ba shor ba ltar do mod byang 
[\[154b.7\]]chub sems dpas 'bros par byed par 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyed ni tshong pa lam rgyags mang po mes tshig pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas mgo 'khor bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyed ni chos kyi rgyal po rgyal srid nyams pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas mya ngan byed du 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]bcug par 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyed ni khrung khrung rgan po 'dab ma bregs pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas sems khongs su bcug par 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyed ni 'brog dgon par lam rgyags chad pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas phongs par 
[\[155a.2\]]byas par 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyed ni rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su gru zhig pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas smre sngags 'don du bcug par 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyed ni bsreg pa'i bskal pas rtswa dang nags tshal ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas rnyis par byas par 
[\[155a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyed ni rdo ba la rdo rje chen po bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas rnam par gtor bar 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub kyi bsnyen bkur ba'i lha rnams kyis bzlog pa rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can rnams zlog par byed kyang bdud sdig can de 
[\[155a.4\]]dag phyir ma log go_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_legs par sdom pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje 
[\[155a.5\]]dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_zhi gnas dang /_lhag mthong dang /_rig pa dang /_rnam par grol ba yongs su sbyang ba 
[\[155a.6\]]byas pas lag pa g.yas pa 'jam zhing gzhon la shin tu gzhon pa gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa brkyang ste/_snying rje chen pos bskyod pa dang /_sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pas spyi bo nas bzung ste/_lus thams cad la byugs nas 'jig rten gyi 
[\[155a.7\]]khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon du byas te dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin dus chen po la brdabs so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpas sa chen po la brdabs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/rab tu g.yos so//
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]kun tu rab tu g.yos so/_/'gul to/_/rab tu 'gul to/_/kun tu rab tu 'gul to/_/ldeg go/_/rab tu ldeg go/_/kun tu rab tu ldeg go/_/'khrugs so/_/rab tu 'khrugs so/_/kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so/_/'ur 'ur ro/_/rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/_/kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/_/chem 
[\[155b.2\]]chem mo/_/rab tu chem chem mo/_/kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/_/shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho'o/_/nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho'o/_/lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho'o/_/byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho'o/_/mtha' mtho na dbus dma'o/_/dbus mtho na 
[\[155b.3\]]mtha' dma'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar rnam pa drug dang /_ltas chen po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad du sa g.yos pa chen po 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to/_/bdud sdig can rnams kyis kyang 'ur sgra dang /_tug chem gyi sgra chen po dang /_zung shig dang /_rgyob cig pa dang /_chings shig pa dang /_sod cig pa'i sgra 
[\[155b.4\]]thos so/_/bdud kyi 'khor gyis ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthus steng gi bar snang la 'di lta bu'i sgra 'di thos so/_/drang srong nang na drang srong mchog_/'di ni mi 'jigs sbyin pa ste/_/srog chags kun gyi skyabs yin gyis/_/'di la skyabs su 'gro bar gyis/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 
[\[155b.5\]]bdud kyi 'khor gyis sgra de thos pa dang /_gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu khas bub tu sa la sgyel nas skyes bu chen po yongs su bskyab tu gsol/_yongs su bskyab tu gsol/_zhes tshig de skad smras so/_/bdud sdig can lhag ma rnams ni dpung gi tshogs dang 
[\[155b.6\]]lhan cig tu 'bros par 'dod na 'bros ma nus nas de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' lus las 'od phyung ba dang /_'od des de dag 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral te/_rang rang gi gnas su dong ngo /_/zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpas bdud 'dul ba'i rnam par sprul pa 'di 
[\[155b.7\]]bstan pa na bdud kyi 'khor de las gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cus ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]lha'i bu sngon sbyang ba byas pa brgyad khri bzhi stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/bdud btul ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar lha dang mi kha cig gis ni de ltar bdud 'dul ba tshad med pa 
[\[156a.2\]]dang ldan par shes so/_/kha cig gis ni bdud yong thams cad du ma 'ongs par shes so/_/kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rtswa bting ba la 'dug par shes so/_/kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i pad ma bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug par mthong ngo /_/
[\[156a.3\]]kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sa la 'dug par mthong ngo /_/kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug par mthong ngo /_/kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing shing gi rgyal po a shwad thar mthong ngo /_/kha cig gis ni byang chub 
[\[156a.4\]]kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol du mthong ngo /_/kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin can du mthong ngo /_/lha dang mi kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing shing ta la srid tsam du mthong zhing seng ge'i khri shing ta la phyed tsam du mthong ngo /_/kha cig gis ni byang chub 
[\[156a.5\]]kyi shing shing ta la bdun srid tsam du mthong zhing seng ge'i khri shing ta la phyed dang gnyis kyi srid tsam du mthong ngo /_/kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong pa'i bar du mthong zhing seng ge'i khri dpag tshad bzhi khri nyis stong bar mthong ngo /_/lha dang mi kha cig gis ni 
[\[156a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul bar mthong ngo /_/kha cig gis ni bdud gcig mthong ngo /_/kha cig gis ni bdud rgya chen por mthong ngo /_/kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'joms pa la rtse bar mthong ngo /_/kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i dkyil na 
[\[156a.7\]]gnas shing nam mkha' la 'dug pa'i byang chub kyi shing drung na seng ge'i khri la 'dug cing byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mthong ste/_zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni yul mtha' med pa yin te byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa na 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]'khod pa de dag gi yon tan gyi rgyu'i khyad par ni tshad med par snang ngo /_/zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par 'dug pa dang /_sngon 'thun par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med 
[\[156b.2\]]grangs med pa dag nas lhags te/_mi 'jigs pa'i sgra rjod cing shis pa'i sgra dang /_bde ba'i sgra dang /_kun dga' ba'i sgra dang /_mgyogs pa'i sgra dang /_myur ba'i sgra dang /_legs pa'i sgra dang /_don yod pa'i sgra dang /_dpa' ba'i sgra dang /_skyes bu dam ba'i sgra dang /_
[\[156b.3\]]phyir mi ldog pa'i sgra dang /_rgyas pa'i sgra dang /_bkra shis pa'i sgra dang /_mi gdung ba'i sgra dang /_ma zhum pa'i sgra dang /_sngon gyi bsam pa'i sgra dang /_spong ba don yod pa'i sgra dang /_yid bde ba'i sgra dang /_rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa'i sgra dang /_skyes bu dam pa rtsen pa'i sgra dang /_phan 
[\[156b.4\]]pa'i sgra dang /_skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i sgra dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sgra dang /_mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sgra rjod de/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[156b.5\]]nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong dag gis dbugs 'byin to/_/mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed do/_/bstod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed do/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sngon legs par spyad pa ste/_des na phyogs 
[\[156b.6\]]bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug pa la dbugs 'byin cing mchod pa byed kyang byang chub sems dpa' de la yang rjes su chags pa med la bdud kyi sde la yang khong khro ba med do/_/
[\[156b.7\]]zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba dang bral bas skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis shes par bya ba dang /_blta bar bya ba dang /_thob par bya ba dang /_mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba gang ci yang rung ste de thams cad mngon par 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/_sku ma mnyel tam zhes snyun gsol lo/_/mnyel ba mi 
[\[157a.2\]]mnga' bar byang chub bam/_rang byung du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bam/_sgrib pa mi mnga' bar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bam/_mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bam/_kun tu ye shes kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bam/_spyod 
[\[157a.3\]]yul ma 'dres pa dang ldan nam/_snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos sam/_dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs bsabs sam/_chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ram zhes yongs su 'dri'o/_/de la sems can gang dag dbang po yongs su smin pa de dag gis ni bya ba de shes so/_/sems 
[\[157a.4\]]can gang dag dbang po yongs su ma smin pa de dag gis ni bya ba de mi shes so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa zhag bdun gyi bar du spyan mi 'dzums par chos kyi dga' ba'i bde ba nyams su bstar ro/_/spyan mi 'dzums par byang chub kyi shing la 
[\[157a.5\]]yang gzigs so/_/lha'i bu stong yang de la mchod do/_/bstod do/_/phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha'i bu mo brgya stong dag kyang de la mchod pa byed do/_/bstod do/_/phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[157a.6\]]sems kyang bskyed do/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes pa dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi lhung bzed rnams thogs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du dong bar gyur to/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_yul 'khor srung dang /_'phags skyes po dang /_mig mi bzang dang /_rgyal po 
[\[157a.7\]]chen po rnam thos kyi bu ste rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag go/_/gling bzhi pa 'di nas ji ltar dong ba de bzhin du gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya nas rgyal po chen po bye ba phrag bzhi brgya lhung bzed rnams thogs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du dong ngo /_/zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pas lhung 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]bzed bye ba phrag bzhi brgya rnams bzhes te/_bzhes nas kyang lhung bzed gcig tu byin gyis brlabs nas rgyal po chen po re re yang 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pas bdag gi lhung bzed bzhes so/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bdag gi lhung bzed du gsol lo snyam du sems te/_de dag dga' 
[\[157b.2\]]ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po dang /_gzhan yang lha'i bu drug khri de bzhin gshegs pa'i thog ma'i zhal zas 
[\[157b.3\]]thogs nas dong bar gyur te/_de dag ni sngon 'di skad du bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la thog mar zhal zas dbul lo zhes smon lam btab par gyur pa dag go/_/de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la thog mar zhal zas phul nas dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis bla na med 
[\[157b.4\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par 'dug ste thams cad mkhyen pa ma thob pa las byang chub brnyes pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor ba'i bar 
[\[157b.5\]]du sems can gyi don mdzad pa de ni rab tu mang gi/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste byang chub kyi snying por song ba'i bar du ni de lta ma yin no/_/zhi ba'i blo gros khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub la nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar sems can tshad med 
[\[157b.6\]]pa'i don byed pa de ltar shes par bya'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas tshangs pa gtsug phud can zhes bya ba tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin te/_
[\[157b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan bdun bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir sems can chos kyi snod du gyur pa dag mchis te/_de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa 'tshal bar 'gyur gyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]chos bstan du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pas chos bstan du gsol/_zhes gsol ba btab bo/_/de ni sngon gyi smon lam gyis gyur pa ste/_gang gis rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi bur khas blangs nas bdag gis bskal pa bzang po pa'i de bzhin gshegs 
[\[158a.2\]]pa byang chub brnyes pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar bskul lo zhes smon lam btab pa yin no/_/zhi ba'i blo gros tshangs pa gtsug pud can nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar gsol ba btab kyis gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no snyam du 
[\[158a.3\]]khyod sems na de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ji ltar tshangs pa gtsug phud can gyis gsol ba btab pa de bzhin du tshangs pa bye ba phrag bcus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab par gyur to/_/brgya byin bye ba phrag bcu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag 
[\[158a.4\]]bcus kyang bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar gsol ba btab par gyur to/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar gnang ba de'i tshe tshangs pa gtsug pud can gyis grong khyer bA ra NA sI drang srong lhung ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags su bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri 
[\[158a.5\]]'phang du dpag tshad bzhi khri nyis stong yod pa/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/_bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa/_/sa'i steng na 'dug pa bshams par gyur to/_/ji ltar tshangs pa gtsug pud can gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri bshams par gyur pa de bzhin du tshangs pa bye 
[\[158a.6\]]ba phrag bcu dang /_brgya byin bye ba phrag bcu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa bye ba phrag bcus kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/_bshams par gyur to/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de nas bcom ldan 
[\[158a.7\]]'das grong khyer chen po ba ra NA sI ga la ba dang /_drang srong lhung ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_seng ge'i khri de dag thams cad la bdag nyid bzhugs par kun tu bstan to/_/de na re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so/_
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]bdag gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs nas chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur bar shes te/_de dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i 
[\[158b.2\]]tshe phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yos te snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yul mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yul mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[158b.3\]]de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mnyam par gyur par gnas te lag mthil ltar gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can dmyal ba pa 'am/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa 'am/_gshin rje'i 
[\[158b.4\]]'jig rten pa'am/_mi'am/_lha'am/_sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad de'i tshe bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/_sems can gang la yang 'dod chags kyis gnod pa med cing zhe sdang gis ma yin/_gti mug gis ma yin te/_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis gnod pa med 
[\[158b.5\]]cing gcig la gcig pha ma tsam du 'du shes te byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la chos ma nyan pa'i phyir phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems 
[\[158b.6\]]dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa dag lhags par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi 
[\[158b.7\]]ma yin pa ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo /_/zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan pa dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa dag gis sa phyogs 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]gang khyab par ma gyur pa de ni tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha gzhag pa tsam yang med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor chen po de 'dus par mkhyen nas/_dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan thugs rje chen pos 
[\[159a.2\]]bskyod pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze 'am/_su yang rung bas chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten du ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo de ni ci nas kyang 'khor 'dus pa'i sems 
[\[159a.3\]]can rnams rang rang gi rnam par rig pa bzhin du kun tu shes te sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i phyir bskor to/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i tshe chos mnyan pa'i phyir phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu 
[\[159a.4\]]med pa dag 'dus par gyur to/_/'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag kyang 'dus par gyur to/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de la gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung 'di skad du kau di n+ya mig mi rtag go/_/zhes bka' stsal pa de la sdug bsngal gyi sgras 'dul ba 
[\[159a.5\]]rnams kyis ni mig sdug bsngal lo zhes thos so/_/bdag med pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig bdag med pa'o zhes thos so/_/stong pa nyid kyis 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig stong ngo zhes thos so/_/zhi bas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig zhi ba'o zhes thos so/_/dben pas 'dul ba 
[\[159a.6\]]rnams kyis ni mig dben pa'o zhes thos so/_/mi rtag pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig mi rtag pa'o zhes thos so/_/gnas med pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig gnas med pa'o zhes thos so/_/sgyu ma lta bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes thos so/_/rmi lam lta 
[\[159a.7\]]bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig rmi lam lta bu'o zhes thos so/_/chu zla lta bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig chu zla lta bu'o zhes thos so/_/mig yor lta bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig mig yor lta bu'o zhes thos so/_/brag ca lta bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig brag ca lta bu'o zhes 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]thos so/_/de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /_ma skyes pa dang /_skye ba med pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med 
[\[159b.2\]]pa dang /_ma skyes pa dang /_ma byung bar thos so/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o zhes thos so/_/mig la ji lta ba de bzhin du yid kyi bar du yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o zhes thos so/_/de bzhin du gzugs 
[\[159b.3\]]rnams dang /_sgra rnams dang /_dri rnams dang /_ro rnams dang /_reg bya rnams dang /_chos rnams stong ngo zhes thos so/_/kha cig gis ni phung po mi rtag pa dang /_kha cig gis ni khams mi rtag par thos so/_/kha cig gis ni skye mched bdag med pa'o zhes thos so/_/kha cig 
[\[159b.4\]]gis ni phung po mi rtag pa nyid du thos la khams la mi rtag pa nyid du ma yin no/_/kha cig gis ni khams la mi rtag pa nyid du thos la phung po mi rtag pa nyid du ma yin no/_/kha cig ni sdug bsngal gyi sgras rnam par grol lo/_/kha cig ni kun 'byung ba'i sgras rnam par grol lo/_/kha 
[\[159b.5\]]cig ni 'gog pa'i sgras rnam par grol lo/_/kha cig ni lam gyi sgras rnam par grol lo/_/kha cig gis ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gtam du thos so/_/kha cig gis ni yang dag par spong ba'i gtam du thos so/_/kha cig gis ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i gtam du thos so/_/kha 
[\[159b.6\]]cig gis ni dbang po'i gtam du thos so/_/kha cig gis ni stobs kyi gtam du thos so/_/kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi gtam du thos so/_/kha cig gis ni lam gyi gtam du thos so/_/kha cig gis ni zhi gnas kyi gtam du thos so/_/kha cig gis ni lhag mthong 
[\[159b.7\]]gi gtam du thos so/_/kha cig gis ni brten pa'i gtam du thos so/_/kha cig gis ni nyan thos dang rab tu ldan pa'i gtam du thos so/_/kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas dang rab tu ldan pa'i gtam du thos so/_/kha cig gis ni theg pa chen po dang rab tu ldan pa'i gtam du thos te/_/zhi 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]ba'i blo gros de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sems can gyi don mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni/_
[\[160a.2\]]dge slong shA ri'i bus kyang sems can de dag bgrang ba'i rtogs pas/_lo brgya yang rtogs par mi nus na sems can gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci dgos/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' ba spyad pa dang /_byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang /_bdud 'dul ba dang /_bkod pa dang /_seng 
[\[160a.3\]]ge'i sgra dang /_rnam par rol pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/_srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/sems can tshad med pa dag ni theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byas so/_/chos kyi 
[\[160a.4\]]'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de skad bstan pas de bzhin gshegs pa la skrur pa'am/_gcig tu ma gyur lags sam/_
[\[160a.5\]]'on te de bzhin gshegs pa bstan pa dang rjes su 'thun pa 'am/_gcig tu lta'ang lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni zab pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba ni zab ste/_'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[160a.6\]]gshegs pa'i thugs nges par dgongs pa ni zab pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gang bstan pa de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bdag gi lus la gnas pas lags kyi/_'di bdag gi rtsal gyis ni ma lags par 'tshal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gsang ba 
[\[160a.7\]]pa'i bdag po de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir chos smra ba de dag thams cad kyi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis ma brlabs par sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba smra ba 'am/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid dang 'thun pa de ni gnas ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis ma brlabs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[160b.2\]]gsang ba shes par ram/_mnyan par ram/_bshad par nus pa su zhig yod/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid ni mchog tu yang dag pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid ni de kho na'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs pa ni yang dag pa'o zhes yang dag par 
[\[160b.3\]]smra bas smra ba ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid yang dag par smra bas smra ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa gang yin pa de ni chos 
[\[160b.4\]]kyi rnam grangs 'dir bstan to/_/bsnyad do/_/rab tu bshad do/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa dang yid ches par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag kyang 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun par 'gyur ro/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni mgo bos bsgyel ba 'am 
[\[160b.5\]]phrag pa la thogs par nus kyi/_dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos par ram/_dad par ram/_yid ches par yang mi nus na/_blang bar ram/_kun chub par ram/_kun chub par bya bar ram/_gzung bar ram/_sbyor bar bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_de ni gnas ma 
[\[160b.6\]]yin no/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang /_mos pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin pa nas sangs rgyas bcu la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin gyi/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po skyes bu dam pa de dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 
[\[160b.7\]]mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis brtan pa dang /_theg pa chen po 'di la nges par byas par rig par bya'o/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin/_gnyis la ma yin/_gsum la ma yin/_bzhi 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]la ma yin/_lnga la ma yin/_sangs rgyas bcu la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin gyi/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /_yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dang /_theg pa chen po 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon 
[\[161a.2\]]btab pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das nye bar zhi ba nye bar zhi ba zhes bgyi ba la nye bar zhi ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gang lags/_gang nye bar zhi bas nye bar zhi ba zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[161a.3\]]stsal ba/_rigs kyi bu nye bar zhi ba nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni kun tu rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_yongs su rtog pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/kun tu rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog 
[\[161a.4\]]pa dang /_yongs su rtog pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni 'du shes yid la byed pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/'du shes yid la byed pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni phyin ci log nye bar zhi ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/phyin ci log nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyu dang dmigs pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig 
[\[161a.5\]{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/rgyu dang dmigs pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/ma rig pa dang /_srid pa'i sred pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa 
[\[161a.6\]]nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming dang gzugs nye bar zhi ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/ming dang gzugs nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni chad pa dang /_/rtag par lta ba nye bar zhi ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/chad pa dang rtag par lta ba nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar zhi ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/zhi ba'i 
[\[161a.7\]]blo gros de ltar na dmigs pa dang /_rgyu dang lta ba dang ldan pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba las 'byung ngo /_/'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar zhi na/_lta ba thams cad nye bar zhi'o/_/'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar zhi na smon pa thams cad nye bar 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]zhi'o/_/'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar zhi na/_nyon mongs pa thams cad nye bar zhi'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na/_shing gi rtsa ba bcad na/_yal ga dang lo ma dang /_yal ga phra'u thams cad skam par 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar zhi na nyon 
[\[161b.2\]]mongs pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su mi shes na nye bar len pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad 'byung ngo /_/'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes par gyur na nye bar len pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad mi 'byung ste/_gnod par 
[\[161b.3\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsol ba/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su 'tshal ba ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zhi ba'i blo gros bdag kun nas mi slong ba ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o/_/sems can kun nas mi slong ba dang /_
[\[161b.4\]]srog dang gang zag tu lta ba kun nas mi slong ba ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros lta ba de ni nang na yang mi gnas/_phyi rol na yang mi gnas so/_/lta ba gnas pa med pa de la mi gnas par shes pa gang yin pa 'di ni/_zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o/_/
[\[161b.5\]]zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]te/_stong pa nyid kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pas lta ba de mi 'dzin pa gang yin pa 'di yang zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_
[\[161b.6\]]mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /_ma skyes pa dang /_skye ba med pa'i lta bas 'jig tshogs zhes bya ba'i lta ba de mi 'dzin pa 'di yang zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig tshogs zhes bya ba de ni tshogs ma yin pa/_'byung ba ma yin pa/_rnam par 'byung ba ma yin pa 
[\[161b.7\]]ste/_de ni gzod ma nyid nas byung ba ma yin pa/_kun brtags pa'o/_/byung ba ma yin zhing kun brtags pa gang yin pa de ni yongs su brtag pa ma yin/_rnam par brtag pa ma yin no/_/yongs su brtag pa ma yin/_rnam par brtag pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni bya ba ma yin pa/_rnam par bsgrub pa ma yin pa/_
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]bslang ba ma yin pa/_shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/bya ba ma yin pa dang /_rnam par bsgrub pa ma yin pa dang /_bslang ba ma yin pa dang /_shes par bya ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa/_nye bar zhi ba dang 
[\[162a.2\]]ldan pa zhes bgyi ba/_gang nye bar zhi bas nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_dmigs pas sems 'bar bar byed de/_gang phyis dmigs par mi byed pa de mi 'bar ro/_/mi 'bar na nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na me ni rgyu las 
[\[162a.3\]]'bar gyi/_rgyu med na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du dmigs pa las sems 'bar gyi/_dmigs pa med na zhi bar 'gyur ro//_//bam po bdun pa/_zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 
[\[162a.4\]]dag pa ni dmigs pa zhi ba nyid du yang rab tu shes la/_dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa yang zhi bar mi byed do/_/nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa yang mi skyed la pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa yang skyed do/_/bdud dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa yang spong la byang chub kyi phyogs dang 
[\[162a.5\]]'thun pa'i chos la dmigs pa yang mi spong ngo /_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod pa la dmigs pa yang mi len la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la dmigs pa yang mi 'dor ro/_/stong pa nyid du dmigs pa la yang rab tu rtog la sems can thams cad snying rje 
[\[162a.6\]]chen po'i dmigs par yang blta'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa ni dmigs pa la dbang 'thob ste/_ma skyes pa'i dmigs pa la yang nges par sems la bsams bzhin du skye ba'i dmigs pa 
[\[162a.7\]]yang mi spong ngo /_/mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i dmigs pa la yang 'jug la dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba'i dmigs pa yang nyams 'og tu chud par byed do/_/mtshan ma med pa'i dmigs pa la yang dpyod la byang chub kyi sems kyi dmigs pa yang chud mi gzon to/_/
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]smon pa med pa'i dmigs pa yang rnam par mthong la khams gsum pa'i dmigs pa la yang mi smod do/_/shes rab dang thabs las nges par byung ba de ni dmigs pa thams cad la yang dbang byed par 'gyur te de mi sdug pa la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sdug pa la sems 
[\[162b.2\]]gnas so/_/mi rtag pa la dmigs nas 'khor ba la sems yongs su mi skyo ba nyid du sems gnas so/_/sdug bsngal la dmigs nas sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa bde ba la dgod par sems gnas so/_/bdag med pa la dmigs nas/_sems can thams 
[\[162b.3\]]cad la snying rje chen po'i sems gnas so/_/'dod chags la dmigs nas sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa rnams la mi sdug pa'i sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so/_/zhe sdang la dmigs nas sems can zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams la byams pa 
[\[162b.4\]]chen po'i sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so/_/gti mug la dmigs nas sems can gti mug la spyod pa rnams la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so/_/cha mnyam pa la dmigs nas sems can 
[\[162b.5\]]cha mnyam pa la spyod pa rnams la mi rtag pa'i 'du shes kyi sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so/_/'dod chags dang bral ba la dmigs nas nyan thos su 'dul bar sems gnas so/_/zhe sdang dang bral ba la dmigs nas rang sangs rgyas su 'dul bar sems 
[\[162b.6\]]gnas so/_/gti mug dang bral ba la dmigs nas byang chub sems dpar 'dul bar sems gnas so/_/gzugs la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs thob par bya bar sems gnas so/_/sgra la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra dbyangs thob par 
[\[162b.7\]]bya bar sems gnas so/_/dri la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri bsung thob par bya bar sems gnas so/_/ro la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par bya bar sems gnas so/_/reg bya la dmigs 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon pa thob par bya bar sems gnas so/_/chos la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems nges par sems pa thob par bya bar sems gnas so/_/sbyin pa la dmigs nas mtshan dang dpe byad 
[\[163a.2\]]bzang po thob par bya bar sems gnas so/_/tshul khrims la dmigs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar sems gnas so/_/bzod pa la dmigs nas tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs dang gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa'i pags pa thob par bya bar sems gnas so/_/brtson 
[\[163a.3\]]'grus la dmigs nas sems can thams cad bsgral bar sems gnas so/_/bsam gtan la dmigs nas mngon par shes pa bskyed par sems gnas so/_/shes rab la dmigs nas sems can thams cad kyi lta ba dang /_nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyun 
[\[163a.4\]]bcad par sems gnas so/_/byams pa la dmigs nas sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems med par bya bar sems gnas so/_/snying rje la dmigs nas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar sems gnas so/_/dga' ba la dmigs nas chos bstan pa la mchog tu dga' bar 
[\[163a.5\]]bya bar sems gnas so/_/btang snyoms la dmigs nas sems can rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba spang ba la sbyar bar sems gnas so/_/bsdu ba'i dngos po la dmigs nas sems can yongs su smin par bya bar sems gnas so/_/ser sna'i skyon la dmigs nas bdog pa thams 
[\[163a.6\]]cad yongs su gtang bar sems gnas so/_/'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi skyon la dmigs nas tshul khrims rnam par dag par bya bar sems gnas so/_/gnod sems kyi skyon la dmigs nas bzod pa'i stobs dang /_des pa la sems gnas so/_/le lo'i skyon la dmigs nas de bzhin 
[\[163a.7\]]gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su bsgrub par sems gnas so/_/g.yeng ba'i skyon la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan thob par bya bar sems gnas so/_/'chal pa'i shes rab kyi skyon la dmigs nas chags pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas so/_/
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas yid la byas nas theg pa chen po yang dag par bsgrub par sems gnas so/_/yid 'byung ba yid la byas nas sdig pa thams cad mi bya bar sems gnas so/_/ngan 'gro ngan song yid la byas nas ngan 'gro ngan song dang /_mi khom par skyes pa'i 
[\[163b.2\]]sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par sems gnas so/_/lha yid la byas nas 'byor pa thams cad mthar rgud par 'gyur bar sems gnas so/_/mi yid la byas nas snying po blang bar sems gnas so/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas sangs rgyas 
[\[163b.3\]]dang phrad par bya bar sems gnas so/_/chos rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas slob dpon gyi chos la dpe mkhyud med par bya bar sems gnas so/_/dge 'dun rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas phyir mi ldog pa'i chos thob par bya bar sems gnas so/_/gtong ba rjes su dran pa yid la byas 
[\[163b.4\]]nas gtang ba thams cad yongs su gtang bar sems gnas so/_/tshul khrims rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas smon pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas so/_/lha rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas/_lha thams cad kyis bstod 
[\[163b.5\]]cing bsngags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la gnas par bya bar sems gnas so/_/lus yid la byas nas/_sangs rgyas kyi sku thob par bya bar sems gnas so/_/ngag yid la byas nas sangs rgyas kyi gsung thob par bya bar sems gnas so/_/sems yid la byas nas sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa'i 
[\[163b.6\]]sems thob par bya bar sems gnas so/_/'dus byas la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas so/_/'dus ma byas la dmigs nas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas te/_zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[163b.7\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyir yid la mi byed pa'i dmigs pa de gang yang med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' de'i dmigs pa thams cad ni byang chub tu yongs su bsngo pa'o/_/chos thams cad byang chub kyi rjes su song bar mthong ba 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa ste/_zhi ba'i blo gros 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]'di lta ste/_dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sa las skye ba ni skye ba ji lta bar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi yongs su spyad par mi 'gyur ba gang yang med do/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i 
[\[164a.2\]]byang chub kyi phyir yongs su spyad pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyir phan 'dogs par mi mthong ba'i dmigs pa gang yang med do/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/_dper na gzugs gang ci yang rung ste de thams cad ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du thabs la 
[\[164a.3\]]mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dmigs pa gang ci yang rung ste/_de thams cad ni byang chub kyi rnam pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros sems can gang dag 'jungs pa dang /_byas pa mi gzo ba de dag las byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[164a.4\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang dag khro ba la spyod pa dang /_/le lo can de dag las byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang 
[\[164a.5\]]dag glen pa dang /_rmongs pa de dag las byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang dag phan mi 'dogs pa de dag las byang chub sems dpa' khong khro ba'i sems su mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can 
[\[164a.6\]]gang dag phan 'dogs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rjes su chags pa'i sems su mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang dag bsngags pa rjod pa de dag la yang byang chub sems dpa' khengs par mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang dag bsngags pa mi rjod pa de dag la yang byang chub sems dpa'i sro shi bar 
[\[164a.7\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang dag sdug bsngal ba de dag la byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po skye'o/_/sems can gang dag bde ba de dag la byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skye'o/_/sems can gang dag gdul dka' ba dang /_dmu rgod de dag la byang chub sems dpa' zhi gnas kyi 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]sems skye'o/_/sems can gang dag cang shes pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' byas pa gzo ba'i blo skye'o/_/sems can gang dag rkyen gyi stobs can yin pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rjes su srung ba'i blo skye'o/_/sems can gang dag rgyu'i stobs can yin pa de dag la byang 
[\[164b.2\]]chub sems dpa' chad pas gcad pa dang /_bsdigs pa dang /_gdams pa'i blo skye'o/_/sems can gang dag zur tsam gyis go ba de dag la byang chub sems dpas zab mo'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/sems can gang dag rnam par spros pas go ba de dag la byang chub sems dpas 
[\[164b.3\]]gtam rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/sems can gang dag bkri dgos pa de dag la byang chub sems dpas gtam [{]go rims su [,]go rim du [}]phab ste brjod par bya'o/_/sems can gang dag tshig lhur len pa de dag la tshig dang yi ge bsnyungs te gtam brjod par bya'o/_/gang dag zhi gnas sngon 
[\[164b.4\]]du 'gro ba de dag la lhag mthong gi gtam brjod par bya'o/_/gang dag lhag mthong sngon du 'gro ba de dag la ting nge 'dzin la 'dug pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/gang dag tshul khrims la chags pa de dag la mthar phyin pa ma yin pas yang sems can dmyal ba'i gtam brjod par 
[\[164b.5\]]bya'o/_/sems can gang dag thos pa la chags pa de dag la 'byung ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/sems can gang dag ting nge 'dzin la chags pa de dag la shes rab la 'jug pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/sems can gang dag dgon pa'i gnas la chags pa de dag la sems 
[\[164b.6\]]dben par bya ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/gang dag sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa la chags pa de dag la 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/gang dag gti mug che ba de dag la thos pas snang ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/gang 
[\[164b.7\]]dag 'dod chags kyis non pa de dag la mi sdug pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/gang dag zhe sdang gis non pa de dag la byams pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/gang dag gti mug gis non pa de dag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/sems can gang dag cha 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]mnyam pa la spyod pa de dag la skabs skabs su gtam rgyas par brjod par bya ste/_'di lta ste/_mi sdug pa'i gtam dang /_byams pa'i gtam dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/sems can gang dag rjes su 'thun pa'i 
[\[165a.2\]]gtam gyis 'dul ba de dag la lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi gtam brjod par bya/_lhag pa'i sems kyi gtam brjod par bya/_lhag pa'i shes rab kyi gtam brjod par bya'o/_/gang dag sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba de dag la bden pa'i gtam gyi rjes su 'thun pa/_byang chub kyi 
[\[165a.3\]]phyogs kyi chos kyi gtam brjod par bya'o/_/sems can gang dag sma dbab pas 'dul ba de dag la gdong bsgyur te phyis chos kyi gtam brjod par bya'o/_/gang dag rgyun mi 'chad par bstan pas 'dul ba de dag la rtag par rgyun du brtan pa bstan par bya'o/_/dbang po yongs su 
[\[165a.4\]]ma smin pa rnams la ni chos kyi gtam brjod par bya'o/_/gang dag sna tshogs kyi gtam gyis 'dul ba de dag la rtogs pa brjod pa gtan la dbab pa bstan pa dang /_dpe dgod pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/sems can gang dag zab mo'i gtam gyis 'dul ba de dag la rten cing 
[\[165a.5\]]'brel par 'byung ba'i gtam dang /_sems can med pa'i gtam dang /_gang zag med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/lta bar bying ba rnams la stong pa nyid kyi gtam brjod par bya'o/_/rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa rnams la mtshan ma med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/sems can smon lam la 
[\[165a.6\]]spyod pa rnams la smon pa med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/phung po la gnas pa rnams la sgyu ma'i chos kyi gtam brjod par bya'o/_/khams la gnas pa rnams la rab tu dben pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/skye mched la gnas pa rnams la rmi lam lta bu'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/'dod pa'i khams la 
[\[165a.7\]]gnas pa rnams la kun tu 'bar ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/gzugs kyi khams la gnas pa rnams la 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas pa rnams la 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/sdug bsngal gyis 'dul ba rnams la 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]'phags pa'i rigs chog shes pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/bde bas 'dul ba rnams la bsam gtan dang tshad med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/lhas 'dul ba rnams la gcig tu bde ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/mtshan mas 'dul ba rnams la nga'i ba med pa dang yongs 
[\[165b.2\]]su 'dzin pa med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/nyan thos kyis 'dul ba rnams la rjes su bstan pa dang de'i bya ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba rnams la don nyung ba dang bya ba nyung ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[165b.3\]]dpa' rnams la lhag pa'i bsam pa dang snying rje chen po'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 
[\[165b.4\]]sbyang ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan gyi gtam brjod par bya'o/_/sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba de dag la byang chub sems dpas ma tshang ba med pa dang /_'bras bu yod 
[\[165b.5\]]pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang /_shes rab yongs su dag cing dmigs pa la dbang thob pa ni 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa yin/_legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa yin no/_/bstan pa 
[\[165b.6\]]'di bshad pa na srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/_/dmigs pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bco lnga pa'o//_//de nas 'khor de'i nang nas 
[\[165b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ming ci zhes bya bar 'gyur/_de byang chub thob pa'i ming ni ci zhes bya bar 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]'gyur/_de'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[166a.2\]]ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/_'od zer kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma dang ldan pa kha dog tha dad pa 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_leb rgan dang /_
[\[166a.3\]]shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung nas 'od des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa khyab par byas te/_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas slar log ste/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub 
[\[166a.4\]]par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus pa/_'od bzang dri ma mi mnga' gser dang 'dra/_/zla ba'i zhal 'dra zhi gnas legs par bzhugs/_/nyi ma lta bu 
[\[166a.5\]]mun pa 'joms mdzad pa/_/mi mchog ci yi slad du 'dzum pa bstan/_/mos pas zhi gnas rdzing du rab tu bzhugs/_/thugs rje chu ba brtson 'grus stobs kyis 'khrungs/_/dran pas kha bye yon tan dri zhim ldan/_/bde gshegs pad ma ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad/_/dran pa snod bzang zhi 
[\[166a.6\]]gnas mar lags te/_/snying po thugs rje dri ma gsum sel mdzad/_/shes rab mar mes mun pa sel mdzad pa/_/bde gshegs mar me ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad/_/dkyil 'khor thugs rje lhag mthong 'od ldan pa/_/rab rib sel ba srid pa skam mdzad pa/_/'gro ba rgyas mdzad mig ni 
[\[166a.7\]]spyod mdzad pa/_/bde gshegs nyi ma ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad/_/khyod ni 'gro ba'i bsam pa rab tu mkhyen/_/khyod ni lhar bcas 'gro na'ang lhang nge ba/_/drang srong chen po'i zhal du 'khor rnams lta/_/mi mchog ci slad 'dir ni 'dzum pa mdzad/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje thogs nas bskal pa bzang po pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa byed par 
[\[166b.2\]]'gyur/_dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang rgyas par byed par 'gyur/_sems can tshad med pa dag kyang byang chub kyi phyir yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de bskal pa bzang po de 'das nas de bzhin 
[\[166b.3\]]gshegs pa mos pa'i bar gyi dam pa'i chos nub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur te/_de 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba der skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa des phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bstan pas 
[\[166b.4\]]'dzin par 'gyur/_don gyi tshul la yang 'jug par 'gyur/_de bzhin nyid du yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa mnyes par byed par 'gyur/_bsti stang du byed par 'gyur/_bla mar byed par 'gyur/_/rim gro byed par 'gyur/_mchod pa 
[\[166b.5\]]byed par 'gyur/_de dag gi gnan tshangs par spyod par 'gyur/_dam pa'i chos kyang srung bar 'gyur/_sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa dag kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de de'i 'og tu bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 
[\[166b.6\]]'das pa na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_bskal pa rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs 
[\[166b.7\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa zhes bya bar 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas yongs su dag pa de ni 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_lo legs pa dang /_nyams dga' ba dang /_lha dang mi mang pos
