[\[167a.2\]]gang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpas gang bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_shel dang /_byi ru dang /_spug dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_mu tig dmar pos legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams de mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris 
[\[167a.3\]]su byas pa/_lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/_ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba/_dar gyi lda ldi mang po bres pa/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng bas legs par brgyan pa/_lha'i me tog dang /_rin po che'i me tog gis khebs par byas pa/_spos kyi snying po dam 
[\[167a.4\]]pas bdugs pa/_steng gi bar snang la lha'i rol mo'i sgra len pa can du 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams de ngan song dang /_mi khom pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dga' ldan gyi lha'i yongs su spyod pa dang 'dra ba dang yid la bsam pas zas dang 
[\[167a.5\]]skom dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_gos dang /_rgyan grub cing legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro/_/lha dang mi thams cad kyang khang pa brtsegs pa la mtshungs par yongs su spyod par 'gyur ro/_/lha dang mi de dag thams cad kyang rgya chen po la mos par 'gyur te/_
[\[167a.6\]]'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos pa sha stag go/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na 'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang rung ste/_theg pa gnyis kyi ming yang mi grag par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa'i gtam 'ba' 
[\[167a.7\]]zhig gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni 'bum phrag mang por 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams de ni sems can gang yang cho ga nyams pa'am/_'tsho ba nyams pa'am/_tshul khrims nyams pa'am/_lta ba nyams par 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/zhar ba'am/_'theng po'am/_sgur po'am/_gtum po'am/_dig pa'am/_mi srun pa'am/_kla klo can nam/_lkugs pa'am/_grum po'am/_dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lha dang mi de dag thams cad kyang mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[167b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa brgyad thub par 'gyur ro/_/lha dang mi rnams kyang glo bur du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de'i yon tan tshad med pa'i rgyu'i khyad par ni 'di dag dang gzhan yang 
[\[167b.3\]]mang du yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de nam chos ston par 'gyur ba de'i tshe sku las 'od phyung ba dang /_de nas sems can de dag gis 'od de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par 'gyur gyis/_bdag cag bcom ldan 'das la chos 
[\[167b.4\]]nyan du 'dong ngo snyam mo/_/de na kha cig ni mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur/_kha cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/der lha dang mi de dag 'dus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de steng gi bar snang la shing ta la 
[\[167b.5\]]'bum srid du mngon par 'phags te gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skyil mo krung du bzhugs nas skus khyab par mdzad de/_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa sangs rgyas kyi gsung 
[\[167b.6\]]dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/de'i nang na gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ston pa dang 'gal bar byed pa'am/_zlog par byed pa'i sems can ni gcig kyang med do/_/sems 
[\[167b.7\]]can de dag thams cad ni dbang po rno ba/_mgo smos pas go bar 'gyur ba sha stag go/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de ma gtogs par rgyal po gzhan gang yang med par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams de nang yi ba med 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]cing yongs su 'dzin pa med par 'gyur ro/_/sems can de dag thams cad ni nga yi ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med par 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de lha'i bu'am/_mir gyur pa gang la bsod snyoms blang bar bzhed par 
[\[168a.2\]]gyur pa'i lha'i bu'am/_mir gyur pa de'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs lhung bzed thogs pa nye bar gnas pa dang /_der lha'i bu'am/_mir gyur pa des de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[168a.3\]]pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa bdag las bshos gsol bar bzhed do snyam nas yid kyis bsams pas 'khor gyi khyams su stan dang /_zas dang /_skom dang /_ro brgya pa'i zas sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das de la gdugs tshod la bab ces gsol pa dang /_der de bzhin gshegs pa de bshos 
[\[168a.4\]]gsol lo/_/bshos gsol nas slar bzhud par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de gang gi tshe/_nang du yang dag 'jog la 'jug par 'gyur ba de na/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin gyi bkod pas gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams de ni yon tan gyi rgyu'i 
[\[168a.5\]]khyad par 'di dag dang /_gzhan yang tshad med pa dag dang ldan par 'gyur te/_de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de kun nas yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i lung bstan pa bshad pa 'di bstan pa na srog chags nyi khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[168a.6\]]byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar shog shig ces smon lam yang btab bo/_/de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas yongs su dag pa der skye bar bcom ldan 
[\[168a.7\]]'das kyis lung bstan to/_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rang gi lung bstan pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_rdo rje de nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phangs so/_/rdo rje de 'phangs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/me tog gi char yang bab bo/_/rol mo sil snyan brgya'i sgra yang byung ngo /_/'khor thams cad kyi lag pa g.yas par yang me tog kha dog sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dag byung ngo /_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po 
[\[168b.2\]]lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/chos kyi dbang phyug rgya chen mi zad chos kyi mdzod/_/chos rnams rab tu 'byed la mkhas pa 'gro don bzhed/_/chos la thugs ma zhum zhing rtag tu lhug par btang /_/chos kyi rjes 
[\[168b.3\]]'thun chos sgrub gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can dag pa khyod kyi ye shes spyod rnam dag_/yon tan rgyal grags snyan pa 'jig rten gsum du grags/_/ye shes rgyun ni dus gsum rtag tu bas ma 'tshal/_/chags 'das zhabs mnyam legs pa khyod la phyag 
[\[168b.4\]]'tshal lo/_/zla ba las lhag yongs dag tshul khrims rnam par dag_/nyi ma las lhag 'od mdzes 'od mnga' gzi brjid mchog_/tshangs pa las lhag gsung snyan tshangs pa'i gsung mnga' ba/_/dkon mchog gsum ldan gser 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyod ni sku 
[\[168b.5\]]yang ston la sku dang ldan ma lags/_/khyod ni gsung yang rjod la sgra skad rtog mi mnga'/_/khyod ni chos kyang gsung la chos kyi 'du shes bral/_/sems can thar bar mdzad la sems can 'du shes bral/_gang dag khyod bstan thos nas ji ltar bstan pa ltar/_/bsgrub pa snying 
[\[168b.6\]]por gnas pa dag ni ma gtogs par/_'gro ba thams cad rtag tu rab tu byung yang ni/_/khyod kyi bka' drin lan lon nam yang rngo mi thog_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des ji ltar thogs thogs pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog 
[\[168b.7\]]gi phreng ba rnams bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to/_/me tog gi phreng ba de dag gtor ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog sna tshogs kyi phreng bas legs par brgyan par gyur cing mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su gnas 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]par kun tu snang ngo /_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje lung bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[169a.2\]]gsang ba pa'i bdag po khyod de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan mod/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bu'i lung bstan pas bdag lung bstan to/_/smras pa/_ci zhig thob par bya ba'i phyir khyod lung bstan/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu thob par bya ba med par 
[\[169a.3\]]lung bstan pa thob bo/_/smras pa ci zhig thob pa med/_smras pa/_sems can dang /_srog dang /_gang zag dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu thob pa med do/_/phung po rnams dang /_khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams thob pa med do/_/dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_
[\[169a.4\]]kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_'khor ba dang /_
[\[169a.5\]]mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du thob pa med do/_/smras pa/_gal te thob pa med na 'dir ci zhig lung ston/_smras pa/_mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de'i rjes su 'gro ba'i ye shes lung ston to/_/smras pa ye shes gang lung bstan/_smras pa/_gang gnyis kyis rab tu ma phyi ba'o/_/
[\[169a.6\]]smras pa/_gal te gnyis kyis rab tu phye bar gyur na/_lung bstan pa thob par mi 'gyur te/_gang gi phyir ye shes gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin pa de'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i lung bstan pa nyid byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa'o/_/smras pa/_gal te ye shes 
[\[169a.7\]]gnyis su med pas rab tu phye ba yin na/_lung ston pa ni su zhig_/lung ni su la ston/_smras pa/_lung ston pa gang yin pa dang su la lung bstan pa de dag ni mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'o/_/de dag ni gnyis su med pa'i mtha' la gnas pa'o/_/smras pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]po gnyis su med pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de la lung bstan du ci yod/_smras pa/_mtha' gang yin pa de nyid gnyis su med pa'i mtha' ste mtha' de nyid lung bstan pa'o/_/smras pa/_gang la gnas na lung bstan pa thob pa'i mtha' gang yin/_smras pa/_bdag gi mtha' la 
[\[169b.2\]]gnas na lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/sems can gyi mtha' dang /_srog dang /_gang zag gi mtha' la gnas na/_lung bstan par 'gyur ro/_/bdag gi mtha'i gnas gang gi gnas yin/_smras pa/_bdag gi mtha'i gnas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol 
[\[169b.3\]]ba'i mtha'i gnas so/_/smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i mtha' gang gi gnas yin/_smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i mtha'i gnas ni ma rig pa dang /_srid pa'i sred pa'i mtha'i gnas so/_/smras pa/_ma rig pa dang /_
[\[169b.4\]]srid pa'i sred pa'i mtha'i gnas gang gi gnas yin/_smras pa/_shin tu ma skyes ma byung ba'i mtha'i gnas so/_/smras pa/_ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba'i gnas gang yin/_smras pa/_rnam par rig pa ma yin pa'i mtha' ni gnas so/_/smras pa/_rnam par rig pas ci zhig 
[\[169b.5\]]rig par byed/_smras pa/_gal te rnam par rig par byed na/_rnam par rig pa ma yin par mi 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_ci zhig rnam par rig par mi byed/_smras pa/_rnam par rig pa thams cad rnam par rig par mi byed do/_/smras pa/_gal te rnam par rig par mi byed na ji ltar kun shes 
[\[169b.6\]]par byed/_smras pa/_gal te kun shes par byed na rnam par rig par byed pa ma yin te/_gang gi phyir rnam par rig par mi byed pa de'i phyir kun shes par byed do/_/smras pa/_kun shes par byed pa ji lta bu yin/_smras pa/_gang gi tshe rnam par rig pa khas mi len pa'o/_/smras pa/_ji 
[\[169b.7\]]ltar na rnam par rig pa khas mi len/_smras pa/_gang gi tshe tshig 'bru'i rjes su mi rgyug pa'o/_/smras pa/_ji ltar na tshig 'bru'i rjes su mi rgyug_/smras pa gang gi tshe don la rton pa'o/_/smras pa/_don la rton pa ji lta bu yin/_smras pa/_gang gi tshe don mi mthong ba'o/_/smras pa/_don mi mthong ba ji lta bu yin/_
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]smras pa/_gang gi tshe don dang don ma yin pa don du mi gnyer ba'o/_/smras pa/_gang gi tshe don dang don ma yin pa don du mi gnyer bar gyur pa de'i tshe ci zhig don du gnyer bar 'gyur/_smras pa/_gang gi tshe don dang don ma yin pa don du mi gnyer bar gyur pa de'i tshe chos don du 
[\[170a.2\]]gnyer bar 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_gal te chos don du gnyer bar gyur na de don du gnyer ba nyid ma yin nam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu chos don du gnyer ba ni ci yang don du gnyer ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang gis gang don du gnyer ba de ni chos ma yin te ni chos su mi rung ngo /_/
[\[170a.3\]]smras pa/_chos gang yin/_smras pa/_gang la chos kyi sgra yang mi dmigs pa'o/_/smras pa/_gang la chos kyi sgra yang mi dmigs pa de la chos gang yin/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu gang la yi ge rnams kun tu mi 'byung ba de nyid chos yin no/_/de bas na chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa/_sgra 
[\[170a.4\]]med pa brjod pa med pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu su zhig bdag smra'o zhes smra ba de 'chal par smra ba'o/_/gang 'chal par smra ba de la chos med do/_/'dul ba med do/_/smras pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang chos gsung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'chal par gsung bar mi 'gyur ram/_smras pa/_zhi ba'i blo gros 
[\[170a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pas yi ge gcig kyang ma gsungs so/_/ma brjod do zhes kho bos sngar ma bshad dam/_de lta mod kyi smon lam gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems can rnams kyis dmigs so/_/smras pa/_smras na nyes pa ci yod/_smras pa/_ngag gi las kyi nyes 
[\[170a.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_ngag gi las las nyes pa ci zhig 'byung /_smras pa/_yi ge la sems pas bklags pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_nyes pa med pa gang yin/_smras pa/_gang mi smra mi rjod pa de la rnam par rig pa gang yang med do/_/rnam par rig pa med pa ni nyes 
[\[170a.7\]]pa med pa'o/_/gang bdag la rnam par rig par mi byed pa dang /_gzhan la rnam par rig par mi byed pa de nyes pa med pa'o/_/smras pa/_nyes pa'i rtsa ba gang yin/_smras pa/_nyes pa'i rtsa ba ni 'dzin pa'o/_/smras pa/_'dzin pa'i rtsa ba ci yin/_/smras pa/_mngon par zhen pa ni rtsa ba'o/_/
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]smras pa/_mngon par zhen pa'i rtsa ba ci yin/_smras pa/_yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa ni rtsa ba'o/_/smras pa/_yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa'i rtsa ba ci yin/_smras pa/_lhag par dmigs pa'i lta ba ni rtsa ba'o/_/smras pa/_ci zhig la lhag par dmigs/_
[\[170b.2\]]smras pa/_gzugs rnams dang /_sgra rnams dang /_dri rnams dang /_ro rnams dang /_reg bya rnams dang /_chos rnams la lhag par dmigs so/_/smras pa/_lhag par mi dmigs pa ji lta bu/_smras pa/_gal te srid pa'i bag la nyal la lhag par mi dmigs pa ste/_zhi ba'i 
[\[170b.3\]]blo gros de lta bas na sred pa la dmigs pa spang ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan to/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/_dge slong lnga brgya ni sems rnam par grol lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyis brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 
[\[170b.4\]]thob par gyur to/_/gnyis su med pa brjod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu bdun pa'o//_//de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje brnag pa yongs su rdzogs par lung bstan pas dbugs phyin pa thob ste/_tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/_dga' ba dang /_
[\[170b.5\]]yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang thabs cig_/nyan thos chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu gsang ba pa bdag gi gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gshegs 
[\[170b.6\]]shing dgung bdun zhig bzhugs par ci gnang /_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na gnod sbyin dang /_grul bum dang /_srin po dang /_sha za dang /_dri za dang /_lto 'phye chen po mang du mchis te/_sems can gyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs gnas pa de dag gis/_
[\[170b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das mthong zhing chos kyang thos na yun ring po'i don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba dang /_grub pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur lags so/_/des na yang khro ba dang sdang ba'i sems ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi'i g.yog 'khor gang lags pa de dag gi yun ring po'i 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba dang /_grub pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la thugs brtse ba dang /_sems can tshad med pa gang dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel ba dang /_gsang ba pa'i bdag po 
[\[171a.2\]]lag na rdo rje'i bsam pa yongs su bkang ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_nyan thos chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu gsang ba pa'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gshegs te zhag bdun bzhugs par gnang ngo /_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag 
[\[171a.3\]]po lag na rdo rjes/_bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad pa rig nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' nas/_dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor 
[\[171a.4\]]ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song nas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor ga la ba der song ste rang gi gnas su phyin to/_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di snyam du bsams te/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi 
[\[171a.5\]]phyir ci nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad ngo mtshar du sems par 'gyur ba dang /_phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa rgya chen po byas 
[\[171a.6\]]par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa bya'o snyam mo/_/des yang 'di snyam du bsams te bdag gis mngon par shes te/_dus gcig cig na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub sems dpa' khri lung bstan pa'i phyir 
[\[171a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das te/_'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]po che mtha' yas pa bkod pa zhes bya bar gshegs pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdag gis lha'i dang /_mi'i bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i bkod pa mthong gis/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/_bdag gis 'jig rten gyi 
[\[171b.2\]]khams yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa bkod pa de'i bkod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes de'i tshe bkod pa chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag 
[\[171b.3\]]po lag na rdo rje bkod pa chen po'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa bkod pa de'i bkod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa zhig lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor gyi dbus na gnas par snang 
[\[171b.4\]]ngo /_/'khor gyi khyams de yang yangs shing rgya che ste/_shar nub tu chur ni dpag tshad drug cu rtsa bzhi yod pa/_lho byang du rgyar ni dpag tshad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis yod pa/_sa gzhi ni bai dUr+ya sngon po'i rang bzhin du gnas pa/_phyir ni an da rnyil las byas pa/_zung gi phrugs rin po che 
[\[171b.5\]]thams cad kyis spras pa/_'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi pad mas brgyan pa/_rgyan phreng sna tshogs du mas spras pa/_ras bcos bu du ma bting ba/_mu tig gi rgyan phreng du ma spyangs pa/_dar gyi lda ldi du mas mdzes par byas pa/_me tog gi phreng ba du mas bkab pa/_pog por du 
[\[171b.6\]]ma nas bdugs pa/_lha'i me tog kha dog du ma dang /_kha dog sna tshogs bkram pa/_bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa/_yid du 'ong ba/_lus sim par byed pa/_sems la dga' ba bskyed pa/_yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa/_bsngags pa'i bstan pa tshad med pa ste/_
[\[171b.7\]]'khor gyi khyams der seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rtsa bas brgyan pa/_rin po che'i kha khyer gyis bskor ba/_rin po che'i pad ma bkod pa dang ldan pa/_mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs pa/_mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su bres pa/_lha'i ras bcos bu du ma bting ba/_steng du rin po che'i dra ba bres pa/_bkod pa 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]sngon ma mthong ma thos pa/_'jig rten gyi khams mang po dag na med pa brgya stong mang po byung ngo /_/zhal zas ro bro ba brgyas bsgos pa'ang bshams so/_/seng ge'i khri sa la mi rten pa brgya stong yang bzhag ste/_seng ge'i khri re re'i bar snang la yang rin po che'i gdugs 
[\[172a.2\]]rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa dag bres so/_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa dang /_seng ge'i khri bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu byas nas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/_de'i nub mo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[172a.3\]]mchod par 'os pa'i zhal zas/_byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa/_ro bro ba mang po sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_bsod pa mang po yang bshams nas nam nangs pa dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi la smras pa/_grogs po dag shes par gyis shig_/kho bos bcom ldan 'das 
[\[172a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_nyan thos chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu/_gsang ba pa rang gi gnas su spyan drangs na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kho bo la thugs brtse ba'i phyir gnang gis/_de la khyed dpung dang bcas/_g.yog 'khor dang bcas par mi g.yeng ba'i sems kyis zhag bdun gyi bar du 
[\[172a.5\]]las gzhan mi byed par de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /_rim gro bya bar spro bar gyis shig_/lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_dri za dang /_grul bum dang /_gsang ba pa dang /_lto 'phye chen po ji snyed 'khod pa dang /_de ma yin pa'i sems 
[\[172a.6\]]can gzhan dag 'khod pa de dag la yang grogs po dag shes par gyis shig_/kho bos bcom ldan 'das lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor 'dir spyan drangs na gshegs par gnang gis/_de la khyed kyis ngan sems med pa dang /_sdang ba med pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_dad pa dang /_mchog tu dga' ba mang pos bcom ldan 'das 
[\[172a.7\]]de la bsnyen bkur gyis shig_/chos kyang nyon cig ces bsgo'o//_//bam po brgyad pa/_de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bu thu bo rdo rje'i sde zhes bya ba la smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis song la tshangs ris nas bzung ste/_'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams la bcom 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]ldan 'das gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gdugs tshod gsol gyis/_khyed kyi nang nas su lta 'dod pa de myur du shog shig ces sbron cig_/yab de ltar bgyi'o zhes te ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i bu des byas so/_/de nas gsang ba pa'i 
[\[172b.2\]]bdag po lag na rdo rjes bu gnyis pa lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba la smras pa/_khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis song las bla pa'i lha rnams nas bzung ste/_bar snang dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul 
[\[172b.3\]]dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams la bcom ldan 'das gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gdugs tshod gsol gyis/_khyed kyi nang nas su lta 'dod pa de myur du shog shig ces sbron cig_/yab de ltar bgyi'o zhes te ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du gzhon nu lag [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]byas so/_/
[\[172b.4\]]de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu brgya stong dag gis/_dpag tshad khri khor yug gi bar snang khyab par gyur to/_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa bshams te nam nangs pa dang /_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha 
[\[172b.5\]]ngas la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das la gdugs tshod bab pa gsol pa/_/thub pa chen po dus 'di lags/_/skyes bu gtso bo gshegs su gsol/_/skyes bu dam pa gshegs su gsol/_/skyes bu cang mkhyen 
[\[172b.6\]]gshegs su gsol/_/thub pa chen po gdugs tshod bab/_/rkang gnyis gtso bo gshegs su gsol/_/rkang gnyis dam pa gshegs su gsol/_/rkang gnyis cang mkhyen gshegs su gsol/_/tshul khrims pad ma'i rdzing nas 'khrungs/_/brtson 'grus chab kyis rnam par 'phel/_/slob ma bung ba sgra 'byin pa/_/
[\[172b.7\]]thub pa pad ma gshegs su gsol/_/'phags pa'i bden par gnas bcas te/_/byams dang thugs rje'i spyan mnga' zhing /_/bdag med pa yi sgra sgrogs pa/_/rgyal ba seng ge gshegs su gsol/_/khrims ni rtsa ba chu ba dran/_/byang chub yan lag me tog brgyan/_/rnam grol 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/_/
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]rgyal ba sdong po gshegs su gsol/_/shes rab rgya chen zab pa po/_/ting 'dzin chab ni grang ldan zhing /_/rnal 'byor pa yi tshong pas gtam/_/yon tan rgya mtsho gshegs su gsol/_/thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor dpal ldan pa/_/shes rab 'od 
[\[173a.2\]]zer legs par brgyan/_/slob ma pad ma kha 'byed pa/_/thub pa nyi ma gshegs su gsol/_/phas kyi rgol bas mi bskyod cing /_/rnam thar la sogs sman tshogs can/_/slob dang mi slob [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gtam/_/thub pa ri bo gshegs su gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[173a.3\]]kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gdugs tshod phab par mkhyen nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gsang ba pa'i bdag pos gdugs tshod phab kyis chos gos gyon la lhung bzed thogs shig_/zhag bdun byin gyis brlab pa byin gyis rlobs la 
[\[173a.4\]]gtsug lag khang skyong skos shig_/de nas nyan thos dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang dag rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa de dag ni rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bar snang las dong ngo /_/gang dag rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa ma yin pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 
[\[173a.5\]]khrod du zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas dong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las mi snang bar gyur nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni bskor/_nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis ni mdun du bdar/_lha'i tshogs kyis 
[\[173a.6\]]ni mngon par bstod/_lha'i bu mo rnams ni glu dbyangs len/_'od zer ni 'gyed/_me tog gi char ni 'bebs/_rol mo sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni len/_zhing rnams ni g.yo bar mdzad cing /_sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_
[\[173a.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi dpal chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen pos lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor ga la ba 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]der nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du thogs pa med par gshegs pa dang /_'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar thogs pa ni mi mnga'/_nyi ma'i dkyil 
[\[173b.2\]]'khor 'char ba ni 'dra/_zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba dang ni mtshungs/_lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ltar lha'i tshogs kyis ni bskor/_tshangs pa chen po ltar tshangs pa'i 'khor gyis ni bskor cing gshegs par rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshim 
[\[173b.3\]]zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man da ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_yongs 'du dang /_yongs 'du chen 
[\[173b.4\]]po dang /_man dzu sha ka dang /_man dzu sha ka chen po dang /_s+tha la dang /_s+tha la chen po dang /_mdog mdzes dang /_mdog mdzes chen po dang /_'khor lo dang /_'khor lo chen po dang /_dri zhim dang /_pad ma 'dab brgya dang /_'dab stong dang /_skar 'od dang /_skar ma dga' dang /_kun 
[\[173b.5\]]tu bsrung dang /_bsrung rtag dang /_rtag tu me tog chags dang mig tu sdug pa de dag dang /_me tog gzhan dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to/_/gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag kyang bsgreng ngo /_/rol mo sil snyan brgya stong yang len to/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[173b.6\]]'das kyis bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu me tog gi char 'bebs pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyi char 'bebs pa dang /_sil snyan dang /_glu dbyangs dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_lha'i bu mo brgya stong glu len pa dag 
[\[173b.7\]]dang /_skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du byon te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_nyan thos chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i 'dun khang du zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das sa la bzhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe sa chen po dal zhing mi 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]drag la sems can thams cad la mi gnod par g.yos par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du byon par rig nas myur ba myur bar la gor du btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/_gnyen gyi 'khor dang bcas te/_me 
[\[174a.2\]]tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa thogs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_/ji ltar thogs thogs pa'i me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[174a.3\]]la mchod pa byas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_dpung gi tshogs dang /_'khor 'dus pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_
[\[174a.4\]]thal mo sbyar nas 'dud pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi las brtsams te 'khor de ltar 'dus pa de dag la de lta bu'i gtam gyi sbyor ba mdzad pas/_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_grul bum dang /_srin po'i 'khor de'i nang nas srog chags khri nyis 
[\[174a.5\]]stong gis byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/rgyal po chen po de dag gi btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas/_bud med khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/_gnyen gyi g.yog 
[\[174a.6\]]dang bcas shing 'khor dang /_yon tan mtha' yas bkod pa'i g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan thams cad thogs shing /_sil snyan dang /_
[\[174a.7\]]pheg rdob pa dang /_rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i 'dun khang ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan bdun bskor ba byas nas ji ltar thogs thogs pa'i 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/_sil snyan dang /_rol mo byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/_
[\[174b.2\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas par lhan cig tu rang gi 'khor gyi khyams su spyan drangs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams der sa la mi rten pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa nyid kyi seng ge'i gdan ji ltar bshams pa la 
[\[174b.3\]]bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor yang stan ci rigs ba dag la 'khod do/_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang /_lha'i 'khor chen po de la 
[\[174b.4\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed de bzhin gshegs pa la bsu bgyis shig_/mchod pa dang /_rim gro gyis shig_/de ni de bzhin gshegs pas kyang /_/de la gang dag yi rang dang /_/zhal ta bya ba byed pa ni/_/de dag bsod nams skal ba can/_/de dag yon ni chung 
[\[174b.5\]]ba min/_/zhes bka' stsal gyis/_de la grogs po dag khyed kyis rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa dang /_zhal ta bya ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po long shig_/de nas lha'i bu de dag gis 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa de dang /_seng ge'i khri bkod pa yang mthong ngo /_/de 
[\[174b.6\]]mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'am/_'on te gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i 'am/_su'i yin zhes ched du brjod pa/_ched du brjod pa dang /_de dag gis bar snang las 'di ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i byin gyi rlabs yin te/_grogs po dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 
[\[174b.7\]]shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa bkod pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba chos ston pa der gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]mthong nas gsang ba pa'i bdag pos bkod pa de nyid 'khor gyi khyams 'dir byin gyis brlabs so zhes sgra thos so/_/bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i gdan de la bzhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_
[\[175a.2\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_dri za dang /_gsang ba pa dang /_lto 'phye chen po ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_thal mo sbyar te bcom 
[\[175a.3\]]ldan 'das la 'dud do/_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la smras pa/_khyed thams cad lhan cig tu 'dus la lhan cig tu tshur sheg_/ji ltar bshams pa'i zhal zas bcom ldan 'das la gsol 
[\[175a.4\]]cig_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/_gnyen gyi 'khor dang bcas/_bu dang bcas/_dpung dang bcas/_g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/_rang gi lag nas gus par bsti stang du byas te/_bza' ba dang /_bca' ba bsod pa mang po ro bro ba 
[\[175a.5\]]mang po du ma dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'os pa'i zhal zas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bstabs te tshim par byas so/_/
[\[175a.6\]]bstabs te tshim par byas nas lhung bzed gyu ste/_bcom ldan 'das phyag bcabs par rig nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na 'khod pa'i gnod sbyin dang /_srin po gang yin pa de dag kyang 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[175a.7\]]kyi zhal du bltas te/_thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te 'khod par gyur to/_/lcang lo can du gshegs nas bshos gsol ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o//_//de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la gsol 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]ba btab pa/_ci nas byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang /_phyir mi ldog pa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_sha za dang /_dri za dang /_gsang ba pa dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor 'di'i yun 
[\[175b.2\]]ring po'i don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba dang /_grub pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_khyad par gyis khyad par du mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ba dang /_nyams pa'i cha can du mi 'gyur bar de ltar chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_de skad ces 
[\[175b.3\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya ste/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag 
[\[175b.4\]]gang la zhugs na khyad par mngon du 'phags par 'gyur zhing nyams pa'i cha can du yang mi 'gyur ba'i chos kyi tshul khyed la bstan par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 
[\[175b.5\]]des bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/grogs po dag 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_dad pa 
[\[175b.6\]]yin/_dang ba mang zhing 'phags pa rnams la lta 'dod pa dang /_dam pa'i chos nyan par 'dod pa dang /_ser sna med par gtang ba gtong ba dang /_lag brkyang ste gtong ba la dga' ba dang /_mchod sbyin byed pa'i ngang can dang /_gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_sbyin pa 'ged pa la 
[\[175b.7\]]dga' ba dang /_khong khro med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_de las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa dang /_mos pa dang /_rtogs pa dang /_som nyi med la the tsom mi za zhing yid gnyis mi za ba yin/_de dkar po dang /_nag po'i lam rnams kyi rnam par 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]smin pa chud mi za bar rig nas/_srog gi phyir yang mi bya ba mi byed de/_de srog gcod pa spangs pa yin/_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_ngag rtsub po dang /_tshig kyal pa dang /_
[\[176a.2\]]brnab sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba spangs pa yin te/_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la mi dmigs pa yin no/_/de dad par gyur nas/_dge sbyong ngam bram ze gang dag yang dag par song ba dang /_yang dag par zhugs pa dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /_yon tan dang ldan 
[\[176a.3\]]pa dang /_nges pa dang /_dge ba'i chos can dang /_mang du thos pa dang /_thos pa la mngon par brtson pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa la rab tu brtson pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_dul ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba dang /_do zlog phod par smra zhing gcam bur mi smra ba dang /_dge ba'i bsam pa 
[\[176a.4\]]can dang /_mi dge ba'i chos yongs su spong ba dang /_mi rgod pa dang /_ma khengs pa dang /_mu cor smra ba ma yin pa dang /_tshig ma 'chal pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gnas pa dang /_shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_srid pa'i tshul bcad pa dang /_zug rngu phyung ba dang /_
[\[176a.5\]]khur bor ba dang /_som nyi las nges par rgal ba dang /_the tsom las rgal ba dang /_yang srid pa las rgal ba/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dge sbyong dang /_bram ze rnam pa de lta bu la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig nas sten to/_/
[\[176a.6\]]bsnyen to/_/bsnyen bkur byed do/_/mnyes par byed cing mi mnyes par mi byed la dgyes par byed de/_des dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag mnyes par byas pas chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug_/yang dag par gzengs stod/_yang dag par 
[\[176a.7\]]dga' bar mdzad de/_sbyin pas ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur bar yang dag par ston/_tshul khrims kyis ni mtho ris su skye ba dang /_thos pas ni shes rab chen por 'gyur ba dang /_bsgoms pas ni 'bral bar 'gyur bar yang dag par ston to/_/'di ni sbyin pa'o/_/'di ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smin 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]pa'o/_/'di ni ser sna'o/_/'di ni ser sna'i rnam par smin pa'o/_/'di ni tshul khrims so/_/'di ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa'o/_/'di ni bzod pa'o/_/'di ni bzod pa'i rnam par smin pa'o/_/'di ni brtson 'grus so/_/'di ni brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin 
[\[176b.2\]]pa'o/_/'di ni bsam gtan no/_/'di ni bsam gtan gyi rnam par smin pa'o/_/'di ni shes rab bo/_/'di ni shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa'o/_/'di ni 'chal pa'i shes rab bo/_/'di ni 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa'o/_/'di ni lus kyi legs par spyad

[\[176b.5\]]'di ni dge ba'o/_/'di ni mi dge ba'o/_/'di ni bya ba'o/_/'di ni bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/'di ni byas na yun ring po'i don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_grub pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston/_yang

[\[176b.7\]]med pa'i gtam dang /_ma skyes pa'i gtam dang /_ma byung ba'i gtam dang /_bdag med pa dang /_sems can med pa dang /_srog med pa dang /_gang zag med pa'i gtam rab tu ston to/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo'i gtam 'di lta ste/_'di yod pa'i phyir 'di 'byung /_'di 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]med pa'i phyir 'di mi 'byung /_'di yod pa'i phyir 'di skye/_'di med pa'i phyir 'di 'gag pa 'di lta ste/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi 
[\[177a.2\]]rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_
[\[177a.3\]]sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/_de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig pa 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di med pa'i phyir 'di mi 'byung /_'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag ste/_'di ltar ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag_/'du byed 
[\[177a.4\]]'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag_/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/_
[\[177a.5\]]sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrugs pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/_

[\[177a.7\]]rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'o/_/'di la 'jug pa'am/_ldog pa 'am/_rjes su 'jug pa'i chos gang yang med de/_gzhan du na yang dag pa ma yin pa/_kun tu gti mug pas khams gsum pa 'dogs par 'gyur te/_nyon mongs pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang /_las kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang /_
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]sdug bsngal gyi rjes su 'jug pa'i 'dogs pa 'byung ba ni ma gtogs so/_/yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu gti mug pa de yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na chos gang yang chos gang gi byed pa por 'gyur ba med de/_gang la byed pa por mi dmigs 
[\[177b.2\]]pa de la 'jug pa med/_ldog pa med do zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de chos zab mo'i gtam de lta bu thos nas som nyi med do/_/the tsom mi za'o/_/chos thams cad la chags pa med par 'jug ste/_de gzugs la mi chags so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[177b.3\]]'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mi chags so/_/de mig dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi chags so/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid dang /_chos rnams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags so/_/
[\[177b.4\]]chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /_chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben par yid ches so/_/grogs po dag de ltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas mthong ba las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/_/dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang /_dge 
[\[177b.5\]]'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/de gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der rang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_chos mnyan pa dang /_dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar skye 
[\[177b.6\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang brtson 'grus brtsams par 'gyur/_dge ba'i chos yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ro/_/de brtson 'grus brtsams pas khyim gyi gnas don du gnyer bar mi 'gyur ro/_/chung ma dang /_bu dang /_bu mo dang /_bran pho dang /_
[\[177b.7\]]bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba yongs su 'dzin pas yongs su spyod pa don du gnyer bar mi 'gyur te/_de na tshod gzhon nur rnam par rtse ba la mi dga' bas na tshod mdzes pa la bab pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]med par myur du rab tu 'byung ngo /_/de dad pas rab tu byung nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang /_dge ba'i grogs po dge ba thob par byed pa rnams dang dge ba'i bsam pa 'thob bo/_/de dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas dge ba'i chos rnams nyan to/_/
[\[178a.2\]]sgrub pa snying por byed kyi tshig lhur len pa'i blo dang ldan pa ma yin no/_/mang du thos pa yongs su btsal ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yang yin te/_ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis 'thob pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa la 
[\[178a.3\]]mi re bar gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston to/_/bdag gi tshig gi rjes su 'brang bar gzhan dag la chos mi ston to/_/de ji ltar thos pa dang /_ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du gzhan dag la chos ston to/_/chos nyan pa rnams la ni byams pa chen po 'thob bo/_/sems 
[\[178a.4\]]can thams cad la snying rje chen po skyed do/_/de mang du thos par gyur pas lus dang srog la mi lta ba yin/_'dod pa chung ba dang /_chog shes pa dang /_rab tu dben pa dang /_mgu sla ba dang /_gso sla ba dang /_dgon pa dang /_bas mthar mngon par dga' ba yin/_ji ltar thos 
[\[178a.5\]]pa'i chos rnams kyi don la yongs su rtog pa yin no/_/don la rton pa yin te tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin no/_/lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi ston par gyur pa yin no/_/bdag 'ba' zhig gi phyir brtson pa ma yin gyi/_sems can thams cad 
[\[178a.6\]]kyi don gyi phyir bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su tshol lo/_/bag yod pa lhur len pa yang yin te/_de la bag yod pa gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_dbang po sdom pa'o/_/de mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas/_mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing 
[\[178a.7\]]mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin no/_/de gzugs rnams kyi ro myang ba dang /_nyes dmigs dang /_'byung ba yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du rna bas sgra rnams dang /_snas dri rnams dang /_lces ro rnams dang /_lus kyis reg bya rnams dang /_yid kyis 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]chos rnams shes nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin te/_chos rnams kyi ro myang ba dang /_nyes dmigs dang 'byung ba yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang bag yod pa ni gang rang gi sems 'dul ba dang /_
[\[178b.2\]]gzhan gyi sems rjes su srung ba dang /_nyon mongs pa la dga' ba sel ba dang /_chos la dga' ba'i rjes su 'jug pa dang /_'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang /_gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[178b.3\]]chags pa dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi rgyu ba med pa dang /_lus kyi nyes par spyod pa'i rgyu ba med pa dang /_ngag gi nyes par spyod pa'i rgyu ba med pa dang /_yid kyi nyes par spyod pa'i rgyu ba med pa dang /_tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rgyu ba med pa dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos 
[\[178b.4\]]thams cad kyi rgyu ba med pa ste/_'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o/_/grogs po dag de ltar na bag yod par tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dad pa dang /_bag yod pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po dad pa mang ba dang /_rtag tu 'thun pa 
[\[178b.5\]]dang /_chos don du gnyer ba dang chos 'dod par bya'o/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po dad pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni 'jig rten pha rol du ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med pa yin te/_de'i sems nyes par spyod pa la mi 'gro'o/_/'phags pa rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur ro/_/gsang ba pa'i 
[\[178b.6\]]bdag po gzhan yang chos spyod pa la gnas pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni chos dang ldan par 'gro ba yin te/_sangs rgyas mthong ba rnams mnyes par byed do/_/'phags pa'i lam la yang gnas so/_/che ba nyid kyang 'thob bo/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po che ba nyid thob nas che ba nyid 'di lta ste/_de bzhin 
[\[178b.7\]]gshegs pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'i byang chub kyi sems yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang bde ba thob par 'dod pa'i skyes bu gang zag gis shin tu grub pa dang /_bde ba yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la brtson par bya'o/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po sngon 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis 'ongs pa'i 'khor 'di ji ltar lhang nge ba la la ltos/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir shin tu brtson par bya'o/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su nyams 
[\[179a.2\]]par mi 'gyur zhe na/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po bag yod par gnas pa'i lha dang mi rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/de la bag yod pa ni sems rjes su srung ba dang /_yul 'dor ba dang /_'dod pa la dga' ba rnam par spong ba dang /_chos kyi dga' 
[\[179a.3\]]ba la bsten pa dang /_'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang /_gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang /_mi dge ba rnams dang /_tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang /_chags pa dang /_zhe sdang 
[\[179a.4\]]dang /_gti mug rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang /_lus dang ngag dang /_yid kyi gnas ngan len rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa nas nyams pa'i cha dang 'thun par 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad kyi bar gyi rgyu ba med pa ste/_'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po su dad pa dang ldan 
[\[179a.5\]]zhing bag yod pa dang ldan pa des brtson 'grus gang gis bag yod par byed pa dang /_dad par byed pa'i chos de dag yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par bya'o/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po su dad pa dang /_bag yod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang ldan pa des dran pa dang /_
[\[179a.6\]]shes bzhin la brtson par bya'o/_/dran pa dang shes bzhin des byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po su dad pa dang /_bag yod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dran pa dang /_shes bzhin dang ldan pa des tshul bzhin du sbyor ba la 
[\[179a.7\]]brtson par bya'o/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po tshul bzhin du sbyor ba la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yod pa de yang yod par rab tu shes so/_/gang med pa de yang med par rab tu shes so/_/de la yod pa ni gang /_med pa ni gang zhe na/_yang dag par sbyor ba dang ldan pa la ni 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba yod de/_'di ni yod pa zhes bya'o/_/de la med pa gang zhe na/_log par sbyor ba dang /_ldan pa la ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba med de/_de ni med pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang las dang rnam par smin pa ni yod do/_/gang las de dang rnam par 
[\[179b.2\]]smin pa dang ldan pa de ni med do/_/gzhan yang kun rdzob tu mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid ni yod do/_/gang mig nas yid kyi bar dang ldan pa ni med do/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa la ni byang chub yod do/_/le lo can 
[\[179b.3\]]la ni byang chub med do/_/phyin ci log las byung ba'i phung po lnga dag ni yod do/_/rgyu med pa las chos 'byung ba ni med do/_/gzhan yang mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_'gyur ba'i chos can gyi gzugs ni yod do/_/rtag pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_ther zug dang mi 'gyur ba'i 
[\[179b.4\]]chos can dang /_yang dag par de bzhin nyid du gnas pa'i gzugs de ni med do/_/de bzhin du mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_'gyur ba'i chos can gyi tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni yod do/_/rtag pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_ther zug dang /_
[\[179b.5\]]mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang /_yang dag par de bzhin nyid du gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa de ni med do/_/gzhan yang ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba de dag ni yod do/_/ma rig pa med na 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba de dag med do/_/'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de 
[\[179b.6\]]ni yod do/_/'du byed rnams med na rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de med do/_/rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba de ni yod do/_/rnam par shes pa med na ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba ni med do/_/ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug ces bya ba de ni yod do/_/ming dang gzugs med na 
[\[179b.7\]]skye mched drug ces bya ba de med do/_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do/_/skye mched drug med na reg pa zhes bya ba de med do/_/reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni yod do/_/reg pa med na tshor ba zhes bya ba de med do/_/tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do/_/tshor ba med na sred pa 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]zhes bya ba de med do/_/sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do/_/sred pa med na len pa zhes bya ba de med do/_/len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do/_/len pa med na srid pa zhes bya ba de med do/_/srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba zhes bya ba de 
[\[180a.2\]]ni yod do/_/srid pa med na skye ba zhes bya ba de med do/_/skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams ni yod do/_/skye ba med na rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal 
[\[180a.3\]]ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams med do/_/gzhan yang sbyin pas longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba ni yod do/_/sbyin pas dbul por 'gyur ba ni med do/_/tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su skye ba ni yod do/_/tshul khrims kyis ngan song du skye ba ni med do/_/thos pas 
[\[180a.4\]]shes rab chen por 'gyur ba ni yod do/_/thos pas shes rab 'chal bar 'gyur ba ni med do/_/bsgom pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba ni yod do/_/bsgom pas 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba ni med do/_/tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang ldan na nyon mongs pa 'byung ba ni yod do/_/
[\[180a.5\]]tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang bral na nyon mongs pa 'byung ba ni med do/_/mngon pa'i nga rgyal can la ni kun shes pa brda sprod pa med do/_/mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa la ni mya ngan las 'das pa yod do/_/gzhan yang thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i stong pa nyid yod do/_/
[\[180a.6\]]nang gi rjes su song ba'i bdag ni med do/_/ye shes dang ldan pa la ni thar pa yod do/_/nga rgyal dang ldan pa la ni 'byung ba med do/_/bdag gam/_sems can nam/_srog gam/_gang zag ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni med do/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ltar na bag yod pa dang /_
[\[180a.7\]]tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten na mkhas pa rnams la yod par grags pa gang yin pa de ni yod par rab tu shes so/_/'jig rten na mkhas pa rnams la med par grags pa gang yin pa de ni med par rab tu shes so/_/de yod do zhes tha snyad 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]'dogs pa la yang mi chags so/_/med do zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa la yang mi chags te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa yang dag pa'i don rjes su rtogs so/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mdor bsdus 
[\[180b.2\]]te/_chos kyi mdo bzhir rnam par gzhag go/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze rtag par smra ba rnams dang /_lha tshe ring po rtag par 'du shes pa rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir 'du byed thams cad mi rtag go zhes bya ba dang /_lha dang mi bde bar 'du shes pa rnams kyi 
[\[180b.3\]]gzhom pa'i phyir 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /_mu stegs can bdag tu smra ba rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir chos thams cad la bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das 
[\[180b.4\]]pa ni zhi ba zhes bya ba'o/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po mi rtag ces bya ba de ni shin tu mi rtag pa'i don gyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/sdug bsngal zhes bya ba de ni smon pa dang bral ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/bdag med ces bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/mya ngan 
[\[180b.5\]]las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o/_/zhes bya ba de ni mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ltar na chos thams cad la de ltar mos shing /_tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos 
[\[180b.6\]]rnams las mi nyams shing yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang myur du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po chen 
[\[180b.7\]]po bzhi po bdag cag 'jig rten skyong ba zhes bgyi na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ji ltar 'jig rten bskyang bar bgyi/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/grogs po dag khyed kyis chos kyi bya bas 'jig 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]rten skyongs shig_/de la dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_srog gcod pa spang ba dang /_rang gi longs spyod kyis chog par 'dzin pa dang /_gzhan gyi chung ma dag la mi 'phyo ba dang /_chos spyod 
[\[181a.2\]]pa rnams la bden pa nyid dang /_gzhan gyi 'khor mi 'byed pa dang /_tha ba'i tshig med de zher mi 'debs pa dang /_tshig tsam ji lta ba bzhin te/_gzhan la mi slu ba dang /_gzhan gyi longs spyod la 'dod pa med pa dang /_gnod sems nye bar zhi ba dang /_lta ba yongs su dag cing yang 
[\[181a.3\]]dag par song ba ste/_grogs po dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o/_/grogs po dag gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos brgyad de/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang /_bla ma la gus pa dang /_thams 
[\[181a.4\]]cad du 'thun par 'dzin pa dang /_drang ba dang /_mnyen pa dang /_sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sdud pa ste/_grogs po dag chos brgyad po de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o/_/
[\[181a.5\]]grogs po dag gzhan yang yang dag par mgu bar bya ba'i chos 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa drug ste/_drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ston pa dang /_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang /_sems can thams cad la byams pa'i lus kyi las 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i 
[\[181a.6\]]chos dga' bar byed pa dang /_bla mar byed pa dang /_yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang /_dga' bar bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_gus par bya ba dang /_bsgom pa dang /_bsdu ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba dang po'o/_/de bzhin du ston pa dang /_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams 
[\[181a.7\]]dang /_sems can thams cad la byams pa'i ngag dang /_yid kyi las 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang /_bla mar byed pa dang /_yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang /_dga' bar bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_gus par bya ba dang /_bsgom pa dang /_bsdu ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin du 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]bya bar 'gyur ba gnyis pa dang gsum pa'o/_/rnyed pa gang dag chos dang 'thun pa/_chos kyi rnyed pa tha na lhung bzed kyi nang du chud pa'am/_lhung bzed par gtogs pa de lta bu'i rnyed pa dag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rnyed pa 'thun par bya'o snyam pa 
[\[181b.2\]]'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang /_bla mar byed pa dang /_yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang /_dga' bar bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_gus par bya ba dang /_bsgom pa dang /_bsdu ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba bzhi pa'o/_/tshul khrims ma nyams 
[\[181b.3\]]pa/_skyon med pa/_'dren ma ma yin pa/_sra sre ma yin pa/_rang dbang can/_ma 'bags pa/_mkhas pas bsngags pa/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams kyis ma smad pa/_gang dag yin pa de lta bu'i tshul khrims rnams kyis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 
[\[181b.4\]]mkhas pa rnams dang lhan cig tu tshul khrims 'thun par bya'o/_/snyam pa 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang /_mgu bar byed pa dang /_bla mar byed pa dang /_yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang /_dga' bar bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_gus par bya ba dang /_
[\[181b.5\]]bsgom pa dang /_bsdu ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba lnga pa'o/_/lta ba gang 'phags pa nges par 'byung ba nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang 'thun pa/_de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba dang /_sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa nges par 'byung ba'i lta ba de lta bus 
[\[181b.6\]]tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dang lhan cig tu lta ba 'thun par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang /_bla mar byed pa dang /_yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang /_dga' bar bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_gus par bya ba dang /_bsgom pa dang /_bsdu 
[\[181b.7\]]ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba drug pa ste/_grogs po dag yang dag par mgu bar bya ba'i chos drug po de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o/_/grogs po dag gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod pa dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]mug dang /_'jigs pa spangs pas 'dod pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba ste/_grogs po dag 'gro ba 
[\[182a.2\]]ma yin par 'gro ba spangs pa'i chos bzhi po de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o/_/grogs po dag gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pa ste/_chos gnyis po de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o/_/
[\[182a.3\]]grogs po dag gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos ni gcig kho na ste/_'di lta ste/_bden pa ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa/_bka' blo bde ba ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa/_gya gyu med pa ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa ste/_grogs po dag chos gcig po de ni 'jig rten skyong bar 
[\[182a.4\]]byed pa'o/_/grogs po dag de lta bu'i chos la brtson na 'jig rten skyong bar byed de/_grogs po dag khyed kyis chos de lta bu la brtson pas 'jig rten skyongs shig_/'jig rten skyong ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu dgu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du 
[\[182a.5\]]dgongs te/_gsang sngags kyi tshig gang dag brjod pas 'khor 'di thams cad dge ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di yang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag ngas 'khor 'di la brjod par bya'o snyam nas/_de nas bcom ldan 
[\[182a.6\]]'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po ngas klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas su gsang sngags kyi tshig gang dag smras pa de dag dang /_byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par 'dug nas 'gro ba la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir ngas 
[\[182a.7\]]sems kyis dran pas gang dag smras pa de dag khyed kyis dran nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dran lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag la khyod spobs par byos shig_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]po lag na rdo rje stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tsog tsog por 'dug nas lag pa gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/_gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras so/_/'di lta ste/_a hu la/_hu la ba ti/_hu la ra Na/_a gu ha/_
[\[182b.2\]]tsa tsa tsa tsa tsa/_ni Shu ra Na/_k+Shu ta k+Shu ta/_k+Sha ya k+Sha ya/_a k+Sha ya sa ma/_sha ma ni ka ra/_ha hu la hu ba ti/_khi la ba ti/_ki na a b+hi Shi ti/_nis sa ra Ni/_dza dzA dza dzA ma ti/_a ba TA/_ni ba TA/_brta brta a nu sa ra Ni/_b+hu ta a nu smri ti ho/_ma nu Sha a nu smr-i ti ho/_
[\[182b.3\]]de ba a nu smr-i ti ho/_nA ga nAM/_yak+ShaNAM/_gan d+harbA nAM/_kin na rA NAM/_ma ho ra gA nAM/_swa stir b+ha ban tu/_sarba satwA nAM/_bi ki ran tu ma hA pa ra ba ta/_saM bya tha tAM d+hA ra Ni/_gardza tu sa mu dra be ga i ti/_gsang sngags kyi tshig bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i gnas thams cad rab tu 
[\[182b.4\]]g.yos so/_/sa thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos so/_/rgya mtsho chen po yang rab tu 'khrugs so/_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yang 'dar pad pad nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[182b.5\]]khams de la zhabs gcig gis reg par mdzad do/_/de na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la ma reg tsam du nye bar 'dug ste 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bsrung du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag bskyab 
[\[182b.6\]]tu gsol/_bdag cag la gnod lags so/_/bdag cag la rab tu gnod lags so/_/bdag cag 'dar pad pad lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig_/ma 'jigs shig_/de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs 
[\[182b.7\]]pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gi yul ni 'di lta ste/_sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos pa dang /_rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs pa dang /_khyed kyang nam mkha' la gnas nas rab tu g.yos pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]su ci nas srog chags brgyad khris byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_sems can tshad med pa de dag gis bslab pa'i gnas rnams blangs par gyur pa de ltar chos rgya cher bstan no//_//bam po dgu pa/_de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag 
[\[183a.2\]]po'i bu rdo rje'i sdes bcom ldan 'das la rin po che'i dra bas mngon par bkab nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[183a.3\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bcu dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro/_/bcu gang zhe na/_khong khro ba med pa'i byams pa chen po dang /_yongs su mi skyo ba'i snying 
[\[183a.4\]]rje chen po dang /_brtsams pa thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_stong pa nyid kyi rnam par sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mngon sum du rtogs pa'i shes rab dang /_thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i mkhas pa dang /_dus gsum yongs su sbyong ba'i ye shes 
[\[183a.5\]]dang /_bden pa mthong ba sbyang bar bya ba sgrib pa med pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid dang /_ji lta ba bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i lam la 'jug pa ste/_gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mi 
[\[183a.6\]]'khrugs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i bu rdo rje'i sdes bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid thos na mi dngang mi skrag cing skrag par mi 'gyur ba lags/_bcom 
[\[183a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid thos na mi dngang mi skrag cing skrag par mi 'gyur te/_brgyad gang zhe na/_shes rab kyis brtan pa yin/_ye shes kyis brtan pa yin/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]yongs su zin pa yin/_rgya chen po la mos pa yin/_sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa'i chos las nges par 'byung ba yin/_chos la mi rtag par mos pa yin/_sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin/_chos thams cad rnam par bsgrubs par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du 
[\[183b.2\]]shes pa yin te/_gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid thos na mi dngang mi skrag cing skrag par mi 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na bgyi ba thams 
[\[183b.3\]]cad la dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bya ba thams cad la dbang dang ldan par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_legs par bsgoms shing nyams par ma gyur pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang 
[\[183b.4\]]ldan pa yin/_rnam par thar pa'i sgos yongs su bsgos pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa yin/_tshangs pa'i bla ma 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang ldan pa yin/_thams cad kyi rjes su rnam par rgyu ba'i thabs dang shes rab las nges par byung ba yin te/_
[\[183b.5\]]gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bya ba thams cad la dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo du mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[183b.6\]]kyi sgo bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can gyi dbang po la 'jug pa ye shes kyi sgo dang /_tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa shes rab kyi sgo dang /_skad thams cad kun tu 'dzin pa la 'jug pa gzungs kyi sgo dang /_chos mi zad pa bstan pa so so yang dag par rig pa'i 
[\[183b.7\]]sgo ste/_gzhon nu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs du mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs ni dgu ste/_dgu gang zhe na/_
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]snying rje bar bya ba'i phyir nges par sems pa'i stobs dang /_phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /_shes rab chen por bya ba'i phyir thos pa'i stobs dang /_rnam par grol ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mos pa'i stobs dang /_'bral 
[\[184a.2\]]bar bya ba'i phyir bsgom pa'i stobs dang /_sems bsrung ba'i phyir bzod pa'i stobs dang /_bdud tshar gcad pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems kyi stobs dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i stobs dang /_stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i 
[\[184a.3\]]phyir mi skye bar bzod pa'i stobs te/_gzhon nu dgu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs so/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i bu de dag mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/_de dag bzod pa thob nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[184a.4\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i gnas su yun ring du gnas shing spyod par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can snod du gyur pa de dag gi rna lam du grag par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 
[\[184a.5\]]slad na 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyas par 'gyur zhing ci nas kyang nub par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i bu de dag gis gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[184a.6\]]gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di lta ste/_dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang /_bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcad par bya ba'i phyir ngas khyod la bskul gyis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug pa bsrung ba dang /_
[\[184a.7\]]bdud kyi sde 'ongs pa na bdud tshar gcad pa'i phyir khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig gang dag bsams shing brjod pa dang /_kha ton byas pa de dag la khyod spobs par gyis shig_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar rig nas stan las langs te/_bla 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_de'i tshe gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras so/_/tad+ya thA/_hu lu hu lu/_hu le d+hi re/_ha ri ti/_a ku sha la k+Sha ye/_tsa le/_tsa la ba ti/_
[\[184b.2\]]sA re/_k+Shu re k+ShAn ti ba le/_k+She me/_shAn ti ka re/_k+Sha me/_sha me/_hu lu/_i li khi/_khi re/_kha re/_a be sha ni/_sa ra Ne/_dza ye/_dza ya ba ti/_s+thi re/_A brte/_bi brte/_A brta ni/_mai tre/_b+hu ta nAn/_sad gra he/_da me/_da ma sam pan ne/_tA ra Ne/_tA ra ya se swa yan/_
[\[184b.3\]]swa sti de be b+h+yo/_nA ge b+h+yo/_yak+She b+h+yo/_gan d+harbe b+h+yo/_rAk+Sha se b+h+yo/_ma nu She b+h+yo/_a ma nu She b+h+yo/_swa stir b+ha ba tu sa dA mu kha ma/_gsang sngags 'di dag rab brjod pas/_/ri yi rgyal po rnams kyang g.yos/_/sa yang rab tu g.yos par gyur/_/chu yi rgyal po rnams kyang 'khrugs/_/
[\[184b.4\]]gsang sngags 'di dag rab brjod pas/_/phas kyi rgol rnams tshar yang gcod/_/chos smra ba na yang dag bsdus/_/chos kyi mdzod ni kun tu bsrungs/_/gsang sngags gzhi 'di thos nas ni/_/lha tshogs kun tu dga' gyur nas/_/dam chos ring du gnas 'gyur zhes/_/phan tshun 
[\[184b.5\]]du ni smra bar byed/_/stong gsum po yang rab tu g.yos/_/'khor yang rab tu 'dar gyur nas/_/mi yi dbang po'i zhabs gnyis la/_/gtug pa byas te skyabs su dong /_/de dag mi 'jigs der byin nas/_/ston pas 'di skad bka' stsal te/_/mdo 'di byin gyis brlabs pas na/_/
[\[184b.6\]]dam chos ring du gnas par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas su zhag bdun 'das 'das su sems can tshad med pa dag gi don mdzad nas zhag bdun 'das te/_lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du sems can gyi don mdzad pa ji snyed pa/_
[\[184b.7\]]de dag thams cad rgyas par mdzad nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas nas gshegs te/_nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam de nyid nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni bskor/_nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis ni mdun du bdar/_lha'i tshogs kyis ni phyag byas/_lha'i bu mo'i tshogs 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]kyis ni mngon par bstod/_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding du mas ni bskor/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis ni mngon par bstod/_'od zer gyi dra ba ni rab tu 'gyed/_rol mo sil snyan ni len/_me 
[\[185a.2\]]tog gi char ni 'bebs/_zhing rnams ni rab tu g.yo bar mdzad cing sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi dpal chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gzi 
[\[185a.3\]]brjid chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen pos ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar thogs pa med par gshegs te/_slar bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la byon to/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du 'brangs par 
[\[185a.4\]]gyur to/_/bzhud pa dang byon pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_nyan thos chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe nang du yang 
[\[185a.5\]]dag 'jog las bzhengs nas chos ston to/_/de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i srog chags drug khri dang /_rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'khor dang bcas pas/_bcom ldan 'das slar gshegs par rig nas phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa 
[\[185a.6\]]thogs te/_rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang rgyal po ma skyes 
[\[185a.7\]]dgras bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di na 'dun khang na mchis mchis na/_gzhon nu 'jigs byed sbyin mchis te 'di skad ces mchi'o/_/yab bcom ldan 'das ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gdugs 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]tshod gsol nas slar gshegs zhes gda'o zhes mchi nas/_bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/_gang gi slad du gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs na yang /_sems can yongs su smin 
[\[185b.2\]]par mdzad pa'i slad du lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gshegs pas/_'di ltar gang de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su btang ba'i sems can de ni sems can gyi ris na gang yang ma mchis te/_sems can rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po 
[\[185b.3\]]'jug pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnam par nges pa lung bstan pa lung ston pas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dga' bar gyur ba'i bdag nyid chen po ni ngo mtshar to snyam bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes de 
[\[185b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed na des 'di 'dra ba'i spobs pa dang ldan par gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen 
[\[185b.5\]]po sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyis ni gnas 'di la mos par dka' ste/_'on gyis kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa de dag ni mos par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag ni bgrang ba'i tshul gyis 
[\[185b.6\]]mtha' rtogs par nus kyi/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/_de dag gi gan nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod 
[\[185b.7\]]pas des na spobs pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/_rgya che ba'i yang ches rgya che ba/_tshad med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]de'i tshe de'i dus na ma smad pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la/_'jig rten gyi khams rnam par rgyal ba can zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_
[\[186a.2\]]skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par zhi spyod ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par zhi spyod de/_rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis lus dang srog kyang btang ste/_
[\[186a.3\]]brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o/_/zhes byang chub sems dpa'i gtam 'ba' zhig yang dag par ston to/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs zhes bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[186a.4\]]'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus dang srog kyang btang ste brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o zhes de skad bka' stsal pa la/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du myur du bla na med pa 
[\[186a.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/_/snyam du sems pa de ni le lo can du grags pa lags pa snyam bdag bgyid do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams ni 'khor ba la yongs su skyo ba'i blo skye bar mi 
[\[186a.6\]]'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du 'khor ba la phan yon du lta ba lags kyi/_mya ngan las 'das pa la ni de lta ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can gyi don la brtson pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du 
[\[186a.7\]]zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus la mos pa rnams la 'khor ba ni ches bde'i/_mya ngan las 'das pa ni de lta ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi don la brtson pa de dag ni ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams kyi don bgyid pa de lta de 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]ltar bde bar 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das na slad kyis ci zhig bgyi bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas byang chub sems dpas 'khor ba'i bde ba'i ro mi myang bar 'khor ba spyod yul du bgyi ste/_mya ngan las 'das pa spyod yul du mi bgyi'o/_/
[\[186b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i bde ba'i ro mi myang bar 'khor ba spyod yul du bgyid cing sems can gyi don la brtson pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad ma mchis pa mthong bar 'gyur/_chos tshad ma mchis pa nyan par 'gyur zhing sems can tshad ma mchis pa 
[\[186b.3\]]yongs su smin par bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba spyod yul du bgyid pa ni sems can gyi spyod yul gyi rjes su 'jug go/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa spyod yul du bgyid pa ni btang snyoms su lhung lags so/_/
[\[186b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i spyod yul gyis skrag na spyod yul ma lags par lhung ste/_slad kyis sems can gyi don mi bgyid/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas par mi 'gyur zhing sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur lags 
[\[186b.5\]]so/_/de'i spyod yul ma lags pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'tshal zhing sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa la g.yel ba lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams kyi spyod yul gang lags pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[186b.6\]]spyod yul ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams ni 'khor bas skrag pa'i spyod yul ba lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'khor ba dpag tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de la byang 
[\[186b.7\]]chub sems dpas rang gi spyod yul la gnas par bgyi'o/_/rgyal po chen po de skad ces gsol pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par zhi spyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras pa legs so legs 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]so/_/byang chub sems dpas rang gi spyod yul gyi bya ba dag la gus par bya ste/_rang gi spyod yul la spyod par bya'i/_gzhan gyi spyod yul la spyad par mi bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi spyod yul gang 
[\[187a.2\]]lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rang gi spyod yul ni 'di lta ste/_'khor ba dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin pas mi skrag pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i phan yon dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'dod pa med pa 
[\[187a.3\]]dang /_nying mtshams sbyor ba med par yang shes la khams gsum du yang mtshams sbyor ba dang /_sel ba dang /_sdud pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams spel ba dang /_tshul la mkhas pa dang /_bsdu ba shes pa dang /_dge ba thams cad sogs pa la mkhas pa dang /_zad pa
