[\[187a.4\]]yang shes la bsod nams kyi tshogs mi zad pa la yang mkhas pa dang /_skye ba med pa yang rab tu rtogs la bsams bzhin du skye ba la yang mkhas pa dang /_sems can yang med la sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la yang mkhas pa dang /_chos thams cad dben par yang 
[\[187a.5\]]shes la dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la yang mkhas pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin du yang shes la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba la yang mkhas pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad chos kyi sku yin par yang shes la mtshan dang dpe byad bzang 
[\[187a.6\]]po'i rgyan rnam par bsgrub pa yongs su tshol ba la yang mkhas pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med par yang shes la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba'i rgyun mi gcod pa la yang mkhas pa dang /_'dus byas kyi chos kyang yongs su sbyod la don nyung zhing bya ba nyung ba dang /_sems can 
[\[187a.7\]]thams cad kyi ci bya'o cog la yang mkhas la lus dang sems dben par dga' ba yang shes pa dang /_chos bstan pa yang mi 'dor la smra ba la smad pa la yang mkhas pa dang /_bsam gtan yang skyed la bsam gtan gyi ro myang bar yang mi byed pa dang /_chos zab mo rtogs pa yang shes la sems 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]can gyi spyod pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su yang 'jug cing gtam yang dag par ston pa la yang mkhas pa dang /_'byung ba med par yang shes la bsams bzhin du srid pa yang yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_lhag mthong yang shes la 'bras bu thob par mi byed pa la yang mkhas pa dang /_nyan 
[\[187b.2\]]thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi yul yang yin la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba 'dod pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa la yang mkhas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mi 'dor ba yang shes la sangs rgyas kyi yul la lta ba la yang mkhas pa ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems 
[\[187b.3\]]dpa' rnams kyi rang gi spyod yul lo/_/rgyal po chen po de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par zhi spyod las spyod yul yongs su dag pa bstan pa 'di thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[187b.4\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi spyod yul yongs su dag pa bstan pa 'di legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba dang /_bdag sems pa 
[\[187b.5\]]ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i rang gi spyod yul ni chos thams cad lags pa snyam bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na gnas gang lags pa dang gzugs snang ba thams cad la mi sgrib pa dang /_/nam mkha'i spyod yul sgrib pa ma mchis pas 
[\[187b.6\]]gzugs su gda' ba thams cad ni nam mkha'i spyod yul lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod yul ni chos thams cad lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na 
[\[187b.7\]]gnod pa ma mchis pa'i slad du gzugs su gda' ba thams cad ni nam mkha'i spyod yul lags te/_dug gi shing ljon pa'am/_sman gyi shing ljon pa'am/_tsher ma can gyi shing ljon pa'am/_me tog gi shing ljon pa'am/_'bras bu'i shing ljon pa'am/_spos kyi shing ljon pa gang 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]lags pa de dag thams cad ni nam mkha' las rnam par 'phel yang nam mkha' ni de dag gis kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur/_rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur/_rjes su chags par yang mi 'gyur/_khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[188a.2\]]'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa shes rab las nges par byung ba'i rang gi spyod yul ni chos thams cad lags te/_so so skye bo'i chos gang dag lags pa dang /_slob pa'i chos dang /_mi slob pa'i chos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[188a.3\]]dpa'i chos gang dag lags pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gang dag lags pa rnams so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_/de dag thams cad ni des mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bgyi ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na zhugs ni rtswa'am nags 
[\[188a.4\]]tshal gang yang rung ste/_de las mi 'bros kyi de dag thams cad ni me sgron gsal bar 'bar bar bgyid pas phan par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi me sgron 'bar bar bgyid pas chos thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i rang gi spyod yul lags 
[\[188a.5\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper bgyid na tshan po che'i lus ni zhugs kyis mi tshig_/mtshon gyis mi khums/_dug gis mi khums te/_de pha rol gyi gnod pas mi tshugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab dang /_ye shes kyang nyan 
[\[188a.6\]]thos dang 'dris par bgyid pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang 'dris par bgyid pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang 'dris par bgyid pas zhi bar bgyid mi nus te/_de ji lta ji ltar 'dris par bgyid pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lhag mthong la brtson pa shes rab gsal bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 
[\[188a.7\]]'das 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na nor bu rin po che chab dang bar bgyid pa ni rnyog pa thams cad dang bar bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi rin po che yang sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bar bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]dper bgyi na sman gyi rigs 'bral byed ces bgyi ba de ni dug dang lhan cig tu yang mi gnas la dug thams cad kyang zhi bar bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang shes rab bsgom pa yang sems can gyi nyon mongs pa'am/_rang gi nyon mongs pa 
[\[188b.2\]]rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas shing sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang zhi bar bgyid de/_bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'dis na chos thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i rang gi spyod yul lags so/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs kyis de 
[\[188b.3\]]skad bstan pa na srog chags brgyad stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyis brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 
[\[188b.4\]]zhi spyod kyi gsung rab la byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta ste/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs zhes bya bar gyur te/_rgyal po chen po skyes bu dam pa 
[\[188b.5\]]'di ni brtson 'grus kyi go cha brtan po 'di lta bu bgos so/_/de ltar sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas so/_/dpa' stobs kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di snyam du sems te/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i 
[\[188b.6\]]lag pa g.yas pa na rdo rje thogs pa de ci lci ba zhig gam/_'on te yang ba zhig_/gang gi phyir na gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di stobs kyi shugs chen po bdog pa zhes bya snyam mo/_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis 
[\[188b.7\]]shes nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po rdo rje 'di ni lci ba yang yin la yang ba yang yin no/_/smras pa/_ci'i phyir na lci ba yin la ji ltar na yang ba yang yin/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po sems can nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_dregs pas snyems pa rnams yongs su gdul 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]ba'i phyir lci ba yin no/_/sems can nga rgyal med pa dang /_drang ba rnams la ni yang ba yin no/_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes sa phyogs de rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje de sa'i steng du bzhag pa dang /_de bzhag ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[189a.2\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis rdo rje 'di sa'i steng 'di nas theg shig_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra tshan po chen po'i stobs kyi 
[\[189a.3\]]shugs chen po dang ldan pas rdo rje de stobs kyi shugs thams cad kyis 'deg par bskyod na skra'i rtse mo tsam yang bskyod pa'am/_bsgul bar ma nus nas de ngo mtshar du gyur te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni tshan po chen po'i 
[\[189a.4\]]stobs kyi shugs dang ldan te/_go cha dang ya lad bskon pa'i glang po che yang lag pa ya cig gis gdeg pa'i rngo thog na/_bdag gis rdo rje 'di ltar chung ba 'di bskyod pa'am/_bsgul ba'i rdo yang ma thog na/_gdeg par lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_'di la rgyu ci zhig mchis/_bcom 
[\[189a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po rdo rje 'di ni lci yis/_'di la khyod yi ma 'chad cig_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka khyod rdo rje 'chang ba zhes bya na rdo rje 'di sa'i steng 'di nas theg shig_/de nas lha'i dbang po 
[\[189a.6\]]brgya byin gyis rang gi stobs kyi shugs dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang /_stobs kyi shugs thams cad bstan kyang rdo rje de bskyod pa'am/_bsgul bar ma nus so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin ngo mtshar du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[189a.7\]]bdag gang gi tshe lha ma yin dang g.yul 'gyed pa de'i tshe lag pa g.yas pas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ris kyi shing rta dpag tshad bdun brgya pa drag tu mchi ba yang 'dzin pa'i rngo thog na/_bdag gis rdo rje chung ngu 'di bskyod pa'am/_bsgul ba'i rngo ma thog pa 'di bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka rdo rje 'di ni lci ste/_'di la nga'i byin gyi rlabs ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab lci ba yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[189b.2\]]ri'i rgyal po ri rab ji tsam du lci ba ni dper bgyi bar yang sla ba ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka rdo rje 'di ni lci ste/_kau shi ka gal te gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'di rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi 'khor yug gi ril bsnun na de yang dper na phub ma spar 
[\[189b.3\]]gang gtor ba bzhin du rnam par 'thor te/_kau shi ka rdo rje 'di'i stobs kyi shugs ni de tsam mo/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams kyi nang na 
[\[189b.4\]]rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog tu bstan pa yin na rdo rje 'di sa'i steng 'di nas theg shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'di snyam du bsams te/_gal te bdag gis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di'i mdun du rdo rje 'di gdeg par ma nus na ni bdag la dbang za bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[189b.5\]]snyam nas des de 'dra ba'i stobs kyi shugs kyis rdo rje de bzung ba dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos rab tu g.yos te/_chu yang gnam du rgal cing /_rgya mtsho thams cad 'khrugs kyang rdo rje de bskyod pa'am/_bsgul bar ma nus so/_/de nas 
[\[189b.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos rnams kyi nang na rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog tu bstan pa lags te/_
[\[189b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing de ltar dbang che bar grags la de ltar mthu che ba lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gang gi tshe 'tshal na rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chab kyi phung po lag mthil gcig tu 'jog go/_/bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]khams 'di yang dper bgyi na mi la la zhig gis kar Sha pa Na gcig mdzub mo'i rtse mos bsgre bzlog pa de bzhin du bdag gis bsgre bzlog go/_/bcom ldan 'das nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba mchi ba yang bdag gis thogs par bgyid do/_/ri'i 
[\[190a.2\]]rgyal po ri rab kyang lag pa ya gcig gis blangs te tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'phen to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bo de gnyis kyang btul to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du yang mchis/_bdag gis 
[\[190a.3\]]ri rab tsam gyi khams de dag kyang 'tshal 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rdo rje 'di ltar chung ba 'di bskyod pa'am/_bsgul ba'i rngo yang ma thog pa 'di bcom ldan 'das bdag rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs de las yongs su nyams pa'am gcig tu ma gyur lags sam/_bcom 
[\[190a.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu chen po khyod rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs de las yongs su nyams pa ni med mod kyi/_byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi byin gyi rlabs 'di nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rnam par dkrug par mi nus na/_sems can 
[\[190a.5\]]gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci dgos/_maud gal gyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na ri'i rgyal po ri rab yod pa rnams ni bskyod pa'am/_bsgul bar nus kyi/_rdo rje 'di ni sa phyogs 'di nas bskyod pa'am/_bsgul bar mi nus so/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal 
[\[190a.6\]]gyi bu chen pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rdo rje 'di 'chang bas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ni stobs che ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams na ri rab ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad ri gcig 
[\[190a.7\]]tu gyur kyang de ni gdeg par nus kyi/_rdo rje 'di ni gdeg par mi nus so/_/de nas gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po ngo mtshar du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rdo rje 'di 'chang bas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di ni stobs kyi 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]shugs chen po dang ldan pa lags te ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji lags/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i stobs de pha ma las gyur pa lags sam/_'on te rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu pha ma 
[\[190b.2\]]las gyur pa'i stobs de ni gang ci yang rung ste 'jug pa tsam du ming bstan par zad do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs de ma lus par bstan na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten myo myo por 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis glang po che'i lta 
[\[190b.3\]]stangs kyis phyogs thams cad du kun tu gzigs te/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po khyod kyis rdo rje 'di sa'i steng 'di nas theg shig_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[190b.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams g.yos par byas nas sa'i steng de nas rdo rje de lag pa g.yon pas blangs te/_steng gi bar snang du 'phangs nas des de bar snang la lan bdun bskor te/_lag pa g.yas par gzhag go/_/de na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur te thal mo sbyar nas 
[\[190b.5\]]gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal te/_'di ltar rdo rje 'di 'chang bas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ji tsam du stobs kyi shugs dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyang 'di lta bu'i stobs dang ldan par gyur cig ces smras so/_/de nas 
[\[190b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na stobs 'di lta bu 'thob/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na stobs 'di lta bu 'thob ste/_
[\[190b.7\]]bcu gang zhe na/_rgyal po chen po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lus dang srog ni yongs su gtong gi dam pa'i chos ni yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_sems can thams cad la 'dud cing nga rgyal 'phel bar mi byed pa dang /_sems can mthu chung ba rnams la bzod cing khong khro bar mi byed pa dang /_sems 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]can bkres pa rnams la kha zas bzang po mchog sbyin pa dang /_sems can 'jigs pa rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang /_sems can nad pa rnams la yang dag pa'i gso ba bya bar spro ba dang /_sems can dbul po rnams la longs spyod dag gis tshim par byed pa 
[\[191a.2\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rdo thal gyis skud pa dang /_sems can rnams la kun tu dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshig sgrogs pa dang /_sems can dbul po sdug bsngal ba/_ngal ba chad pa rnams kyi khur khyer ba ste/_rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu 
[\[191a.3\]]po de dag dang ldan na stobs 'di lta bu 'thob bo/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' cang shes pa la gnas shing cang shes pa'i 'gro bar 'gro ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na cang shes 
[\[191a.4\]]par 'gyur zhing cang shes pa'i 'gro bar 'gro ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bka' blo bde ba dang /_drang ba dang /_mnyen pa dang /_des pa dang /_g.yo med pa dang /_sgyu med pa dang /_phrag dog med pa dang /_sems las su rung ba ste/_rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na cang shes 
[\[191a.5\]]par 'gyur zhing cad shes pa'i 'gro bar 'gro'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi cang shes kyi 'gro ba du zhig mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi cang shes kyi 'gro ba bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_gang gi tshe mi'i 'jig rten 
[\[191a.6\]]du skyes pa de'i tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te/_der yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin du 'gyur te/_der yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs par 'gyur te/_der yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang /_
[\[191a.7\]]khyim bdag tshong dpon du 'gyur te/_der yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa ste/_rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi cang shes kyi 'gro ba'o/_/rgyal po ma skyes dgras gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dad pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]rgyal po chen po dad pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po sbyin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni longs spyod do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/_
[\[191b.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni shes rab bo/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po tshul khrims kyi rgyu 'thun pa ni bde 'gro thams cad du 'gro ba'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i 
[\[191b.3\]]rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po bzod pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni sems can rjes su srung ba'o/_/gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po brtson 'grus kyi rgyu 'thun pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams 
[\[191b.4\]]cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/_bka' stsal ba/_rgyal po chen po bsam gtan gyi rgyu 'thun pa ni nye bar zhi ba'o/_/gsol pa/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/_bka' stsal 
[\[191b.5\]]pa/_rgyal po chen po shes rab kyi rgyu 'thun pa ni nyon mongs pa thams cad sel ba'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos nyan pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po chos nyan pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni the tsom spong ba'o/_/gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das chos yongs su 'dri ba'i rgyu 'thun pa 
[\[191b.6\]]ci lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po chos yongs su 'dri ba'i rgyu 'thun pa ni som nyi med pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dben bar gnas pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po dben par gnas pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa thob pa'o/_/gsol pa/_
[\[191b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das bsgom pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po bsgom pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni 'bral ba'o/_/gsol ba bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po mi rtag pa thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni yongs su 'dzin pa 'dor ba'o/_/gsol pa/_
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po sdug bsngal thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni nye bar len pa med pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag med pa thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal 
[\[192a.2\]]po chen po bdag med pa thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa 'gog pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das zhi ba thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po zhi ba thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni nye bar zhi ba'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[192a.3\]]'das tshul bzhin yid la bgyid pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba skye ba'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das lus dang sems dben pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/_bka' 
[\[192a.4\]]stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po lus dang sems dben pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa skye ba'o/_/gsol pa/_/bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po lam gyi rgyu 'thun pa ni 'bras bu mngon par rtogs pa'o/_/
[\[192a.5\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po mos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni rnam par grol ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal 
[\[192a.6\]]po chen po sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i rgyu 'thun pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'thob pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung ba ji lta bu lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ji lta ba bzhin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub tu 
[\[192a.7\]]sems bskyed pa ji lta bu lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po snying rje chen po bskyed pa ji lta ba bzhin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung ba su'i lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po su dad pa skyed pa'i 'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dad pa skyed pa su lags/_bka' 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po su byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de su lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po su lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das su'i lhag 
[\[192b.2\]]pa'i bsam pa rnam par mi 'khrugs pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po su snying rje chen po skyed pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po skyed pa ji lta bu lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po ji ltar sems can rnams la yongs su mi gtong ba 
[\[192b.3\]]skyed pa lta bu'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na sems can rnams yongs su mi gtong ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe bdag gi bde ba yongs su gtong ba'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bde ba yongs su gtong ba ji lta bu 
[\[192b.4\]]lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po su dkon mchog gsum yongs su mi gtong ba yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog gsum yongs su mi gtong ba su lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po su nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba de dkon 
[\[192b.5\]]mchog gsum yongs su mi gtong ba yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'dul ba bstan pa legs par gsungs pa dang /_ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa legs par bcas 
[\[192b.6\]]pa dang /_ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan pa rjes su 'thun pa dang /_rgyu dang 'bras bu chab mi 'tshal ba dang /_rtag pa dang /_chad pa ma mchis pa dang /_las dang bya ba la 'jug pa bstan pa dang /_dge ba dang mi dge ba chab mi 'tshal ba dang /_mi slu ba'i mtshan nyid 
[\[192b.7\]]legs par gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang /_sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa dag ma gtogs pa 'di ltar rgya che zhing 'di ltar gya nom pa'i bstan pa 'di la brtson pa 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]rnams la su zhig zlog par bgyid/_gnod par bgyid/_spong bar bgyid/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la byas pa mi gzo bar mi bgyi'o/_/gang gi mthus bdag nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad dang /_sdig pa thams cad las rnam par 
[\[193a.2\]]log pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag gi sha dang /_khrag gis kyang bka' drin glan pa'i rngo mi thog lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi mthus bdag gis bzang po ma lags pa'i 'gyod pa chen po bsal ba dang /_chos snang ba chen po thob par bgyid pa'i 'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[193a.3\]]nur gyur pa yun ring po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la yang bdag gis lan glan pa'i rngo mi thog lags so/_/tshangs pa'i spyod pa 'di mtha' dag ni 'di lta ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ngo /_/zhes bgyi ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'o/_/
[\[193a.4\]]ma skyes dgras zhus pa lung bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//bam po bcu pa ste tha ma/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gsang ba 
[\[193a.5\]]pa'i bdag po gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa sprul pa de'i tshe/_khyod kyang sprul pa sprul lam/_lag na rdo rjes smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du bzhugs pa 'di kho bo'i dbang yin te/_zhi ba'i blo gros gal te de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[193a.6\]]pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig sprul na kho bo'i sprul pa gzugs tha dad pa/_rnam par rtsen pa tha dad pa yang de snyed de dag gi rjes su 'brang ba yin te/_zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni sngon gyi bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo 
[\[193a.7\]]gros kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang gi phyir phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya tha ma la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa dang /_rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa skyes bu dam pa de dag gi 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]lag tu 'gro bar de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba thob shig_/gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs zin to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yi ge gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsnyad 
[\[193b.2\]]pa'i yi ge de dag ni ma skyes pa/_zad par mi 'gyur ba/_nub par mi 'gyur ba'o/_/yi ge gang dag gis don gang brjod pa'i don de yang nub par bya bar mi nus pa'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos ni nub par 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[193b.3\]]de la skye ba ci yang med do/_/gang skye ba med pa de mi 'gag go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di la dgongs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[193b.4\]]'di ni 'dug pa nyid do/_/zhes gsungs te/_de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mi 'gal ba yin no/_/gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mi 'gal ba de dam pa'i chos yin no/_/dam pa'i chos gang yin pa de rtag par mi nub ste/_des na dam pa'i chos zhes bya'o/_/zhi 
[\[193b.5\]]ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang dag dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir go cha gyon pa de dag gang du go cha gyon/_smras pa/_gang dag dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir go cha gyon pa de dag ni chos thams cad dang mi 'gal bar bya ba'i phyir go cha gyon no/_/de ci'i 
[\[193b.6\]]phyir zhe na/_gang chos thams cad dang mi 'gal ba de nyid dam pa'i chos so/_/smras pa/_ji ltar na chos dang 'gal ba yin/_smras pa/_yi ge dang 'gal na chos dang 'gal ba yin te/_chos dang ni nam yang 'gal bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de la gang dag mi 'gal ba de dag dam pa'i 
[\[193b.7\]]chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/smras pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang dag 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal ba de dag dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i rnam grangs yod dam/_smras pa/_zhi ba'i blo gros yod de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig rten ni lta ba la mngon par 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]zhen pa yin la/_de ni stong pa nyid du smra ba yin te/_des na de 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal lo/_/'jig rten ni rtag pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bdag dang /_bdag gir smra ba yin la de ni mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_mi sdug pa dang /_
[\[194a.2\]]bdag dang bdag gir med par smra ba yin te/_des na de 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal lo/_/'jig rten ni rgyun phyogs su 'gro ba yin la de ni rgyun las bzlog ste/_'gro bas des na de 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal lo/_/'jig rten ni tshe 'di lhur len pa yin la/_de ni 
[\[194a.3\]]tshe rabs 'pho ba lhur len pa yin te/_des na de 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal lo/_/'jig rten ni phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin la de ni chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/des na de 'jig rten 
[\[194a.4\]]thams cad dang 'gal lo/_/zhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs 'dis na gang dag 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal ba de dag dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin to/_/smras pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po khyod dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin tam/_smras pa rigs kyi bu yongs su 'dzin te/_
[\[194a.5\]]bdag yongs su mi 'dzin/_sems can yongs su mi 'dzin/_chos yongs su mi 'dzin to/_/smras pa/_ji ltar yongs su 'dzin/_smras pa/_bdag dben pa dang /_sems can dben pa dang /_chos dben pa dang /_bdag dang /_sems can dang /_chos dben pa ma yin pa dang /_
[\[194a.6\]]'das pa dben pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dben pa dang /_da ltar byung ba dben pa dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus dben pa dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus dben pa ma yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas dben pa dang /_sangs rgyas dben pa ma yin 
[\[194a.7\]]pa dang /_zhing dben pa dang /_zhing dben pa ma yin pa dang /_chos dben pa dang /_chos dben pa ma yin par gang de ltar chos rnams rjes su rtogs pa de ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba gnang 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]ste/_skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so/_/'di ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni gang chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa dang /_mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang /_gang chos thams cad la mtshan ma dang spros par mi 
[\[194b.2\]]'dzin pa dang /_kun tu spyod pa med pa dang /_gang yongs su rtog pa thams cad la mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa'o/_/de'i tshe lha'i bu rgyal po bzang zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das nye bar zhi ba ni 
[\[194b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi bka' lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi bka' ni nye bar zhi bar bgyi ba'i ched lags te/_nye bar zhi ba gang lags pa des sangs rgyas kyi bka'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de la gang dag dmigs pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar mthong ba de dag nye bar zhi ba lags 
[\[194b.4\]]te/_de dag ni slad kyis 'bar ba ma lags/_mched pa ma lags 'bar bar bgyid pa ma lags so/_/gang dag zhi ba dang /_rab tu zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin cing mi 'dor ba lags te/_ji ltar chos thams cad mi 'dzin mi 
[\[194b.5\]]'dor ba de ltar 'dzin to/_/lha'i bu des de skad bstan pas dge slong stong ni sems rnam par grol lo/_/lha'i bu stong ni chos kyi mig rnam par dag go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis lha'i bu rgyal po bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu spobs pa 
[\[194b.6\]]'di su'i yin/_smras pa/_spobs pa 'di ni su bag chags thams cad spangs pa dang /_tshig gi lam thams cad med pa dang /_don dam pa brjod du med pa dang /_mngon par zhen pa med pa de dag gi spobs pa yin no/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu spobs pa ji ltar skye/_smras pa/_spobs pa 
[\[194b.7\]]med pa dang /_spobs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_spobs pa med pa zhes bya ba de ni nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa'i tshig go/_/spobs pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba de ni spros pa med pa'i tshig go/_/rigs kyi bu 'di skad du spobs pa 'di su'i yin zhes smras pa la/_'di ni su gzhan gyi rnam par 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]rig pa la rnam par shes pa mi 'jug pa dang /_bdag gi rnam par rig pa la rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa de'i spobs pa'o/_/'di ni su dmigs pa la yang yid kyi rnam par rig pa mi dmigs la dmigs pa med pa'i chos nyid la yang mi gnas pa de'i spobs pa'o/_/
[\[195a.2\]]'di ni su chos thams cad la yang shes pa mi 'jug la de shes pas chos gang yang rab tu ma rtogs pa med pa de'i spobs pa'o/_/'di ni su gnas pa med pa dang /_len pa med pa dang /_'dor ba med pa dang /_chu bo las rgal ba de'i spobs pa'o/_/'di ni skye ba med la skyes pa dang 'gog pa yang 
[\[195a.3\]]med la mya ngan las 'da' bar yang 'gyur ba de'i spobs pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu rgyal po bzang 'di'i spobs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[195a.4\]]zhi ba'i blo gros lha'i bu rgyal po bzang 'di ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan par 'dod nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba nas 'dir 'ongs so/_/
[\[195a.5\]]zhi ba'i blo gros lha'i bu rgyal po bzang 'dis chos kyi rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob ste/_de 'dod na bskal pa brgya stong du thogs pa med pa'i spobs pas bstan kyang 'di'i spobs pa zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po bzang gi le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gsum 
[\[195a.6\]]pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zhi ba'i blo gros chos kyi 
[\[195a.7\]]rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pa ni gang yi ge rnams la yi ge'i rjes su 'jug pa shes pa ste/_zhi ba'i blo gros chos thams cad ni a zhes bya ba'i rjes su 'jug pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni a zhes bya ba'i sgo'o/_/a zhes bya ba las byung ba'o/_/a zhes bya ba'i mtha'o/_/a zhes bya ba ni tshig gi 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]las thams cad la las byed do/_/a zhes bya ba ni mi shes pa'o/_/rnam par ma shes pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni a zhes bya ba'i rjes su 'jug ste/_de'i phyir rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs zhes bya'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros rjes su 'jug pa ni de la chos phra rab tsam yang 
[\[195b.2\]]zhugs pa med pa dang /_byung ba med pa'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros yi ge de dag ni ga zhig nas lhags nas khong pa'i nang du 'jug pa med do/_/yi ge de dag ni khong pa'i nang du gnas pa ma yin no/_/yi ge de dag ni byung nas phyogs ga zhig tu 'gro ba ma yin no/_/yi ge de dag ni phan tshun 'bar 
[\[195b.3\]]bar byed pa ma yin no/_/yi ge de dag ni smras kyang rung ma smras kyang rung ste/_zad par 'gyur ba'am/_'phel bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/yi ge de dag ni chos zhe'am/_chos ma yin zhes bya bar rnam par mi rtog go/_/yi ge de dag ni sus kyang bskyed pa'am/_bkag pa med do/_/
[\[195b.4\]]yi ge de dag ni sus kyang byas pa'am/_chud gzan pa med do/_/zhi ba'i blo gros yi ge bgrang ba ji lta bar sems bgrang ba yang de bzhin no/_/sems bgrang ba ji lta bar chos thams cad bgrang ba yang de bzhin no/_/chos thams cad bgrang ba ji lta bar bgrang ba med pa yang de bzhin no/_/
[\[195b.5\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos ni bgrang bar nye bar 'gro ba ma yin te bgrang ba med pa ni chos bgrang ba'o/_/ji ltar chos bgrang bar nye bar mi 'gro ba bzhin du a zhes bya ba'i rjes su 'jug pa yang de lta bu ste/_gzod ma nyid nas ma skyes pa la 'jug pa/_skye ba med pa la 'jug pa'o/_/ma skyes pa 
[\[195b.6\]]dang ma byung ba gang yin pa de la 'jug pa gang yang med do/_/de ltar na 'jug pa med pa ni rjes su 'jug pa'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros su bgrang ba 'di la zhugs pa de'i spobs pa rgyun gcad par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyun chad pa med pas des chos nyid rjes su rtogs so/_/des chos nyid 
[\[195b.7\]]mi zad par rjes su rtogs so/_/de ji lta ji ltar chos ston pa de lta de ltar chos de dag rjod cing mngon du 'gyur ro/_/de chos kyi rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pa 'di lta bu 'dis sems can gyi rnam pa la 'jug go/_/sems can gyi rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pas mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston to/_/
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]zhi ba'i blo gros gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems kyi dri ma med pa yin no/_/bsam pas rnam par dag pa yin no/_/sbyor bas gtsang ma yin no/_/lhag pa'i bsam pas mngon du 'phags pa yin no/_/bsgrub pa la legs par gnas pa yin no/_/
[\[196a.2\]]shes rab kyis mngon du 'phags pa yin no/_/dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud pas brtan pa yin no/_/bdud rnams kyis mi shigs pa yin no/_/pha rol mu stegs byed rnams kyis mi 'dus pa yin no/_/nyon mongs pa rnams kyis mi rdzi ba yin no/_/pha rol rgol ba 
[\[196a.3\]]rnams kyis mi thub pa yin no/_/lus kyis stobs dang ldan pa yin no/_/sems kyis zhum pa med pa yin no/_/spobs pas mi zad pa yin no/_/bstan pa rnams la mtha' yas pa yin no/_/nges pa'i tshig rnams la mu med pa yin no/_/ye shes kyis chags pa med pa yin no/_/
[\[196a.4\]]blos gting dpag dka' ba yin no/_/bden pa bstan pa rnams la don zab pa yin no/_/thos pas rgya mtsho lta bu yin no/_/ting nge 'dzin gyis lhun po dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/'khor gyi nang na seng ge dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi chos rnams la pad ma dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/
[\[196a.5\]]sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bas sa dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/nyon mongs pa dang sred pa 'khru bas chu dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pas me dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas zla ba dang mtshungs pa 
[\[196a.6\]]yin no/_/nyon mongs pa'i mun pa sel bas nyi ma dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'joms pas dpa' bo dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/sems shin tu dul bas glang po dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/chos mngon du sgrogs pas 'brug dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/chos kyi char 'bebs 
[\[196a.7\]]pas char pa dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad zhi bar byed pas sman pa dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/chos kyi rgyal srid byed pas rgyal po dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyi chos skyong bas 'jig rten skyong ba dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/lha dang mi rnams kyi spyan du gyur 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]pas brgya byin dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/dbang thob ste rang gi sems la dbang sgyur bas tshangs pa dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/gnas med par rgyu bas bya dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/'du 'dzis 'jigs shing skrag pas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang spre'u dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/sems can thams cad kyi nyes par 
[\[196b.2\]]byas pa thams cad bzod pas ma dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/bzo thams cad slob pas pha dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/chos rin po che thams cad sbyin pas rnam thos kyi bu dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/bsod nams dag gis brgyan pa yin no/_/mtshan rnams kyis klubs pa yin no/_/
[\[196b.3\]]dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis spras pa yin no/_/'jig rten gyis blta bar bya ba yin no/_/lta ba'i gzhi yin no/_/'phags pa'i nor bdun dang ldan pas mi dbul ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba yin no/_/rig pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yin no/_/mkhas 
[\[196b.4\]]pa thams cad kyis skur pa mi gdab pa yin no/_/lha rnams kyis legs par bsrungs pa yin no/_/klu dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis legs par bzung ba yin no/_/chos bstan pa rnams la dbang phyug tu gyur pa yin no/_/mngon par shes pa rnams la dbang sgyur ba yin no/_/
[\[196b.5\]]sems can gyi bsam pa rnams la rjes su song ba yin no/_/sems can gyi dbang po rnams la rjes su zhugs pa yin no/_/chos bstan pa la chog mi shes pa yin no/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti don du mi gnyer ba yin no/_/chos bstan pa dag la ser sna med pa yin no/_/tshul 
[\[196b.6\]]khrims rnam par dag pas nyon mongs pa med pa yin no/_/bzod pa yongs su dag pas gnod pa med pa yin no/_/brtson 'grus yongs su dag pas las kyi mtha' legs par mthar phyin pa yin no/_/bsam gtan yongs su dag pas cang shes pa yin no/_/shes rab yongs su dag 
[\[196b.7\]]pas blo legs par dkar ba yin no/_/tshad med pa rnams la tshangs pa'i bla ma yin no/_/bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la 'jig rten las 'das pa yin no/_/byang chub kyi lam gyis bla na med pa yin no/_/dbang bskur ba thob pas yon tan gyi rnam pa 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa ni yon tan gyi bsngags pa tshad med pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin te/_zhi ba'i blo gros gal te de bzhin gshegs pas phrin las gzhan mi mdzad par lo brgya stong du rgyun tu byang chub sems 
[\[197a.2\]]dpa' gzungs thob pa'i bsngags pa brjod kyang zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis lha'i bu rgyal po bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pas khyod kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa mtha' yas pa brjod pa mdzad pa ni khyod kyis 
[\[197a.3\]]rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_lha'i bu rgyal po bzang gis byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di la yang dag pa don dam par na/_gang de ltar bsngags pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/_/rigs kyi bu gang la kha dog med pa 
[\[197a.4\]]dang /_gzugs med pa dang /_dbyibs med pa de'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa dang /_gzugs kyi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/_/gang la gzugs dang /_kha dog dang /_dbyibs 'ba' zhig yod pa de'i bsngags pa ni brjod par nus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu rgyal po bzang gis 'di skad 
[\[197a.5\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni ma bsdus pa/_nga'i ba ma mchis pa/_yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa/_gang gis kyang nye bar sprad par bgyi ba ma lags pa/_gang gis kyang bsal ba ma lags pa ste/_'di la brtson pa dang /_yang dag par sbyor bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das brtson pa 
[\[197a.6\]]dang /_yang dag par sbyor bar gyur pa rnams la chos de dag mngon du 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi nas chen po 'di ni chab kyi phung po'i steng na gnas te/_de la mi gang zhig khron pa 'am/_khron pa chen po rko ba de chab dang ldan par 'gyur te/_gang mi rko ba des ni mi rnyed 
[\[197a.7\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i ye shes de la su zhig brtson par bgyid pa de ni ye shes 'thob par 'gyur te/_su brtson par mi bgyid pa des ni ye shes 'thob par mi 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas byang chub don du gnyer ba 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]rnams kyis rtag tu brtson pa dang /_brtson 'grus brtsom par bgyi'o/_/de ltar na brtson pa de dag la chos de dag mngon du 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na skyes bu dmus long gis de las skyes pa'i gzugs rnams mi mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du 
[\[197b.2\]]nyon mongs pas ldongs pa'i sems can rnams kyang de las skyes pa'i chos rnams mi mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na skyes bu mig dang ldan yang snang ba ma mchis na mi mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang dag lha'i mig dang ldan du lags kyang 
[\[197b.3\]]de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi man ngag ma mchis na mos par mi 'gyur/_mthong bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na lha'i mig la ni snang bas bgyi ba ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du yongs su sbyang ba bgyis pa la yang rjes su bstan mi 
[\[197b.4\]]'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na mngal na mchis pa'i sems can ni mi gda' mi mthong yang skye lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub kyang mi mthong mod kyi/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis kyang skye'o/_/
[\[197b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na ri'i rgyal po gangs can la shing ljon pa gang skyes pa de ni bar ma dor chag pa'am/_skam par mi 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du 'phags pa'i chos la sbyor bar brtson pa gang gi shes pa skyes pa de yang mi 'jig cing yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur 
[\[197b.6\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na gang gi tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byung ba de'i tshe rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_bdun pa blon po rin po che dag 'byung bar 
[\[197b.7\]]'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub kyi sems skye ba de'i tshe chos rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_thabs 'byung bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na gang gi tshe 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu ba de'i tshe sems can rnams la de'i byams pa tha dad pa ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang /_snyan par smra ba dang /_don spyad pa 
[\[198a.2\]]dang /_don 'thun pas sems can dag sdud pa de'i tshe sems can rnams la de tha dad pa ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na gang gi tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'dun khang na mchis pa de'i tshe 'thab pa dang rtsod pa ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[198a.3\]]du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam gyi slad du mchis pa de'i tshe 'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa'i gtam ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na gang gi tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas par 'gyur ba de'i tshe thog mar ri'i rgyal po ri 
[\[198a.4\]]rab dang /_rgya mtsho chen po gnas par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' thog mar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de'i tshe lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_snying rje chen po thog mar gnas lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na gang gi tshe 
[\[198a.5\]]gdugs 'char ba de'i tshe ri gang dag mtho ba de dag la thog mar 'od zer 'bab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi snang ba thog mar byung ba de'i tshe sems can gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa de dag gis ye shes kyi snang ba de myong bar 'gyur lags so/_/
[\[198a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na sa bon thams cad dang /_rtswa dang /_shing gel ba dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal thams cad ni sas bzed de thams cad las bcud mnyam du gtong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad 
[\[198a.7\]]la chos kyi bsam pa'i gtong bas sems chags pa ma mchis par gtong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu rgyal po bzang la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/_lha'i bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dpe dgod pa bstan pa 'di legs par smras pa legs so legs so/_/
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]lha'i bu rtswa dang /_nags tshal ji snyed pa dang /_ming gi brda dang /_chos kyi brda dang /_sgra'i brda dag ji snyed pa dang /_gzugs dang /_kha dog gi brda dag ji snyed pa dang /_sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa ji snyed pa dang /_ming dang gzugs rab tu brjod pa ji snyed 
[\[198b.2\]]pa dang /_sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ji snyed pa dang /_sems can rnams kyi yongs su spyad pa zas skom ji snyed par lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs thob pa'i dpe dgod pa bstan pa yang de snyed do/_/lha'i bu dag gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig 
[\[198b.3\]]gang ci yang rung ste/_sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin pa med do/_/gzugs su snang ba 'am/_sgra 'am/_dri 'am/_ro 'am/_reg bya 'am/_chos su snang ba gang ci yang rung ste/_de la gang snang bar mi 'gyur ba de med do/_/de la gzhan las thos pa la rag las pa'i 
[\[198b.4\]]spobs pa med do/_/gzhan gyi ngor lta ba la rag las pa'i bstan pa med do/_/de mi zad pa dang /_mtha' yas pa dang /_thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang /_thams cad la 'jug pa'i rjes su song ba yin no/_/de la rgyun chad pa med do/_/chags pa med do/_/lus lci ba med 
[\[198b.5\]]do/_/sems zhum pa med do/_/de sangs rgyas brgya stong gi spyan sngar ston kyang zhum par mi 'gyur te/_'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des gzungs dang /_shes rab dang /_ye shes dang /_spobs pa thob bo/_/de ston kyang 
[\[198b.6\]]zhum par mi 'gyur/_kun tu zhum par mi 'gyur zhing zlog par mi 'gyur te/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de chags pa med pa gsum gyi rjes su song ba yin no/_/gsum gang zhe na/_bdag la chags pa med pa dang /_sems can la chags pa med pa dang /_chos la chags pa med 
[\[198b.7\]]pa'o/_/yongs su dag pa gsum gyi rjes su song ba yin te/_gsum gang zhe na/_chos kyi dbyings yongs su dag pa dang /_de bzhin nyid yongs su dag pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su dag pa'o/_/mi zad pa gsum gyi rjes su song ba yin te/_gsum gang zhe na/_
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]chos mi zad pa dang /_yi ge mi zad pa dang /_bstan pa mi zad pa'o/_/byin gyi rlabs gsum thob pa yin te/_gsum gang zhe na/_spobs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_chos kyi don gyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_chos la 'jug pa'i byin gyi rlabs so/_/dga' ba gsum 
[\[199a.2\]]thob pa yin te/_gsum gang zhe na/_ye shes kyis dga' ba dang /_shes rab kyis dga' ba dang /_the tsom chad pas dga' ba'o/_/myur ba gsum thob pa yin te/_gsum gang zhe na/_dran pa myur ba dang /_blo gros myur ba dang /_rtogs pa myur ba'o/_/gzungs kyi 
[\[199a.3\]]yon tan bsngags pa'i dpe dgod pa mi zad pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' brgyad brgyas gzungs thob par gyur to/_/gzungs kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa'i dpe dgod pa mi zad pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/_nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[199a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la ci nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du spyod par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[199a.5\]]gsang ba pa'i bdag po dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir ngas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba las chos sba ba dang /_bsrung ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi gang dag thos pa de dag khyod kyis dran nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dran lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[199a.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos sba ba dang /_bsrung ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi de dag khyod kyis 'khor 'di la rjod cig_/de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par 
[\[199a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal te/_gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so/_/tad+ya thA/_dza ya dza ya ma ti/_dza ya sha tru/_a le/_a ma le/_a lu li te/_ma me/_ma ma ma ti/_
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]nA ma san d+hi/_ud ta me/_ud ta ma ti/_ud ta ra Ni/_a re a ram Ni/_a ri sha ma Ni/_a mU le/_a mU la/_a bang Ti ti/_mU la a nu ga te/_ad te/_mad te/_ma Ti te/_a Ti/_ma Ti te/_khu ru khu ru/_san d+hi d+harma a nu ga te/_d+harma 
[\[199b.2\]]da k+She/_d+ha rma pra be she/_/sa re sa re sa re/_a be d+he/_be da san d+hi/_e hi/_e hi ni/_e ta da a nu ga me/_bdud rnams tshar gcod pa/_mu stegs can rnams 'dzoms pa/_chos la gnod par sems pa rnams rmugs par byed pa/_nyon mongs 
[\[199b.3\]]pa rnams sel ba/_chos kyi tshul rnams 'bar bar byed pa/_chos smra ba rnams kun tu srung ba/_mya ngan las 'das par 'dzud pa/_byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa/_'khor yang dag par 'jog pa/_chos nyan pa rnams la lus 
[\[199b.4\]]sbyin par byed pa/_yang dag par song ba rnams kyis bsam pa/_yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis blta ba/_gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams mngon du 'gyur ba/_gsang sngags kyi mtshams 'gug pa/_brjod pa shes pa/_phyad pa/_mi thul pa/_bstan pa'i 
[\[199b.5\]]ngo bo nyid chud za bar ma gyur cig_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag yongs su brjod ma thag tu de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g.yos so/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[199b.6\]]khams 'di na bdud gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad dpung dang bcas/_g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du lhags nas lus btud thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[199b.7\]]cag gis chos smra ba su'i kha'i sgo nas gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'byung ba de la rim gro bgyi'o/_/bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gi dpal ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bzod par rngo thog pa ma lags so/_/
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag cag nyid kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sba bar bgyi'o/_/glags lta ba gzhan dag kyang tshar gcad par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis glang po che'i lta stangs kyis phyogs bzhi kun tu gzigs te/_de'i tshe gsang 
[\[200a.2\]]sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/dza ye/_dur dza ye/_dza ya ma ti/_sha me/_sha tru nir g+hata ni/_a mU le/_mU la pa ri tshin ne/_ma ra sai n+ya bi trA sa ni/_mug te mug ta ba ti/_shud d+he/_a b+he de/_b+ha ya mo tsa ni/_b+ha ro ha ra Ne/_ta da te bid+ye/_bid+ya ba ra ud ta 
[\[200a.3\]]me/_pha rol rgol ba tshar gcod pa/_/chos smra ba dag kun sdud pa/_/chos kyi mdzod ni kun srung ba/_/rig sngags 'di ni sangs rgyas gsungs/_/a ma/_a ma me/_ma ma ts+tshe de/_ar+the ar+tha ni stA ra Ne/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dgug pa'i tshig rnams smras pa'o/_/
[\[200a.4\]]d+hi re/_d+hi ra ba ti/_gu ba te/_shu b+heshu b+ha ba ti/_sa me/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'dir dgug par bya'o/_mai tre so ma ba ti/_k+Shan ti kr-i pa kA ru Na ud-i hra de/_prI ti u pe k+Shas ma pan te/_tshangs pa yang 'dir dgug par bya'o/_/a ra Te/_pi ra Te/_kha khe/_a mU le/_mU la sho d+ha ni/_bdud 
[\[200a.5\]]ni tshar gcod bya ba'i phyir/_/gsang sngags gzhi ni 'di dag smras/_/mdo sde legs par bshad pa 'di/_/mi yi dbang pos byin gyis brlabs/_/gang tshe shes par 'gyur ba na/_/de yi tshe na spyod par 'gyur/_/gsang sngags 'di dag rab brjod pas/_/sa ni rab tu g.yos par gyur/_/bdud rnams thams 
[\[200a.6\]]cad lhags gyur te/_/'di skad kyi ni tshig smras so/_/phyi ma'i dus na mdo sde 'di/_/gang dag lag tu mchi 'gyur ba/_chos smra mkhas pa de dag ni/_/bdag cag rnams kyis bsrung bar bgyi/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_gsang ba pa'i 
[\[200a.7\]]bdag po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs par shes par gyis shig_/byin gyis brlabs 'di ni sus kyang rnam par dkrug par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po ngas mngon par shes te/_'das pa'i dus 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]na bskal ba ma smad pa zhes bya ba la/_'jig rten gyi khams ma smad pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[200b.2\]]rin chen zla ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gsung rab la dge slong chos smra ba/_rdzu 'phrul che ba/_dbang che bar grags pa/_mthu che ba/_shes rab 'phags zhes bya ba dang /_bden pas byin zhes bya ba gnyis byung ste/_chos smra ba de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de 
[\[200b.3\]]las gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bzung nas/_bcom ldan 'das des chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bskal pa phyed tshang bar rjes su bskor nas/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud bye ba phrag brgya 'khod pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad yongs su smin par byas te/_byang chub yang 
[\[200b.4\]]dag par 'dzin du bcug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba de bzhugs sam/_'on te yongs su mya ngan las 'das lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zhi 
[\[200b.5\]]ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba de ni shar phyogs logs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams ma smad pa zhes bya ba na bzhugs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa khri thub bo/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin 
[\[200b.6\]]gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bdud gang dag 'khod pa de dag khros shing sdang bar gyur pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa des gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gis de dag btul/_legs par yongs su btul te/_de dag thams cad byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/_/rigs 
[\[200b.7\]]kyi bu nga dang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba de'i gsung rab la tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas byang chub tu nges par byung ste/_nga ni shes rab 'phags zhes bya bar gyur to/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po ni bden pas byin zhes bya bar gyur to/_/zhi ba'i blo 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]gros de ltar nged gnyis lhan cig tu 'thun pa bag yod par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa dag la bsti stang du byas so/_/bla mar byas so/_/rim gror byas so/_/mchod pa byas so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni bdud tshar gcad pa dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su 
[\[201a.2\]]gzung ba'i phyir gces spras byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa grangs med par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 
[\[201a.3\]]'di nub par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir gzung ba dang /_yongs su bsrung bar khyed kyi nang nas su spro/_de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir langs te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo 
[\[201a.4\]]sbyar ba btud de de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/lus dang srog kyang spang bgyis la/_/rnam par smin la mi re bar/_/'jig rten mgon pos gsungs pa yin/_/mdo sde 'di ni gzung bar bgyi/_/rgyal po bzang la sogs pa lha'i bu lnga stong gis thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[201a.5\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di gzung bar bgyi'o/_/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so/_/sems can kun gyi don slad du/_/snying rje brtan par bskyed nas ni/_/sangs rgyas kyis gsungs zab pa yi/_/mdo sde 'di ni gzung bar bgyi/_/de nas 
[\[201a.6\]]lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa gtsug pud can dang /_rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/nad kun las ni thar bgyid pa/_/mdo 'di sman dang 'dra ba lags/_/ston pa legs par sems bskyed de/_/bdag cag gis kyang gzung bar bgyi/_/de nas bcom 
[\[201a.7\]]ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bskal pa grangs ma mchis par bsgrubs pa 'di gzung bar bgyi'o/_/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]so/_/chos 'di yi ge ma mchis na/_/mi yi dbang pos thugs rje yis/_/yi ge rnams kyis rab bshad pa/_/de ni bdag gis gzung bar bgyi/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa gtsug pud can la bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa gsum po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /_
[\[201b.2\]]rim gro byed pa bla na med pa'o/_/mchod pa'i las bla na med pa'o/_/bsod nams tshad med pa 'byung ba'o/_/gsum gang zhe na/_gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed pa dang /_gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos 'dzin pa dang /_gang ji ltar thos pa'i 
[\[201b.3\]]chos rnams de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa ste/_tshangs pa gsum po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /_rim gro bya ba bla na med pa'o/_/tshangs pa gal te de bzhin gshegs pa tshe'i tshad bskal par bzhugs pas mchod pa'i dngos po gsum po 'di dag gi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin 
[\[201b.4\]]pa bskal pa'i bar du bstan du zin kyang mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshangs pa de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /_rim gro bya ba bla na med pas mchod pa byed 'dod pas mchod pa'i dngos po gsum po 'di dag gis mchod par bya'o/_/tshangs pa de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 
[\[201b.5\]]dam pa'i chos kyi tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa yongs su bzung na 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshangs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni chos las nges par byung ba 
[\[201b.6\]]yin pas de chos kyis mchod par bya'i zang zing gis ni ma yin no/_/dam pa'i chos kyis mchod pa ni mchod pa thams cad kyi nang na mchog tu bshad do/_/dam par bshad do/_/phul du bshad do/_/tshangs pa ngas mngon par shes te 'das pa'i dus na nga rgyal po'i pho brang zhig tu skyes te/_rgyal bu gzhon nu blo 
[\[201b.7\]]gros ldan zhes bya bar gyur pa de ni ngag nyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na tshigs su bcad pa gnyis thos nas bzung ba dang /_nga sad nas 'di snyam du bsams te/_bdag gis gter chen po zhig rnyed do snyam nas ngas gter chen po zhig rnyed do zhes skad cher byung ba dang /_nga'i pha ma gnyis na re gzhon nu gter ga la 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]yod ces zer ro/_/ngas pha ma gnyis la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'jig rten gter chen rnams ni rgyal po dang /_/rkun po me chu bslus pas zad par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thos gter ni/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por chud mi za/_/sems can don brtson 
[\[202a.2\]]byang chub sems dang ni/_/tshul bzhin nyid kyis dben sems gang yin dang /_/rtag tu bag yod 'chi med rgyu yin te/_/yongs su 'dzin med bde ba kun gyi rgyu/_/tshangs pa tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis ngas rmi lam du thos te/_tshangs pa ngas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyis sems can 
[\[202a.3\]]brgyad stong ni byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/_/srog chags bzhi khri nyis stong ni bde 'gror 'gro bar byas so/_/tshangs pa khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang ji ltar gang dag thos pa la brtson pa dang /_brtson nas yang dag par sgrub pa dang /_sgrub pa la gnas nas kyang gzhan la phan 'dogs pa de 
[\[202a.4\]]dag gis gter chen po thob par de ltar rig par bya'o/_/tshangs pa theg pa chen po la gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa dang /_thos pa tshol bas chog mi shes pa ste/_gnyis po de dag go/_/tshangs pa de lta bas na chos kyi 
[\[202a.5\]]tshul 'di rgyun ma bcad cig_/tshangs pa khyod kyis bskal pa bzang po pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba gyis shig_/tshangs pa bskal pa bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag de 'dra 
[\[202a.6\]]bar yongs su dag pa'i sems can du 'gyur na ni der khyod btang snyoms can du 'gyur ro/_/tshangs pa 'di ltar nyon mongs pa can gyi dus 'di na su zhig nyin gcig gam/_mtshan gcig dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa de ni ches mang gi/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su 
[\[202a.7\]]bskal pa brgya stong gis ni de lta ma yin no/_/tshangs pa de lta bas na/_khyod kyis dus ngan pa 'dir dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus su bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba lag na rdo rje'i le'u klu'i gzungs chen po bstan pa 'di long shig_/zung shig_/lhogs shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston cig_/kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la yongs su gtad do/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[202b.2\]]pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di skye bo phal pa la ma bshad cig_/kun dga' bo sems can dman pa la mos pa rnams ni 'di la mgo rmongs par 'gyur te/_kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni de tsam du mos par dka' ba de tsam du rtogs par dka' ba'o/_/sems can gang dag cang shes pa/_
[\[202b.3\]]sbyang ba legs par byas pa chos 'di dag gi snod du gyur pa ma gtogs te/_de dag ni chos kyi tshul gyi rgyud 'di thos na skrag par mi 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[202b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs lags te/_mthu ci mchis pas rngo ci thog tu gzung bar bgyi'o/_/bshad par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis sems can chen po dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir langs 
[\[202b.5\]]pa 'di dag mthong ngam/_gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'di dag thams cad ni khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa na phan 'dogs par 'gyur ba sha stag go_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i 
[\[202b.6\]]ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lag na rdo rje'i le'u zhes bya bar zung shig_/'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/'di sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam 
[\[202b.7\]]gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/'di bsod nams tshad med pa 'byung ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i skyes bu gang zag gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams sa'i steng nas bzung ste/_srid 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]pa'i rtse mo'i bar du rin po che thams cad kyis yongs su bkang nas sbyin pa byin te de'i rnam par smin pa la re ba bas/_gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bton te/_zang zing med pa'i sems kyis gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bshad na 'di ni de bas bsod 
[\[203a.2\]]nams ches mang du skyed do/_/de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa'i le'u dang /_bsod nams tshad med pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/dam pa'i chos yongs su gtad pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa na srog chags bye ba brgya phrag bcus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[203a.3\]]byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri drug stong ni bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go_/dge slong stong drug brgya ni sems rnam par grol lo/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dag 
[\[203a.4\]]ni rab tu g.yos so/_/lha brgya stong dag gis ni rol mo sil snyan blangs shing me tog gi char yang rab tu phab ste/_'di skad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du shin tu yun ring du gnas par gyur cig ces kyang smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_/
[\[203a.5\]]gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros dang /_lha'i bu rgyal po bzang dang /_rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom 
[\[203a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//dam pa'i chos yongs su gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang 
[\[203a.7\]]ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste le'u gsum pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang dA na shI la dang /_mu ni bar ma dang zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]{D48}]'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bzhi pa ste/_rmi lam bstan pa/_bam po dang po/_rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya swap+na nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rmi lam bstan pa zhes bya 
[\[203b.2\]]ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong drug khri'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po phal 
[\[203b.3\]]cher bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_nyan thos chen po mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa sha stag dang yang thabs cig go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas 'di lta bu'i 
[\[203b.4\]]ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba 'khor dang bcas pa gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste 
[\[203b.5\]]lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus phyogs bcu nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir lhags pa'i dge slong ji snyed pa de dag 
[\[203b.6\]]thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus 'khor brgyad kyi gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa ji snyed pa de dag thams 
[\[203b.7\]]cad kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dga' ba dang /_rab dga' dang /_rtogs dga' dang /_bzang dga' dang /_
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]dpal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_yongs su dga' ldan dang /_dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba rnams gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rab tu mang po dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 
[\[204a.2\]]mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs 
[\[204a.3\]]pa byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan ma bstan pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sngon yang bshad la slad kyis kyang 'chad par 'gyur bas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_
[\[204a.4\]]lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba'i slad du de yang dag par bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das na yang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[204a.5\]]byang chub tu 'dun pa rgya chen po skyed par 'gyur zhing /_bdag nyid kyi dge ba dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba na gzhan dag la rlom sems bgyid par mi 'gyur zhing bde bas kyang bag ma mchis par mi 'gyur la/_sdug bsngal bar gyur pas kyang sgyid lug par mi 
[\[204a.6\]]'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag la cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rjes rab 'joms kyis lha'i bu de dag gis gsol ba btab par rig cing /_'khor mtha' yas pa dag lhags 
[\[204a.7\]]par yang rig nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/yon tan brgyas bltams pa la 'di zhu lags/_/lha mi dga' mdzad pa la 'di zhu lags/_/bdud 'joms mdzad pa po la 'di zhu lags/_/skye mang sman pa'i mchog la 'di zhu lags/_/'khrul med gsung 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]gis chos rnams ston mdzad cing /_/'gro ba'i 'jig rten mkhas pa bla na med/_/yid gnyis brgya stong rab tu gcod mdzad cing /_/skye mang mig stsol ba la 'di zhu lags/_/nyi ltar mnyam med mun pa sel mdzad cing /_/zla ltar yongs dag bsil ba'i 'od ldan pa/_/mi 
[\[204b.2\]]sdug sdug la mi g.yo lhun 'dra zhing /_/mtsho 'dra yon tan mchog la 'di zhu lags/_/dogs bzhin du nongs pa bgyis bzod cing /_/chab ltar skye dgu'i dri ma sbyong bar mdzad/_/zhugs bzhin nyon mongs dra ba sreg mdzad cing /_/srid gsum 'khor mi mnga' la 'di 
[\[204b.3\]]zhu lags/_/sman pa bzhin du 'gro ba gso mdzad cing /_/rnam thos bu ltar sdug la nor sbyin mdzad/_/sprin bzhin skom pas gdungs pa zhi mdzad cing /_/des pa gsung mchog ston la 'di zhu lags/_/'gro ba zug rngu sdug bsngal nga rgyal bcas/_/tha ba nyon mongs 
[\[204b.4\]]dri bcas g.yon can dag_/'dul mkhas bde dang bde ba stsol mdzad cing /_/'gro bas dran bgyi ba la mchog 'di zhu/_/'dzem dang snang ldan blo gros brtan ldan zhing /_/rtogs dang dran ldan bla ma rnams kyis mchod/_/mnyam med tshul mi 'chos shing thugs mi gnas/_/
[\[204b.5\]]yon tan rgya mtsho 'dra la mchog 'di zhu/_/skye dgu'i 'thab rtsod nyon mongs zhi mdzad cing /_/rtag tu des shing zhal bzang dga' bar mdzad/_/shin tu zhal 'dzum mnyen zhing byams pa'i thugs/_/srid gsum pha rol gshegs la 'di zhu lags/_/sor bcu thal sbyar 'di 
[\[204b.6\]]yis bstod bgyis shing /_/bde gshegs stobs bcu khyod la gsol 'debs kyis/_/sems can rin chen de dag rnams kyi spyod/_/zhus pa bzhin du bka' stsol bshad du gsol/_/byang chub tshul gyi spyod de ci 'dra ba/_/thos na lha mi tshogs kyang spyod 'gyur bas/_/'di 
[\[204b.7\]]ni skye mchog lags zhes bdag cag gis/_/ji ltar 'tshal 'gyur mtshan ma bdag la gsungs/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rjes rab 'joms la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rdo rjes rab 'joms de'i 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_rnam pa gang dag dang /_rtags gang dag dang /_mtshan ma gang dag gis gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa yin par shes par bya ba ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdo rjes rab 
[\[205a.2\]]'joms kyis bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rdo rjes rab 'joms mtshan ma brgya rtsa brgyad kyis ni gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa yin 
[\[205a.3\]]par rig par bya ste/_brgya rtsa brgyad gang zhe na/_gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdzes pas bka' stsol ba'i gzugs mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa cang mi gsung ba mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dbu dang 
[\[205a.4\]]zhabs su bcas par g.yogs pa mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa zhal phyir phyogs pa mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'jim pa las byas pa mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshon gyis bris pa mthong ba dang /_
[\[205a.5\]]gzhan yang 'gro ba na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dag la chos ston par mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la gshegs pa mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[205a.6\]]pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa zhugs la bzhen pa mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dag rnyed pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra rnyed pa dang /_gzhan 
[\[205a.7\]]yang rmi lam na sngon ma mthong ba'i mchod rten dag mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rin po ches brgyan pa dag mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten cho 'phrul mdzad pa dag mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]gshegs pa'i 'od mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra thos la ma mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yin par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la me tog gam/_me 
[\[205b.2\]]tog phreng ngam/_spos sam/_byug pa 'bul zhing skud par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas na bza' dri ma can gsol ba mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na sngon ma thos pa'i chos dag thos pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na 
[\[205b.3\]]ma bstan pa'i chos dag shes la sad na chos 'chad pa su yang med cing ci yang mi dran pa dang /_sngon ma mthong ba'i dge slong chos smra ba dag mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag chos kyi khri stan la 'dug ste chos ston par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi 
[\[205b.4\]]lam na bdag 'jigs pa med par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na byang chub kyi snying po mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag pa mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang 
[\[205b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gos rnyed pa dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhung bzed rnyed pa dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa nyag gcig mthong ba dang /_gzhan 
[\[205b.6\]]yang de bzhin gshegs pa skye bo mang pos yongs su bskor ba mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdugs mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'chags dag mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan mthong ba dang /_gzhan 
[\[205b.7\]]yang bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas 'bul bar kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la na bza' 'bul bar kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la me tog 'bul bar kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang bdag ri la 'dug par 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag gcer bur 'dug par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag phyogs mtshams na 'dug par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag sngon ma mthong ba'i yul du phyin par kun tu shes pa dang /_
[\[206a.2\]]gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag chu bo'i nang na 'dug par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na sprin las char 'bab pa mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam nas g.yos par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du son par kun tu shes pa 
[\[206a.3\]]dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag na bar kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag g.yang sa nas g.yang du lhung zhing rton pa med par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag gsad pa las btang bar kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag 
[\[206a.4\]]dgra'i nang na 'dug par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag nam mkha' la 'gro bar kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag gis lag pa na sgron ma thogs pa kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na byang chub sems dpa' phyir phyung ba mthong ba dang /_gzhan 
[\[206a.5\]]yang rmi lam na glegs bam rnyed pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na gzungs kyi sgra thos pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra thos pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na shin tu rgyas pa'i sde'i mdo sde'i sgra thos pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na chos smra ba'i dge slong che ge mo zhes 
[\[206a.6\]]bya ba rnams kyi ming thos pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag tshigs su bcad pa la spobs pa thob par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag mdo sde la spobs pa thob par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na chos kyi gter gyi sgra thos pa dang /_gzhan yang 
[\[206a.7\]]rmi lam na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pa dang /_gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gyi byang chub sems dpa' che ge mo zhes bya ba'i ming thos pa dang /_gzhan yang bdag rgya mtsho'i dbus na 'dug par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]yang bdag rin po che dag thu bar kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang bdag ri rab kyi rtse mor son par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang bdag ri la 'dzeg par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang bdag ri'i rtse mo na 'dug par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang bdag shing ljon pa 
[\[206b.2\]]la 'dzeg par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang bdag glang po che'i gtso bo mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang bdag glang po che'i gtso bo la zhon par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang bdag rta la zhon par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang bdag bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs byed par kun tu shes 
[\[206b.3\]]pa dang /_gzhan yang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dag mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang me tog gi shing ljon pa dag mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang sngon ma mthong ba'i grong khyer mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang mtsho ma dros pa mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang lha'i bu mthong ba dang /_gzhan 
[\[206b.4\]]yang klu mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang bdag 'dzam bu'i gling gzhan du son par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang bdag gos dkar po gyon par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang bdag gi mgo la rin po che'i phreng ba thogs par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang bdag gi 
[\[206b.5\]]mgo la me tog gi phreng ba rgyan dang bcas pa thogs par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang bdag me tog sil ma dag srel bar kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang bdag rnga bo che rdung ba'am/_rol mo'i sgra gzhan dag 'byin par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang nyi ma spyang kis 
[\[206b.6\]]zin pa 'am/_zla ba spyang kis zin par mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang bdag mi gtsang bas 'bags par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang bdag rgyal por gyur par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang bdag rgyal po'i spyan snga 'am/_rgyal po'i blon po chen po 'am/_skye bo 
[\[206b.7\]]phal po che'i nang na 'dug par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang bdag skyed mos tshal na 'dug par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang sngon ma mthong ba'i gtsug lag khang ngam/_grong ngam/_yul lam/_ljongs mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na gdugs rnyed pa dang /_
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag skye bo phal po che la chos ston par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang bdag grong gzhan du zhugs par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang bdag zam pa 'dogs par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang bdag gru sbyor bar kun tu shes pa 
[\[207a.2\]]dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na sprin las 'brug grag pa'am/_glog 'byung bar kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na mtshon cha 'am go cha rnyed pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na snod dag rnyed pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag sems can rnams la lam ston par kun tu 
[\[207a.3\]]shes pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag skyed mos tshal du 'jug par kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang rmi lam na lo tog phun sum tshogs pa mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang bdag sems can nad pa rnams gso bar kun tu shes pa dang /_gzhan yang bdag byang chub tu lung
